[\[1b.1\]{D2217}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_sa ka la tan+t+ra sa b+ha ba sany+tso da ni shrI gu h+ya sid+d+hi nA ma/_bod skad du/_rgyud ma lus pa'i don nges par skul bar byed pa/_dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes
[\[1b.2\]]bya ba/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dngos po med cing khyab pa mchog tu zhi ba'i go 'phang 'jig rten spyod pa dag las
[\[1b.3\]]rnam grol ba/_/gang zhig rtag 'byung zhe la rgyal ba dam pa khyu mchog rnams kyis phyag byas bsam gtan dang bral ba/_/ci yang rung ba'i gnas gyur dpal ldan rgyal ba'i sku yi dam pa rnam dag
[\[1b.4\]]nang gi bdag nyid kyis 'jug pa/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang rtogs par bya ba min zhing dri ma rnams dang bral ba'i de nyid de la phyag 'tshal nas/_/go 'phang mchog tu 'gro ba tshol byed pho nya mchog gyur
[\[1b.5\]]sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur gyur cing /_/spyod pa sna tshogs dang 'brel rtsod pa'i dri ma'i bgegs kyis byas pa'i g.yeng ba spong byed pa'i/_/dngos grub rnams kyi skye sa rgyal ba rnams kyi yon tan
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]brgya phrag mang po'i gnas gyur ma lta bu/_/mchog tu legs spyod thar pa ster byed rin chen gyur ba dpal ldan gsang ba grub pa bshad/_/yon tan dpag med gzhir gyur pa/_/mi phyed rdo rje gsum gyi
[\[2a.2\]]sku/_/gang gi spyod yul las 'das pa/_/dang por bde chen phyag byas nas/_/gsang ba grub pa bla med pa/_/sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/_/sems ni snying rje'i dbang gyur pas/_/pad+ma rdo rje bdag gis bshad/_/
[\[2a.3\]]rgyud gzhan du ma nyid du yang /_/sangs rgyas mgon pos gang gsungs pa/_/nges pa'i man ngag dang ldan pas/_/de ni da ltar bdag gis bshad/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/'bad pa thams cad
[\[2a.4\]]spang bar bya/_/bskyed pa mang zhing ring ba dang /_/dang po'i las can bsgom pa'i phyir/_/rgyud kyi dam pa'i dngos brten nas/_/dngos grub bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid can/_/bsgom pa yi ni bar chad can/_/rgyas pa thams cad
[\[2a.5\]]rnams spangs la/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub legs ster ba/_/shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/_/gsang ba grub pa bla med pa/_/bzang pos mdor bsdus bshad par bya/_/dge 'byung nyon mongs med pa dang /_
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]bgegs rnams thams cad 'jig mdzad cing /_/dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur pa/_/yid bzhin nor bu mchog lta bu/_/sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed cing /_/g.yeng ba'i sgra rnams 'joms byed pa/_/don rnams thams cad grub byed pa/_/mngon par byang chub mtshan nyid
[\[2b.2\]]do/_/gang dang gang der gnas na yang /_/thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis/_/bsgom pa dag la rab gnas na/_/sgrub po gang de dngos grub 'gyur/_/sbas pa'i brtul zhugs dang ldan pas/_/chos rnams dang yang 'gal med par/_/rdor gsum dbye ru med gzugs can/_/byang
[\[2b.3\]]chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/dus kyi nges pa yongs spangs nas/_/bla med gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/srog chags gsod cing khro ba dang /_/gang yang khro ba'i las dga' zhing /_/brdzun gyi tshig ni spros pa yis/_/mi gang rmongs pas 'tsho ba yi/_/mi de dag kyang myur
[\[2b.4\]]bar 'dir/_/spyod pa 'dis ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/gzhan gyi chung ma spyod pa dang /_/gzhan gyi nor la rku ba dang /_/dman pa'i las can smad pa dag_/rtag tu spyod par byed pa dang /_/gang la spyod pas 'dod khams kyi/_/steng gi pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sbas pa'i brtul
[\[2b.5\]]zhugs ngo bo nyid/_/sgrub pa po la bdag gis brjod/_/gsang ba'i spyod pa mchog bzang po/_/dngos grub kun ster thabs bcas pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas gang yin/_/tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mchog tu zhi ba nyid/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs
[\[2b.6\]]pa'i gnas/_/thob par 'dod pas mchog zhi ba/_/gsang ba grub pas bsgrub par bya/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor nyid/_/de nyid ldan pas bsgom par bya/_/gzhan du de nyid dman pas ni/_/dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nyid brtag pa rnams las gzhan/_/
[\[2b.7\]]khyad par thams cad rnams spangs shing /_/mtshan ma med cing snang ba med/_/gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba nyid/_/lung dang bstan bcos lugs rim pas/_/ji srid rtog pa dang bcas pas/_/de srid bar du rgyas 'gyur te/_/chu la 'bru mar thim pa bzhin/_/re zhig rtog des
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]dgos med mchog_/rnam rtog sna tshogs byed pa yis/_/bstan bcos de nyid tshol mi dgos/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/dang por de nyid shes byas la/_/de nyid bsgrub phyir nyer gnas bya/_/de nas bsgom la 'bad pa yis/_/nyams su myong ba bskyed
[\[3a.2\]]par bya/_/de nyid gsal bar gyur sems kyis/_/phyi nas spyod pa yang dag spyad/_/rig pa dang ldan brtul zhugs kyang /_/de yi rjes la spyad par bya/_/gcig pa brtan pa'i sems kyis ni/_/gsang ba'i spyod pa spyad nas ni/_/de ni mthar thug skyes gyur nas/_/phyi nas
[\[3a.3\]]rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/_/gzhan du de nyid dman pa yis/_/'tsho ba'i rgyu can nyid gyur pa/_/dmyal ba 'thob bar byed pa'i rgyu/_/brtul zhugs kyis ni ci zhig bya/_/sgrub bo de nyid la gnas pas/_/brtul zhugs med par 'grub par 'gyur/_/brtul zhugs brgya phrag
[\[3a.4\]]la spyad kyang /_/de nyid dman na 'grub mi 'gyur/_/de nyid ldan na thams cad kyis/_/dri med de ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/sgrub po sgom pa dang ldan zhing /_/sdig pa kun las rnam grol bas/_/brtul zhugs kyis ni chags med thob/_/dngos grub rgyal bas thob ma gsungs/_/dngos
[\[3a.5\]]grub de nyid shes gyur nas/_/'thob kyi brtul zhugs kyis ni min/_/chags pa kun las log gyur cing /_/slong mo gtso bor bya ba ste/_/de tsam brtul zhugs kyis khyab 'gyur/_/de nyid spangs nas dngos grub med/_/'bab stegs lha rten sbyin pa'ang min/_/khrus dang
[\[3a.6\]]dka' thub de bzhin te/_/'di kun bden pa ma yin gyi/_/'di nyid gcig pu bden pa nyid/_/gnod pa skyed par byed pa yi/_/ngan pa'i las dag sngon byas pas/_/de nyid dman pa'i lus can gyis/_/brtul zhugs ngo bo ma lus myong /_/mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang /_/srid par
[\[3a.7\]]ngal bar byas pas kyang /_/de nyid ldan na 'grub 'gyur te/_/dri med go 'phang thob par 'gyur/_/nor rnams phun tshogs bdag nyid kyi/_/de nyid rin chen sgom byed na/_/brtul zhugs med kyang de nyid ni/_/nges par bla na med par 'gro/_/lung gi spyod pa las gsungs pa'i/_/brtul
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]zhugs gang zhig 'dir gnas pa/_/nor rnams sgrub par mi nus pas/_/'tsho ba'i phyir ni rtag pa nyid/_/phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gzugs/_/rnam par shes pa'i gzhir gyur ltar/_/de ltar de nyid ldan brtul zhugs/_/de nyid las ni 'jug par bstan/_/'dul ba'i thabs kyi rgyu
[\[3b.2\]]phyir dang /_/nor la sogs pa sgrub phyir dang /_/sems can don du de nyid bcas/_/brtul zhugs zhal gyis bzhes pa yin/_/'tsho ba yi ni thabs tsam du/_/so so'i skye bos gtsor byed pas/_/ji ltar mtshan ma'i che ba nyid/_/de nyid bral na dngos grub med/_/nor gyi 'byor pa
[\[3b.3\]]ldan pa'i bdag_/rtag tu bsgoms pas ngal byas pa'i/_/smyon pa'i gzugs nyid la brten cing /_/gsang ba grub par rnam gnas nas/_/de nyid rdo rje 'chang bla ma/_/bsgom dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur/_/gzhan du de nyid ldan gyur kyang /_/dngos grub 'bras bu'i snod
[\[3b.4\]]mi 'gyur/_/de ltar phyi rol yongs bcad la/_/de nyid bla med shes byas nas/_/sangs rgyas nyid du nges bya ste/_/blo ldan gsang ba grub par spyod/_/rnam par g.yeng ba kun gyi gzhi/_/brtul zhugs spangs shing de nyid shes/_/shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/_/go 'phang
[\[3b.5\]]mchog ni bsgrub par bya/_/de nyid de yang rgyud gnas pas/_/dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus par gsal/_/spros pa du ma rgyas gyur pas/_/gzhan du sbas nas bstan pa yin/_/bya ba spyod pa'i dbye ba dang /_/mdo sde'i sde snod la sogs su/_/mchog tu dag pa gcig pu nyid/_/
[\[3b.6\]]rnam pa du mar rnam par gnas/_/phung po rin chen snod nyid du/_/sems can bsam pa'i bye brag gis/_/de nyid 'bad pas sba mdzad nas/_/sangs rgyas mgon pos rnam par gzhag_/byang chub sems mchog rnam par dag_/bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/_/rang gi
[\[3b.7\]]lus la rab gnas pa/_/de ni 'bad pas rig par bya/_/de nas spyod pa bya ba'am/_/khyim du gnas te bsgom par bya/_/de nyid rin chen rnam dag bdag_/rtsod pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/_/thabs bzang po ni rnam spangs nas/_/'gal ba'i dam tshig la sogs la/_/
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]gzhan du gang zhig grub gyur pa/_/de ni ngu 'bod sogs par 'tshed/_/ji ltar me ni 'bar gyur pa/_/de ni rtswa shing phung po dag_/bcug nas thal ba nyid du 'gyur/_/myu gu sogs pa'ang 'byung mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin de nyid med bzhin du/_/ngo mtshar che ba ltar byed
[\[4a.2\]]pa/_/ji srid nam mkha' gnas bar du/_/shi ba'i 'og tu dmyal bar 'gro/_/ji ltar 'ga' zhig sbrul gdug la/_/sman dang sngags sogs mi ldan par/_/rmongs pa'i bdag nyid gang rtse ba/_/gshin rje'i gnas 'gro 'dod pa yin/_/ji ltar mtha' med rgya mtsho la/_/gru med
[\[4a.3\]]gzhan zhig 'jug 'gyur ba/_/thabs dang rten med gyur nas ni/_/skad cig gis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin dza yi mtha' can rgyud/_/yang dag rab sbyin spangs gyur pa/_/smad cing dman pa'i las rnams ni/_/byas na mnar med 'gro bar 'gyur/_/rnyed dka' bla med go
[\[4a.4\]]'phang mchog_/de nyid ces byar mngon brjod pa/_/gang gis dag pa de thob pa/_/de yi thabs ni bdag gis brjod/_/bla ma dang ni rdo rje 'dzin/_/gang gis gnyis su med par mthong /_/dngos grub bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid can/_/de nyid de ni 'dir 'thob 'gyur/_/gang yang
[\[4a.5\]]khro zhing nga rgyal can/_/bslus pa byis dang spros la dga'/_/'dod cing chags pa'i sems can gang /_/gang las rnyed cing gang las min/_/g.yo sgyus bla ma phyag byed cing /_/skyon rtog pa la ched du byed/_/brdzun pas nga rgyal gdug pa can/_/tshig gi rtsod la rtag tu gnas/_/
[\[4a.6\]]rdo rje spun dang bla ma la/_/slu ba'i bsam pa brtan pa can/_/sems can des ni dngos grub kun/_/ster ba'i go 'phang de mi thob/_/'dir ni 'di 'dra gzhan yang mthong /_/ji srid 'dod pa thob bar du/_/phyag 'tshal mchod dang bsnyen bkur gyis/_/brtan par bla ma mnyes byas nas/_/
[\[4a.7\]]go 'phang mchog ni thob nas ni/_/mdun nyid na ni gnas na yang /_/su zhig gang nas ji ltar 'ong /_/rang bzhin ngan pas mi shes so/_/gcig pu mthong nas ring po nas/_/gus par phyag ni 'tshal byed cing /_/de yang mang po'i nang du ni/_/bde bar byon nas rtsal gyis
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]phongs/_/de lta bu yi sems can gang /_/mya ngan 'das mchog go 'phang mchog_/yang dag gsung bas gang gsungs pa/_/de yis thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang sems can 'di lta bu/_/bla ma smod pa dag kyang mthong /_/ngo tsha spangs shing spyod pa ring /_/yang dag rim pa sun 'byin
[\[4b.2\]]pa/_/rgyud ni bsdu ba tsam nyid kyis/_/de yi dngos la kha phyir bltas/_/dbang bskur rjes gnang med par yang /_/slob ma dag ni sdud par byed/_/glegs bam mthong bas dga' gyur nas/_/gsang sngags rang nyid len par byed/_/slob dpon las ni shes min pa/_/dam tshig
[\[4b.3\]]spyod pa rnam par spangs/_/sems can rnams ni sdud pa ni/_/glegs bam bka' yis byed pa yin/_/de nyid shes pa ma yin par/_/gang phyir yang dag gsungs pas bstan/_/de lta bu dang de dag nyid/_/kun kyang sdig pa'i las can de/_/dam pa min pa'i lam zhugs
[\[4b.4\]]nas/_/dmyal ba dag tu 'gro bar gcig_/sdug bsngal phongs dang nyon mongs dang /_/sna tshogs nad kyis gtses pa'i mthar/_/shi nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/_/skye gnas ngan par skye bar 'gyur/_/bde gshegs dngos grub 'dod na ni/_/dam tshig spyod pa spangs pa yis/_/
[\[4b.5\]]'grub dka' de dang lhan cig tu/_/gnas pa nyid du 'ang mi bya'o/_/dngos po kun gyis slob dpon la/_/ji srid mnyes par gyur bar du/_/lus ngag yid kyis brtan pa ru/_/dus ni ring por mnyes byed pa'i/_/slob ma shin tu dri med pa'i/_/de nyid yang dag rab sbyin gnas/_/
[\[4b.6\]]ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/_/de nas bgegs med 'thob 'gyur ba/_/rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i dngos/_/de nyid rgyal po yangs pa ste/_/nyin dang mtshan du bsgoms pa yis/_/dngos grub myur du nges 'thob 'gyur/_/sngags dang phyag rgya rgyas gyur pa'i/_/dngos
[\[4b.7\]]grub sgrub pa'i dbang po la/_/rgyud rnams du mar gsungs pa yi/_/bzlas dang sbyin sreg brtul zhugs sogs/_/thun mtshams bzhi yi cho ga yis/_/yul dang dkyil 'khor bri la sogs/_/kha dog gzugs sogs dbye ba yis/_/rigs rnams su ni rnam brtags dang /_/khrus
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]dang lha mchod smyung ba dang /_/phyag rgya 'ching ba'i rigs de bzhin/_/sku gzugs la sogs cho ga dang /_/mchod rten las ni rgyas pa dang /_/de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/_/rnam rtog sna tshogs byed pa yis/_/grub pa sems can bsam rim bzhin/_/dpal
[\[5a.2\]]'byung ba yi mgon pos gsungs/_/de ltar rnam rtog 'bum phrag gis/_/yang dag gsung pas grub gsungs pa/_/der ni dngos grub gang 'grub pa'am/_/'on kyang 'dir ni de mi 'grub/_/lo gcig la sogs bskal pa dang /_/gcig dang gnyis su srid pa'i mthar/_/
[\[5a.3\]]sgrub po gang gis 'grub 'gyur ba/_/chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas gyur pa/_/skye ba grangs med du ma ru/_/bsgom la brtan zhing chags med pas/_/'grub pa'i dbang po grub pa ru/_/'gyur bar gang zhing sngar gsungs pa/_/de ni re zhig 'dir mi dgos/_/thob par
[\[5a.4\]]'gyur ba dgos ma yin/_/grub pa'i bde ba las lhag pa'i/_/lus gdung sdug bsngal gyis mi 'thob/_/dpal ldan 'dus pa zhes bya 'dir/_/spros pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/_/dpal ldan
[\[5a.5\]]'dus las mchog gzhan med/_/'jig rten gsum gyi rin chen 'gyur/_/snying po las kyang snying po mchog_/rgyud kun gyi ni bla ma'i bla/_/bstan dang bshad pa'i rnam gnas pa/_/rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor rim pa nyid/_/'dus pa gang gis mi shes pa/_/de yis dngos grub ji
[\[5a.6\]]ltar 'grub/_/the tshom thams cad gcod byed cing /_/mi shes rab rib sel byed pa/_/sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/_/dpal ldan 'dus pa yongs spangs nas/_/rnam rtog du mas brtags pa yis/_/rmongs pa dngos grub 'dod gyur pa/_/mkha' la khu tshur rdeg pa
[\[5a.7\]]dang /_/smig rgyu'i chu la 'thung ba bzhin/_/dang po'i las can bsgom pa yi/_/spros pa'i rgyud rnams spangs byas shing /_/thabs dang shes rab shes byas nas/_/ji lta ba bzhin rnam par mnos/_/de phyir des byas sems gcig pa/_/blo dang ldan pas bsgom par bya/_/nyin dang mtshan du
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]bsgom byas na/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med/_/'di la smyung ba bshad pa med/_/gnyis med ye shes dang ldan na/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i dngos grub 'gyur/_/yon tan gter gyur rdo rje 'chang la dri med rdo rje gsum gyis rtag tu gus
[\[5b.2\]]byas la/_/skye ba'i rgya mtsho sdig pa'i rlabs drag mang ldan pa la grub gyur gcig pu mchog_/gsang ba'i yon tan 'byung 'gyur dri ma bral zhing don kun 'grub cing rab tu sbyin par byed pa yi/_/rgyud nas gsungs pa'i lam dang ldan pa'i sgrub po blo dang ldan pas deng nas brtsam par
[\[5b.3\]]bya/_/don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi dam pa'i don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba dang brtul zhugs dang de kho na nyid nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//rgyud gzhan rim pa ma yin
[\[5b.4\]]pa'i/_/cung zad bsdus pa'i lam nyid las/_/gsang ba las byung sgrub pa'i thabs/_/de nas yang dag bshad par bya/_/phyi rol de nyid bya ba'i lam/_/shin tu ring bas kun spangs la/_/lugs bcas rnal 'byor rim pa yis/_/ji lta ba bzhin bdag gis
[\[5b.5\]]brjod/_/slob dpon phal cher 'di skad brjod/_/dpal ldan 'dus pa mdangs chen gyi/_/rgyud kyi sdud par byed pa po/_/dpa' bo 'jig rten dbang phyug zer/_/bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/_/dpal ldan 'dus pa'i sdud pa po/_/gzhan dag yod pa ma yin zhes/_/bdag
[\[5b.6\]]nyid 'ba' zhig smra bar byed/_/rgyud mdzad pa ni thugs rje che/_/gsung pa po de brjod pa'ang de/_/de las gzhan dag yod min pas/_/bde chen las gzhan gsung pa med/_/'di skad thos pa'i tshig gang dang /_/bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tshig gnas pa/_/thugs kyi rdo rje bdag
[\[5b.7\]]nyid kyis/_/sangs rgyas kun la bstan pa yin/_/dpal ldan bde chen mgon po yis/_/bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tshig bzang pos/_/ji ltar bzang po gang bstan pa/_/de bzhin bdag gis cung zhig brjod/_/dus gcig mchog tu mdor bstan pa/_/gang tshe gtso bos
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]gsungs pa na/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi rgyud bden don/_/bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid yin/_/rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad kyis/_/rgyud don bden pa de thos nas/_/'dar zhing 'jigs pa dang ldan pas/_/dbang phyug mchog la de
[\[6a.2\]]nyid zhus/_/dpa' bo chos nyid 'di lta bu/_/gtso bo'i gsung rab dka' ba gsung /_/sangs rgyas kun kyang thams cad du/_/shin tu 'jigs pa skyed byed pa/_/rdo rje theg pa bla na med/_/shin tu gsang ba 'byed par byed/_/chos kun mnyam nyid gcig pa nyid/_/gang yin
[\[6a.3\]]gtso bo khyed kyis gsungs/_/'di skad brjod par gyur pa na/_/sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad kyang /_/'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur nas kyang /_/byang chub sems ni thugs la gzhag_/e ma ho gsang ba las gsang ba/_/rdo rje theg pa'i bshad pa 'dis/_/ngo bo med
[\[6a.4\]]cing dag gyur la/_/gang la dpe yang yod min pas/_/sangs rgyas thams cad rgyur gyur pa/_/rdo rje sems dpas de gzigs nas/_/bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyang /_/ting 'dzin bzang po la gnas nas/_/de nas sangs rgyas rdo rje dang /_/pad+ma'i snyoms 'jug sbyor ba mdzad/_/
[\[6a.5\]]mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyis/_/'jam po'i gsung gis gsung bar mdzad/_/kye kye rgyal ba thams cad gzigs/_/byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul yin/_/gang du lus ngag sems med pa/_/der ni gzugs su rab tu mthong /_/byang chub sems kyi sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[6a.6\]]ji srid 'bad pas rtogs gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas zhes pa/_/chos 'byung mi 'gyur zhi ba nyid/_/shes rab rang gi dngos de srid/_/kun du bzang po'i ye shes kyis/_/spros pa med cing dag pa las/_/'di dag thams cad rnam par 'phrul/_/mchog tu shes shing rnam
[\[6a.7\]]dag gang /_/sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa'i/_/brjod min kun la khyab par gnas/_/thams cad de yi rnam 'phrul yin/_/bzang po de nyid gnas pa yang /_/mkha' dbyings zhes bya'i sgrib bral la/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyis/_/sems can kun gyi
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]bde 'byung byed/_/rnam dag shes rab lus las byung /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas zhi ba/_/lha rdzas chos 'byung mi 'gyur ba/_/blo yis de ni bdag gis bsten/_/e yi cha byad bzang ba la/_/dbus su waM gis rnam par brgyan/_/bde ba kun gyi gnas gyur pas/_/sangs rgyas rin chen
[\[6b.2\]]za ma tog_/rgyud kyi dang por gang gnas pa/_/de phyir de ni bshad par bya/_/dpa' bo bde chen 'di skad du/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun la gsungs/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/sku gsung thugs kyi tshul dag gis/_/gnas shing dngos grub bzang ster ba/_/
[\[6b.3\]]shes rab ces bya'i ming gi gnas/_/de la gnas pa gang yin pa/_/b+ha ga zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis/_/dag pa'i de nyid ces bya ste/_/don dam pa de bdag gis bstan/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/bcas pa'i sku gsung rdo rje nyid/_/dag pa de la nga gnas
[\[6b.4\]]nas/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyod/_/chos kyi 'byung gnas spangs pa yis/_/chos gnas dag pa gzhan dag med/_/gang la sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing /_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab gnas pa'o/_/dag pa de nyid gnas med pas/_/'jigs pa nyid du ma byed cig_/_
[\[6b.5\]]chos 'byung mi 'gyur zhi ba nyid/_/rdo rje btsun mo nyid la gnas/_/dud 'gro la sogs 'gro ba kun/_/de las thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/brgyal bar ci yi phyir na yang /_/khyod ni 'jigs pa nyid du 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas snying po las byung ba/_/de ni de yi chos nyid mchog_/_
[\[6b.6\]]snying po'i ye shes mtha' gcig pu/_/ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nyid 'di skad thos gyur te/_/sangs rgyas byang chub la gnas nas/_/bye ba kun gyis stod byed cing /_/phyag 'tshal gzugs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sems can kun la phan ston pa'i/_/snyan pa'i tshig
[\[6b.7\]]rnams smra byed pa/_/thub chen dpa' bo chen po ni/_/'gro ba'i mgon gyis bshad du gsol/_/sangs rgyas kun gtso yang dag pa/_/rdo rje theg pa skor mdzad cing /_/'gyur ba med cing snang ba med/_/gnas med de nyid bshad du gsol/_/dpa' bo nyon mongs mtsho chen las/_/rgyal
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]bas ji ltar nges sgrol ba'i/_/de nyid mchog tu bshad du gsol/_/de nyid kun gyi mchog gi mchog_/bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tshig gi mgor/_/e waM tshig gis rnam brgyan pa/_/gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/_/bde gshegs dngos grub 'byung 'gyur ba'o/_/
[\[7a.2\]]dpal ldan bde chen rdo rje 'chang /_/de ltar gsol 'debs gnas gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la/_/go 'phang mchog ni gsung bar mdzad/_/'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad la/_/rdo rje snying po kun bsdus pa/_/shin tu gsang ba phye mdzad nas/_/rdo rje thugs
[\[7a.3\]]kyis bstan pa ltar/_/'di ltar rnam par gnas pa bzhin/_/de bzhin bdag gis bshad par bya/_/bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/_/gsal por thams cad shes byas nas/_/dngos grub thams cad kun bsdus pa/_/bzang po de nas bshad par bya/_/rgyud kyi dang por rnam
[\[7a.4\]]gnas pa/_/snying po las ni snying po mchog_/de nyid bde chen mgon po yis/_/gsang ba de nyid ces byar gsungs/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/sems can kun gyi bde 'byung ba/_/gsang ba rtog pa'i dbang rgyal po/_/dpal ldan 'dus par rnam par gnas/_/
[\[7a.5\]]e waM rnam dag yi ge la/_/khams gsum po kun gus phyag 'tshal/_/gang de dpal ldan 'gro mgon gyi/_/phyag rgya'i mchog gyur brtag pa nyid/_/de ni shes rab ces byar grags/_/thog ma bar mtha' dri ma med/_/ye shes rdo rje gsum 'byung ba/_/kun rdzob gzugs su rnam
[\[7a.6\]]par gnas/_/sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/_/las kyi phyag rgya zhes byar grags/_/mi mo'i lus la brten nas ni/_/sems can kun la phan par mdzad/_/kun khyab dag pa thams cad pa/_/shes rab lha mo bla na med/_/gcig pu bzang po 'byung 'gyur ba/_/sems can
[\[7a.7\]]mgon gyis bsten pa yin/_/mkha' dbyings pho brang nyams dga' na/_/sna tshogs thugs rje can gnas pa/_/de la b+ha ga zhes brjod dang /_/e waM bya ba'i yig gnyis la/_/lus ngag yid kyis sbyor ba yin/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi de nyid gnas/_/de phyir de nyid mdor
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]bstan dang /_/rgyas par bstan pa'i tshul gyis gnas/_/dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rje btsun gyi nang na gnas pa yang /_de'i gzhung lugs ma nyams pa sbas pa las shin tu sbas pa'i don dam pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyud kyi ngo bo nyid dbang du byas nas brjod par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_
[\[7b.2\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i brtan pa dang /_g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis rjes su byed pa'i gzugs can/_thugs rdo rje'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i skur gyur nas/_dpal gsang ba
[\[7b.3\]]'dus pa e waM zhes bya ba la sogs pas don dam pa'i de kho na nyid sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis nges par ston to/_/don dam pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lha'i gzugs de nyid rgyud kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/_byang
[\[7b.4\]]chub sems dpa' bcu bdun gyi go rims kyis nges par rdzogs par gyur nas de rab tu ston par mdzad de/_/dang po gleng gzhi'i le'u las/_byang chub sems dpa' bcu bdun gyi ming brjod pa'i mtha' na/_ji ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo mngon par bsgoms pa'i rdo rje
[\[7b.5\]]zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dbang du byas nas brjod de/_'di ni re zhig dang po lha'i rnal 'byor yin te/_chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid dngos po med pa'i gzugs can yin pa'i phyir ro/_/lus dang ngag dang
[\[7b.6\]]yid kyi bdag nyid can du gyur nas/_/dam tshig dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_bzlas pa'i cho ga'i lugs sngon du 'gro bas/_sa la sogs pa'i mi mo bzhi'i rigs dang lhan cig nam mkha'i khams su rnam par gnas nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i longs spyod kyi sgo nas brjod du
[\[7b.7\]]med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dud 'gro la sogs pa'i sems can gyi rim pa ma lus pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags kyi sku mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can/_/bde ba mchog gi gtso bo dpal pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]rnams kyi don dam pa'i chos nyid kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid sgra thos pa na brgyal bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bslang bar bya ba'i phyir/_e waM zhes bya ba la sogs pas don dam pa'i de kho na nyid gang yin pa de 'dir brjod par bya'o/_/rgyud kyi dang por gang gnas
[\[8a.2\]]pa/_/sbas pa de phyir bshad par bya/_/rdo rje btsun mo las byung ba/_/e waM rnam dag yi ge nyid/_/e waM nam mkha'i khams su brjod/_/ma yA phyag rgyar rjes su thob/_/gang zhig de ni ston byed pa/_/thos pa zhes bya 'dir brjod do/_/rtog med kun mkhyen ye shes nyid/_/dus gcig
[\[8a.3\]]pa yang de yin no/_/b+ha ga'i gzugs can gang yin te/_/nam mkha'i khams zhes bya bar brjod/_/dus gcig na zhes gang bstan pa/_/de mdor bstan pa zhes brjod do/_/nam mkha'i khams zhes bde 'byung ba/_/gang yin bdag gis der brten te/_/sna tshogs dril bu rnga yab
[\[8a.4\]]phreng /_/dril bu rin chen gyis nyer brgyan/_/sangs rgyas rang bzhin kun bzang po/_/gnas kyi mchog der mchod par byed/_/bcom ldan 'das zhes nyer bstan pa/_/gtso bo bdag po thugs nyid do/_/rdo rje btsun mo zhes brjod pa/_/shes rab rgyal ba kun dngos te/_/thams
[\[8a.5\]]cad ces bya sgra brjod pa/_/mi bskyod la sogs de bzhin gshegs/_/de yi sku gsung thugs gang yin/_/thugs nyid du ni rnam par gnas/_/rnam dag btsun mo'i b+ha ga der/_/bde ba chen po rnam par bzhugs/_/dngos po kun gyi ngo bo yi/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rnam rol cing /_/
[\[8a.6\]]e yi cha byad bzang po la/_/dbus su waM gis rnam par brgyan/_/der ni rdo rje 'dzin mchog gnas/_/shes rab las byung zhi ba nyid/_/der ni sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing /_/de nyid du ni rnam par gnas/_/ri rab rdul phran grangs snyed kyi/_/mtha' med bskal pa bye ba ru/_/sangs rgyas
[\[8a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/bcas pa'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor der/_/dpal ldan bde chen rdo rje 'chang /_/dpal dang ldan de de na bzhugs/_/nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba der/_/til gyi gang bu gang zhing mthong /_/gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/_/de bzhin gshegs pas yongs
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]gang ba/_/yi ge de yis de kho na/_/bstan par byas pa'i thabs nyid kyis/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/bla med go 'phang 'thob bar 'gyur/_/de ltar bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tshig_/don dam nyid du rnam par gnas/_/gzhan du de nyid rnal 'byor pa'i/_/nyams su myong
[\[8b.2\]]ba de mi 'gyur/_/rdo rje thugs sam gzhan yang rung /_/dpal ldan bde chen rgyal po ni/_/'dus pa zhes bya byed po gang /_/de ni e waM 'di rab gnas/_/e waM zhes sogs rnam dag dang /_/shu ta zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis/_/gsang ba'i tshig gnas nges pa yang /_/rgyud kyi dang
[\[8b.3\]]bor brjod par bya/_/'di dang 'chad par 'gyur ba yis/_/de ni byed pa por 'dod do/_/'dir ni yi ge gnyis po ni/_/rgyud kyi dang por med mi 'dod/_/mchog tu dri med go 'phang ni/_/de ltar rnam dag shes gyur nas/_/dpal ldan 'dus par gang gsungs pa/_/sangs rgyas kun
[\[8b.4\]]gyi gnas zhi ba/_/dngos grub mchog gyur der shes nas/_/rgyud las khyad par brjod par bya/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhin gsungs pa/_/dam tshig spyod pa ston pa po/_/dag cing brjod du med pa yi/_/byang chub sems ni thams cad du/_/rab tu rgyas pa'i rgyud thams
[\[8b.5\]]cad/_/lam nyer ston par rnam par gnas/_/chos 'byung yi ge zhi nyid du/_/brjod du med par rnam par gnas/_/de yi dbye ba mtha' med pa/_/sna tshogs khyab nas rnam par gnas/_/'di ni sbun pa 'dra ba yi/_/de yi dbye ba kun spangs la/_/de nyid rnam dag ngo bo nyid/_/
[\[8b.6\]]sgrub pa'i thabs ni bdag gis brjod/_/dngos po med pa de nyid ni/_/thabs bcas pad+ma rdo rje skyes/_/dga' bral mchog dga'i bar nyid du/_/mtshon nas gang zhig rnam gnas par/_/rtag tu der gtad yid gnyis kyis/_/gang zhig der gnas 'grub par 'gyur/_/sgrub po bsgom
[\[8b.7\]]pa ldan pa yis/_/lha yi ye shes nyams myong 'gyur/_/don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi dam pa'i don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las bzhugs pa'i tshig nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]pa'o/_/de nas gsang ba bshad par bya/_/shes rab thabs ni rnam bsgoms pas/_/thugs kyi rdo rje dran pa nyid/_/gsang ba las kyang gsang ba mchog_/rang gi lus la gnas pa yi/_/dag pa gang zhig shes gyur nas/_/gnas bzang por ni gnas
[\[9a.2\]]par 'gyur/_/de ni bdag gis yang dag bshad/_/dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rjes 'brang ba'i/_/dngos grub bzang po sgrub pa'i phyir/_/mkha' dbyings lha yi gzhal yas na/_/ji lta ba bzhin yang dag gnas/_/bzang po rang gi skyed byed pa/_/thog ma dbus mthar dri ma med/_/dang
[\[9a.3\]]po'i las can sems can rnams/_/mtshon cing yid ches byed pa'o/_/mkha' dbyings rdo rje kun sbyor ba'i/_/reg las ngo mtshar chen po nyid/_/bde ba gang zhig 'byung 'gyur te/_/mchog tu dga' ba byed pa'o/_/de zad nas ni dga' bral te/_/gang gi mtha' na dga' bral
[\[9a.4\]]can/_/rang gi ngo bo bstan med pa'i/_/bdag nyid cung zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dbang po kun las rnam grol zhing /_/gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba nyid/_/khyab cing rang bzhin med pa yi/_/rtogs pa de ni go 'phang mchog_/lha rdzas kun bzang zhes bya ba/_/dga' bral
[\[9a.5\]]mtha' na rnam par gnas/_/mchog 'di sgrub po rnams kyi ni/_/grol ba'i gnas su rab tu grags/_/dpal ldan 'dus pa de nyid gang /_/bde gshegs dam pas gang gsungs pa/_/dngos med mchog tu rnam par dag_/byang chub sems ni bla med pa/_/rang bzhin dag pa de
[\[9a.6\]]nyid ni/_/bdag gis rgyas par bstan par bya/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan par bya'o/_/gang zhig mkha' dbyings steng du rin chen 'gyur/_/bde ba kun gyi rang bzhin rnam par
[\[9a.7\]]gnas/_/dbus su yon tan gyis brgyan sems gyur ba/_/de 'dir skyes bu'i sna rtse zhes byas bstan/_/rtog pa dang bcas sems zhes bya ba der/_/zla ba'i gzugs dang sangs rgyas sku yis khyab/_/longs spyod rdzogs sku bde ba'i ngo bo nyid/_/kun rdzob byang chub sems zhes
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]de la brjod/_/kun rdzob byang chub sems ni nub gyur cing /_/der ni dga' bral zhes bya 'byung 'gyur nas/_/mnyam med sprul pa'i sku yis brgyan gyur cing /_/sangs rgyas sna tshogs du mar spro bar byed/_/gnas skabs gang la dga' bral zhes bya ba'i/_/skad cig b+ha ga'i dbus su
[\[9b.2\]]'byung 'gyur te/_/yungs kar zhes bya'i ming gis rnam gnas pa/_/de la sprul pa'i sku zhes rgyal bas gsungs/_/bde ba'i dngos 'dir longs spyod rdzogs sku dang /_/sprul pa'i sku yang 'gags shing bzhugs gyur pa/_/bdag med rdo rje rim gyis cho ga bzhin/_/kun rtog rnam
[\[9b.3\]]par rtog pa nges par spangs/_/bdag med rdo rje shin tu dri ma med/_/de nas dga' bral bde ba rnam par spang /_/mar la mar bzhag bzhin du skad cig gis/_/byang chub gnas dang lhan cig gcig tu byas/_/der ni dga' bral bde bar son gyur nas/_/bdag med rdo rje shin tu brtan par
[\[9b.4\]]bzhugs/_/der ni brjod med zhes byar gang gnas pa/_/rnam dag byang chub go 'phang kun 'gro ba/_/shes bya'i bdag nyid dpag med mdangs ldan pa'i/_/de nyid bdag nyid lhan cig gzugs bsgom bya/_/dga' bral zhes bya gang gis brjod min pa/_/de yi mtshan rdzogs bsam
[\[9b.5\]]mi khyab pa'i gzugs/_/kun du dri ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/yid bzhin nor dang bum pa bzang zhes pa/_/so so rang rig lugs bzhin rig gyur pas/_/don dam rnam dag rgyal ba rnams kyi sku/_/byang chub dam pa mchog gtso de nas bsgom/_/bzang po bde ba'i sar gyur kun 'gro ba/_/
[\[9b.6\]]gsang gsum dri med rin chen de nyid bcas/_/rtag tu sems can don du lung rigs pas/_/dbang po gnyis sbyor mchog tu rab brtags nas/_/'od zer du ma de nas spro bar bya/_/gcig dang du ma'i ngo bo khams gsum 'di/_/dngos po rang bzhin med par rnam par dpyad/_/de nyid
[\[9b.7\]]de ni gzung ba la/_/'bad pa'i thabs bzhin spyod min pas/_/bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/_/shes nas blo dang ldan pas bsgom/_/bdag nyid dri med zhi ba yis/_/de nyid de dang ldan gyur pas/_/las kyi phyag rgya bsgom pa yang /_/'dir ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/_/
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]las kyi phyag rgya mnyam ldan pas/_/rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas/_/bde ba gsungs pas mngon sum du/_/'di 'dra'i bsgom pa gang gsungs pa/_/dang po'i las can sems can la/_/las kyi phyag rgya gang spangs nas/_/byang chub sems ni rab bstan pa/_/gzhan gyi
[\[10a.2\]]mtshon pas mi 'thob ste/_/dang po'i las pas rig bya ba/_/thog ma bar mtha' dri med pa/_/gnas te gzhan du nus ma yin/_/de lta'i de nyid mchog zhi ba/_/mkha' dbyings zhes byar gnas pa ni/_/rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor dang /_/yang dag rang bzhin gyis thob 'gyur/_/kun du
[\[10a.3\]]'gro ba de nyid ni/_/dang po'i las pas gzung ba'i phyir/_/mkha' dbyings pho brang bzang po ru/_/sgrub po mchog gis thob par 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'das mchog gang yin te/_/bde ba'i ngo bo dngos med pa/_/de ni phyag rgya la brten nas/_/rang gi rig pa'i ngo bor gnas/_/shes rab
[\[10a.4\]]thabs dag rnam bsgoms pas/_/de ltar de nyid shes byas la/_/chos 'byung mi 'gyur zhi ba nyid/_/ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas/_/ngo mtshar mchog gyur rdo rje can/_/de yi tshe na bsgrub par bya/_/rang lus thabs dang ldan pa'am/_/yang na las kyi phyag rgyas so/_/las
[\[10a.5\]]kyi phyag rgya'i pad+mar gnas/_/mtshon du med par gang gnas pa/_/gong dang gong du bsgom pa yis/_/zhi dpal rdo rje 'dzin par mtshan/_/de ni bdag gis thams cad bstan/_/gzhan yang bdag gis bstan par bya/_/las kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pas/_/de nyid ldan pas bsgom par
[\[10a.6\]]bya/_/phyag rgya med par lha rdzas nyid/_/de bzhin sgrub pos 'thob par 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i go 'phang mchog_/mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya/_/las kyi phyag rgya khro rgyu can/_/ye shes phyag rgya yang de bzhin/_/rnam rtog mang ba spang byas la/_/phyag rgya chen po rnam
[\[10a.7\]]bsgom bya/_/rnam par g.yeng ba kun 'byung ba'i/_/bud med phyag rgya rnam spangs la/_/rang lus thabs dang ldan pa yis/_/phyag rgya chen po bsten par bya/_/rang gi rigs pa'i lha rdzas de/_/phyag rgya chen po mchog tu dag_/tha mal lus la brten nas gnas/_/shes rab chung
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]bas mthong mi 'gyur/_/mi 'gyur ba yi rang lus de/_/mchog gcig gis ni shes par 'gyur/_/bla ma'i bka' drin gnang ba la/_/ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas/_/rtswa shing 'khri shing la sogs la/_/kun du gnas par 'gyur ba yang /_/mi ni thabs dang bral ba yis/_/me ni
[\[10b.2\]]mthong bar 'gyur ma yin/_/thabs dang bral na nam du yang /_/lha rdzas yon tan kun 'byung ba/_/gnyug ma'i lus la gnas na yang /_/shes rab de bzhin mthong mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar bur shing khu ba dang /_/til la til mar ji bzhin pa/_/de bzhin lus la thams cad du/_/
[\[10b.3\]]shes rab pha rol phyin pa gnas/_/lha rdzas mchog de thams cad la/_/rnam par gnas par shes par bya/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis skyed byed pa/_/shes rab lha mo bla na med/_/khams gsum ma lus pa 'di dag_/gang gis thams cad gsal byed pa/_/mya ngan 'das pa gnas
[\[10b.4\]]dngos kyi/_/thog ma bar mtha' rnam par mdzad/_/de ltar shes nas 'bad pa yis/_/shes rab pha rol phyin zhi ba/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyi/_/dbang phyug mchog gis khyab par 'gyur/_/gang zhig sems la 'dod gyur pa/_/de ni de nas bsgom par bya/_/
[\[10b.5\]]thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub rab tu stsol/_/de dang lhan cig tshol byed pas/_/de nyid bdag gis rtag tu rig_/nyin dang mtshan du bsgom 'gyur na/_/'di ni thob 'gyur the tshom med/_/smyon pa'i gzugs la brten nas ni/_/gsal por skye bos
[\[10b.6\]]smod byed cing /_/thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis/_/byang chub yangs pa bsgom par bya/_/mchog tu mya ngan 'das gsungs pa/_/dag cing rang bzhin dri ma med/_/rang lus de nyid blo ldan gyis/_/de dang ldan pa bsgom par bya/_/dngos grub kun sbyin grub pa'i thabs/_/phung po
[\[10b.7\]]lnga yi bdag lus nyid/_/ji ltar gsang ba gnas gyur pa/_/de nas yang dag bshad par bya/_/phyag rgya chen po rtogs byas pas/_/dpa' bo ji ltar rdzogs 'gyur ba/_/mchog tu gyur ba rang gi lus/_/shin tu gsang ba dag gis bshad/_/blo ldan dngos po mi bsgom zhing /_/
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]dngos med pha rol ring du spangs/_/gcig gis rtag par 'dzin gyur cing /_/gzhan dag gis ni stong nyid du'o/_/rtag dang chad pa'i sbyor ba las/_/mchog tu 'dzin pa zag pa gang /_/ye shes ci zhig 'byung 'gyur ba/_/thog ma dbus mtha' dri ma med/_/gtso bo
[\[11a.2\]]rtag pa mchog tu zhi/_/rgyu dang dpe ni rnam spangs pa/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/_/rtag tu 'byung zhing 'gyur ba med/_/mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa nyid/_/sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/_/der gnas sgom dang ldan gyur pas/_/sangs rgyas kyi yang spyod
[\[11a.3\]]yul min/_/der mi bgrod dang bgrod bya med/_/bgrod par 'gyur ba 'ga' yang med/_/sgom dang bsgom bya sgom pa po/_/don dam par na yod ma yin/_/dpe las 'das shing brjod du med/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/_/mtshan ma med cing rdul dang bral/_/mya
[\[11a.4\]]ngan 'das zhes de la bshad/_/gang la mchog ces brjod bya ste/_/phyag rgya chen po mngon par gnas/_/lha rdzas longs spyod grol ster ba/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i go 'phang mchog_/bzang po'i gnas de sems can la/_/skal pa ji bzhin rab tu bstan/_/gcig nyid
[\[11a.5\]]gnyis su rnam par 'gyur/_/bsam pa'i dbye bas mchog nyid de/_/lha rdzas mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs/_/dag cing rang bzhin dri ma med/_/bud med skye bo sogs gzugs kyis/_/thams cad du ni rnam par gnas/_/dbang po las 'das zhi ba gang /_/brjod med kun du
[\[11a.6\]]'gro ba mchog_/'phel zhing 'grib las rnam grol ba/_/dpal ldan bde chen zhes brjod pa/_/cung zad rdzas su 'du shes gang /_/thams cad de las kun du 'byung /_/khams gsum pa yi lam bzang po/_/kun du de ni rnam par gnas/_/de ni dngos grub sa bon te/_/dngos
[\[11a.7\]]grub rnams kyi go 'phang mchog_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas mchog ste/_/bde ba can zhes mngon par brjod/_/lha dang lha min mir bcas pa/_/thams cad 'di las nges par 'byung /_/khams gsum ma lus pa 'di dag_/thams cad bde ba nyid du gnas/_/gang gis
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]gzugs ni shes min zhing /_/gang zhig tshig dang blo spangs la/_/sgra dang dri dang ro las 'das/_/blo yi yul las gang 'das pa/_/de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa/_/mchog tu bde ba'i gzugs gang zhig_/rang gi dbang gis 'jug 'gyur ba/_/chos kyi 'khor lo
[\[11b.2\]]bskor bar 'gyur/_/gsang sngags bye ba grangs med kyang /_/de las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bden pa gsung ba'i lung gis 'ga'/_/bden par gyur pa'i rim ston pa'i/_/bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/_/de ltar de des shes byas la/_/thabs gang gis ni de yi
[\[11b.3\]]dngos/_/mchog tu brjod med gang thob pa/_/blo ldan de nyid rang lus la/_/sngags pa'i de nyid bsgrub par bya/_/dngos po med pa dang bsres la/_/rtse gcig sems dang ldan pa yis/_/thabs bzang po dang ldan byas nas/_/yang dang yang du ngal bar bya/_/gnyis pa thams cad
[\[11b.4\]]rnam spangs pas/_/dus mi ring bar 'grub par 'gyur/_/shin tu sbas pa'i rab sbyin dang /_/rig pa yi ni gang shes dang /_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan pa'i/_/dag pa'i bdag nyid gang bsgom bya/_/gsang ba grub pa la gnas pa'i/_/dngos grub des ni gdon mi za/_/
[\[11b.5\]]las kyi phyag rgya ldan pa'am/_/yang na phyag rgya chen po yi/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs gyur pa/_/'di ni chos nyid mchog yin no/_/snying po'i ye shes gcig bsdus pa/_/ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bdag med gnas 'di ma gtogs pa'i/_/rnam dag dngos grub
[\[11b.6\]]gzhan dag med/_/rnam par mi rtog dmigs med pa/_/gang las sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur ba'i/_/shes rab lha mo bla na med/_/'di ni pha rol zhes byar brjod/_/gal te shes nas bsgoms gyur na/_/sems can kun gyi grol ster 'gyur/_/sngar bstan cho ga'i rim pa yis/_/
[\[11b.7\]]dag pa'i de nyid gang bsgoms pa/_/rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam dag pas/_/bdag nyid rdo rje kun las skyes/_/mtshan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/_/tha mal pa yi lus spangs nas/_/lha rdzas nga rgyal ldan yid kyis/_/thabs dang yang dag
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]ldan pa dang /_/ting 'dzin mchog la rnam gnas nas/_/pad+ma rdo rje'i tshig bzhin du/_/de ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/_/gang zhig phyag rgya che ldan pas/_/bde ba chen po myong gyur pa/_/ye shes bdud rtsi mchog bzang po/_/de ni brjod par nus pa yin/_/rang
[\[12a.2\]]gi rig pa'i de nyid de/_/gzhan gyis brjod par nus mi 'gyur/_/gus dang bsgom pas rtogs 'gyur gyi/_/de ni gzhan du rtogs mi nus/_/de nyid shes nas nyin mtshan du/_/gus pas bsgom par bya ba yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i go 'phang mchog_/bde ba zhi ba bla
[\[12a.3\]]med der/_/der ni gus pa'i stobs nyid dang /_/bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis gang sprul pa/_/der ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs/_/kun dga' las byung ci yang mchog_/spro zhing sdud par byed pa can/_/gsal por yud kyis byung gyur pa/_/sa 'og sa bla sa steng 'di/_/rgyu
[\[12a.4\]]dang rgyu min snang bar byed/_/de nyid bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ni/_/thabs dang shes rab dngos zhi ba/_/nyon mongs kun las rnam grol zhing /_/mtshan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan pa/_/stong nyid ye shes las byung zhes/_/gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba nyid/_/rnam pa kun du mchog ldan zhing /_/gzung dang 'dzin pa
[\[12a.5\]]rnam par spangs/_/rnam dag ye shes sgyu ma'i dngos/_/gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med/_/sgra dang dri dang ro las 'das/_/de bzhin reg pa rnam par spangs/_/ting 'dzin ye shes mig gnyis kyis/_/mchog gcig pu de mthong bar 'gyur/_/bzang po grib ma'i sgyu 'dra ba/_/
[\[12a.6\]]'du byed bzang po dang ldan pa/_/me yis thag pa bsregs pa bzhin/_/nyon mongs 'ching ba las grol ba/_/rnam pa sna tshogs lus rnams dang /_/ye shes rlabs kyis 'phrin las spro/_/dbang po'i gzhu dang 'dra ba'i sku/_/de nyid bsgoms pas thob par 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor
[\[12a.7\]]bsgom pa'i nus pa dang /_/dam tshig rnams ni bskyang byas bas/_/rgyal ba yis kyang brjod med pa'i/_/de 'dra'i gzugs ni thob par 'gyur/_/gang du lus ngag sems med pa'i/_/gnas gang kun 'gro mchog gyur pa/_/der ni yang dag bsten dbang gis/_/rang bzhin
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]bsgom par gyur la ltos/_/e ma ho ngo mtshar byed pa'o/_/e ma ho zhi ba dbang po las/_/e ma ho mchog tu zhi ba nyid/_/byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul yin/_/lha yi rnal 'byor mchog nyid kyi/_/rim gyis 'di 'dra thob par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas go 'phang bsgrub pa'i
[\[12b.2\]]phyir/_/de nas spyod pa spyad par bya/_/nyon mongs kun nas bral ba'i gnas/_/rjod dang brjod bya rnam spangs la/_/'bad pa nyid kyis mngon sum du/_/sgrub pa pos ni yang dang yang /_/brtan pa'i sems kyis nges par yang /_/gsang ba'i spyod pa spyad par bya/_/rdzogs
[\[12b.3\]]pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs la/_/lha rdzas gar dang dgod sogs kyis/_/ji ltar skyo ba mi skye bar/_/sangs rgyas spyod pa la mos pas/_/brtul zhugs can gyis gsang ba spyad/_/brtul zhugs dang ldan der gnas nas/_/der gtad
[\[12b.4\]]bsgom pa dang ldan pas/_/nyon mongs thams cad mthar byas la/_/go 'phang mchog ni bsgrub par bya/_/rgyun du mchog tu gsang ba ste/_/bla ma'i zhal la rab gnas pas/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub bzang ster ba/_/de ni thams cad bdag gis bshad/_/don dam pa'i
[\[12b.5\]]yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi dam pa'i don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las mngon par byang chub par bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//dang po'i las can sems can gyis/_/bskyed pa'i
[\[12b.6\]]rim pa bsgom pa nyid/_/cung zhig rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid can/_/de nas da ni bshad par bya/_/dpal ldan 'dus par yongs gsal bar/_/'gro ba'i mgon pos gang gsungs pa/_/gong ma gong ma'i lam nyid kyis/_/bsgom par bya ba bzhi po nyid/_/dang po yi ge
[\[12b.7\]]dgod par bya/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pa/_/sgrub po'i dbang pos bsgom bya ba/_/gnyis pa rang gi rang bzhin nyid/_/gsum pa bzang po mchog gyur pa/_/ye shes phyag rgya rnam par bsgom/_/bzhi pa gong mar gang gsungs pa/_/phyag rgya chen por rnam par bsgom/_/
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]de ltar de nyid bzhi po ni/_/'di dag la ni yang dag gnas/_/bsgom pa dag gis gang bstan pa/_/de dag bdag gis so sor bshad/_/yi ge dgod pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/bsgom par bya ba gang gsungs pa/_/sems can dang po'i las can rnams/_/gzhug par bya
[\[13a.2\]]phyir gang gsungs pa/_/ji lta ba bzhin rnam gnas pa/_/dang po re zhig bstan par bya/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lam nyid du/_/gcig nyid rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur/_/mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yi/_/ye shes mchog tu dge ba nyid/_/ji ltar bstan par shes gyur nas/_/rtag
[\[13a.3\]]tu gnas de 'dir bshad bya/_/gong ma gong ma'i rim nyid kyis/_/thugs kyi rdo rje gang gsungs pa/_/yi ge dgod pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid pa/_/bzang po nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can/_/kun rtog thams cad spangs pa yi/_/kun 'gro'i ye shes rnam
[\[13a.4\]]dag pa/_/thog ma bar mtha' dri ma med/_/chos rnams kyi ni ngo bo gang /_/so so'i gzugs su gang gnas pa/_/bdag med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/'bad pa nyid kyis so sor brtag_/spros pa thams cad las grol ba'i/_/gzugs gang mchog ni zhi ba
[\[13a.5\]]nyid/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo shes/_/ye shes 'di la 'di rab grags/_/gnas bzang po der gnas nas ni/_/nyon mongs thams cad rnam spangs la/_/sems can rnams kyi don bya gang /_/gzugs kyi mchog nyid dmigs par bya/_/thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis/_/
[\[13a.6\]]shes rab dang ni bcas par gzugs/_/gsal po'i rnam par 'byung 'gyur ba/_/mtshan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/_/gzugs med mchog tu zhi ba nyid/_/dang zhing skyon bral dri ma med/_/phyag rgya chen por rjes
[\[13a.7\]]rig bya/_/gzugs de las ni 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de yi gzugs brnyan ltar byed pa/_/sgyu ma'i rjes sgrub bzang po gang /_/rnal 'byor phyag rgya gzugs ldan pa'i/_/dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/gzugs brnyan yid kyi rang bzhin nyid/_/yon tan mtha' med
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]'byung 'gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi mkhyen pa'i/_/dpal ldan me long ming can du/_/ye shes de la brjod par bya/_/dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du/_/der ni 'gog pa'i ye shes gang /_/de yi rang bzhin rnal 'byor ldan/_/mnyam nyid ye shes zhes brjod do/_/
[\[13b.2\]]rgyas pa can zhes bya ba gang /_/lha rdzas bud med dkyil 'khor ro/_/'bad pas so sor rtogs gyur pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun gyi gnas/_/bdag med gnas kyi rnal 'byor pa/_/dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin can/_/lha rdzas nam mkha'i khams kyi gnas/_/sangs
[\[13b.3\]]rgyas kun gyi pho brang mchog_/phra mo'i rnal 'byor sbyor gcig pas/_/ji srid de la rtogs gyur pas/_/rtogs pa cung zhig bskul gyur pa/_/de srid de ni mthong bar gyur/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dag_/srid gsum gnas na gang gnas pa/_/gang zhig gnas pa
[\[13b.4\]]de dag kun/_/til gyi gong bu bzhin 'dir mthong /_/gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/_/de bzhin gshegs pas yongs gang ba/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'od chen po/_/bzang po de ni mthong gyur nas/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gnas bzang por/_/rnal 'byor 'di ni brtag par
[\[13b.5\]]bya/_/der ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun/_/da ltar bzhugs dang gang 'das dang /_/gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag_/de dag kun gyi gnas mchog ni/_/dag cing dang ba dri med de/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod/_/ye shes de ni mdor bsdus na/_/so sor rtog pa zhes
[\[13b.6\]]byar brjod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang du/_/'bad pas so sor rtogs pa nyid/_/de yi phyir na nyams len pa/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i rnam 'phrul pas/_/lha yi rnal 'byor kun 'gengs shing /_/mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyi/_/sa la sogs pa'i rim pa yis/_/byang
[\[13b.7\]]chub sems ni yang dag spro/_/gang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor ni/_/der ni nges par bsgrub par bya/_/rtag dang mi bskyod rin chen che/_/rigs la sogs par gang gnas pa/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/rig ma'i skyes bu bsgom par bya/_/bzang po'i rgyan dang yang dag
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]ldan/_/phyag rgya chen po rjes rig pa/_/rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyis/_/rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa'i/_/ye shes rlabs kyi phreng ba spros/_/bya ba nan tan ye shes zhes/_/mchog tu gyur pa de la brjod/_/gang la rgyal
[\[14a.2\]]ba rnams 'byung ba/_/gang du phyag rgya byin brlabs pas/_/ting 'dzin lnga po 'dir gnas pas/_/gang zhig yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas/_/mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis/_/ye shes zhes ni 'di rab grags/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas par/_/de yi khyad par brjod pa yin/_/
[\[14a.3\]]lha dgod rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/_/ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas/_/khams drug pa dag mnyam ldan pa'i/_/rgyud las gsungs pa'i 'khor los sgyur/_/rim gyis yum gyur bzhi po dang /_/khro bo sems dpa' de dang mtshungs/_/'khor bcas pa yi byang chub sems/_/bcu
[\[14a.4\]]drug dag dang mnyam ldan pa'i/_/mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_/de bzhin dpe byad brgyad cur ldan/_/mngon par byang chub rnam lnga zhes/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa yin/_/rtag dang mi bskyod rin chen gyi/_/rigs la sogs pa yang dag gnas/_/de ltar rnam pa
[\[14a.5\]]sna tshogs pa'i/_/rnam par rtog pas rgyas gang la/_/dang po'i las can sems can gyis/_/bsgom par bya ba gsungs pa yin/_/'khor lo'i rim par bsgom bcas pa/_/'di ni phyi rol zhes bshad de/_/yi ge dgod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/dang po
[\[14a.6\]]nyid du gang gnas pa'o/_/sems can dang po'i las can la/_/las kyi phyag rgya bsgom pa yis/_/rnam par gnas pa'i sar gnas gang /_/gong ma mchog gi go 'phang yin/_/byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas bsgoms te/_/de nyid mchod pa rab tu brtag_/_
[\[14a.7\]]de nyid dpal ldan 'dus par ni/_/rdo rje 'dzin pas mchog tu gsungs/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa nyung ldan pas/_/rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas/_/'di ni bsgom pa gnyis pa ste/_/rang gi ngo bo yin zhes grags/_/gsum pa de ni bstan pa ste/_/nang gi go 'phang bsgom pa yin/_/rnam pa kun
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]ni mchog ldan pa'i/_/ye shes phyag rgya rab brtags pa'o/_/bzhi pa gong na med pa'i rgyu/_/mngon par byang chub byed pa po/_/phyag rgya chen po rnam bsgom pa/_/de yi gong na gzhan med pa'o/_/dbang po kun las rnam grol zhing /_/'byung ba'i spyod pa sbas gyur pa/_/
[\[14b.2\]]zhi zhing grub pa myur ster la/_/bla ma'i zhal las rab gnas pa'o/_/gcig min du ma yin zhing /_/rlabs med snang ba med pa dang /_/thams cad kyi ni bde gnas pa/_/mchog tu dga' ba byed pa po/_/rang sems tsam du shes par bya/_/nyon mongs tshogs ni 'gag 'gyur
[\[14b.3\]]zhing /_/dam pa'i shes rab 'gyur ba'i lus/_/de ltar rgyud kyi rim shes nas/_/lha yi rnal 'byor mchog nyid dang /_/gong ma gong ma'i lam nyid kyis/_/drag po min pas gang mos pa/_/de dag thams cad nges btang la/_/rim pa bzhin du bsgom par bya/_/phyag rgya chen por
[\[14b.4\]]'bad pa yis/_/sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya/_/grub pa thams cad rab sbyin zhing /_/thabs kyi mchog dang bcas pa ni/_/de dag bsgom pa dang ldan na/_/tshe 'di nyid la grub par 'gyur/_/gang zhig sems ni bla med pas/_/skye ba med pa gang rtogs pa/_/de yi dngos
[\[14b.5\]]med shes rab ste/_/thabs nyid rab tu bskul ba nyid/_/de ltar de nyid shes pa la/_/phyag rgya chen po rnam par bsgom/_/de nas thabs dang bcas gyur bas/_/gang 'dod pa yi brtul zhugs bya/_/sangs rgyas gos med zhi ba 'am/_/de bzhin nor gyi bdag po 'am/_/yang na brtul
[\[14b.6\]]zhugs chen po 'am/_/yang na sems la 'dod pa'o/_/bshad par gyur pa shes byas la/_/brtul zhugs ma yin shes pa nyid/_/blo dang ldan pas shes bya ba/_/rgyud las gzhan dag bshad pa yi/_/dor ba'i brtul zhugs kun mi bya/_/mchog tu gyur pa yin par 'dod/_/de las yid
[\[14b.7\]]la gang 'dod pa/_/spyad pa med par spyad par bya/_/dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rjes su 'brangs gyur pa/_/lam mchog dpe med 'bad pas shes byas la/_/brtan pa'i blo yis dag pa de nyid gcig_/phyi rol dri ma ma lus spangs byas nas/_/bde ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan gnyug ma'i gzugs/_/
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]'du 'dzi dri ma spangs la bsgom par bya/_/ye shes rang bzhin rjes 'brel nyin mtshan du/_/sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur gyur bstan pa nyid/_/dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan dga' ba'i sems/_/rtag tu byang chub la bzhugs bsgom pa'i sems 'brel pa/_/dri ma ma lus zad par gyur
[\[15a.2\]]pa yis/_/'khor ba'i 'ching ba rnams ni spang bar bya/_/bde ba'i go 'phang mchog gyur brtan pa'i sems kyis bsgom/_/rtag tu goms par byas pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_/bdag nyid de nyid rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/_/dri ma'i rab rib spangs dag mthong ba bzang /_/gcig tu gsang ba'i sa
[\[15a.3\]]phyogs yon tan brgya yi gzhir gyur ri 'am khyim stong ngam/_/skyed tshal nyid dang brag phug dur khrod dag gam sa phug nyams dga' 'am/_/de ltar dri med byas pa'i sa phyogs dag tu bzang po mtshon cing bzung /_/yul gyi bde ba skyed byed de nyid rin chen rdo rje can gyis 'du 'dzi spangs la bsgom/_/
[\[15a.4\]]rnal 'byor pa ni thams cad kyang /_/de nyid lam la rab chags pas/_/thabs dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/de ni 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lam gyis ni/_/gzhan dag tu yang 'gyur ba yin/_/skye ba du ma dag gis kyang /_/'dir ni gcig gis 'byung bar
[\[15a.5\]]'gyur/_/de ltar the tshom med shes nas/_/shes rab thabs kyis bsgom pa yis/_/phyi rol rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/_/bya ba'i bye brag yongs spangs la/_/dpal ldan 'dus pa'i lam 'bras bcas/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub rab ster ba/_/thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis/_/
[\[15a.6\]]blo ldan gsang ba sgrub par spyad/_/yul dang dus dang gza' rnams dang /_/rgyu skar phyi rol dkyil 'khor rnams/_/med pa'i gsang ba rdo rje can/_/sgrub pa'i thabs 'di bshad par bya/_/nges par brtul zhugs gso sbyong sogs/_/yi ge brjod pas bsgom pa yin/_/'di
[\[15a.7\]]ltar dngos grub gang brtags pa/_/spyod pa dka' bas brtags pa yin/_/yi ge brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/kha dog dbye bas mtshon bya ba/_/sems can kun gyi bsam dbang gis/_/dpal ldan gsang bar gang gsungs pa/_/dkyil 'khor dag ni gang gsungs pa/_/rigs
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]nyid so sor so so dang /_/phyag rgya'i dbye ba sna tshogs dang /_/de bzhin sngags kyi dbye ba rnams/_/mchod dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_/rigs kyi dbye ba du ma nyid/_/ting 'dzin dbye ba phye ba yis/_/lha rnams su ni brtags pa dang /_/dus nges pa yi bye brag rnams/_/
[\[15b.2\]]bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa yi/_/spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang /_/sbyor ba du ma nyid dag ni/_/'dod chags la sogs dri ma rnams/_/sna tshogs gzugs kyis gang gnas pa/_/'khor bar rab tu 'ching byed pa'i/_/khams gsum pa yis zhwabastan pa'i lam/_/de kun dngos po med
[\[15b.3\]]gyur ba'i/_/ye shes mchog gi rnam 'phrul yin/_/rtog med rnam par dag pa ni/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu kun du song /_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/de bzhin gzhan yang yod ma yin/_/dang po'i rnal 'byor ngo bo yis/_/ji srid kun la rnam par spyod/_/chos dang chos min
[\[15b.4\]]mtshan nyid kyis/_/thams cad mngon du brtags pa can/_/bdag med gnas kyi sbyor ba yis/_/ji srid brtan par ma brtags pa'o/_/rnam par mi rtog gnas pa med/_/dag cing rang bzhin dri ma med/_/srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug pa/_/khams gsum 'di dag thams cad nyid/_/
[\[15b.5\]]lam gyis so sor brtags byas nas/_/phung po'i bden pa yod ma yin/_/su zhig gis ni so sor rtogs/_/'dir ni gang la brtag par bya/_/'bad pas de nyid de kho na/_/ji srid rab tu brtag byas pa/_/de srid thams cad 'od gsal te/_/rnam dag rang bzhin dri ma med/_/dngos
[\[15b.6\]]dang dngos med las grol zhing /_/spros pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang rtogs min na/_/skye bo gzhan gyis smos ci dgos/_/rtag dang chad pa las grol zhing /_/kun 'gro mchog tu zhi ba nyid/_/dngos med snang ba med pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpas phyag byas pa'o/_/
[\[15b.7\]]yon tan med cing nga rgyal med/_/mtshan ma med cing sgrib pa med/_/'grib dang 'phel las rnam grol ba/_/ngag gi spyod yul dag las 'das/_/de las 'gro dang 'ong ba dang /_/'dir ni 'gro ba po 'ga' med/_/bsgom dang sgom pa bsgom bya dag_/don dam par na yod ma
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]yin/_/de nyid mchog gyur gcig pu nyid/_/byang chub sems zhes rab tu brjod/_/dbye ba sna tshogs bsam mi khyab/_/bye ba snyed du rab rgyas pa/_/bzang po kun 'gro rnam dag ste/_/ming gcig nyid kyis gnas pa min/_/sems can bsam pa'i bye brag gis/_/
[\[16a.2\]]khams gsum kun du rab tu khyab/_/zhi ba rnams kyis de nyid mchog_/rig byed smra ba tshangs pa zer/_/sangs rgyas pa rnams byang chub mchog_/gos med pa rnams srog ces zer/_/grangs can rig pa rnams la sogs/_/dbye ba gang zhig rnam brtags pa/_/de dag brjod par
[\[16a.3\]]ga la nus/_/sna tshogs nyid la khyab gnas nas/_/rnam pa sna tshogs ngo bo rnams/_/des ni smra bar nus ma yin/_/bzang po'i dbye bas gang gnas pa/_/yang dag mtha' nyid du mar bstan/_/kun mkhyen ye shes mi rtogs pa/_/rdo rje can mchog gang yin te/_/khams gsum
[\[16a.4\]]ma lus 'di dag ni/_/thams cad 'di las kun du 'byung /_/zhi zhing dag pa'i gnas gang de/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa/_/brjod med kun 'gro'i gnas yin te/_/'di kun de yi rnam 'phrul yin/_/cung zad dngos grub mtshan nyid gang /_/thams cad de la rnam par
[\[16a.5\]]gnas/_/spros pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bskor/_/khams gsum rnam dag 'di thams cad/_/sa bon shes rab las byung kun/_/mtshan ma med cing mchog tu zhi/_/ye shes sgyu ma'i rjes 'jug pa/_/mang po dag ni gcig pa nyid/_/ji srid
[\[16a.6\]]yod pa'i bud shing kun/_/stong pa'i me yis ma bsregs par/_/sgrub pa po yis ji ltar mthong /_/lta ba'i bud shing phung po rnams/_/stong nyid me yis bsreg byas nas/_/'dir ni mnyam nyid la gnas na/_/de bzhin yid kyi me yang 'gag_/bsam gtan shes rab
[\[16a.7\]]mig sman gyis/_/ji srid bsku bar ma byas pa/_/de srid lta ngan rab rib rnams/_/dri ma med par ji ltar 'gyur/_/dngos po brtan dang g.yo ba kun/_/'bad pas de ltar rnam sbyangs nas/_/bdag med go 'phang la gnas la/_/de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya/_/bdag
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]gis gong du gang smras pa'i/_/lha yi rnal 'byor shes byas la/_/de ni 'bad pas bsgom byas na/_/'di ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/_/sangs rgyas nges par sgrub par byed pa yi/_/cho ga rkang gnyis mchog gis nges par gang bstan pa/_/spyod pa du mas mdzes shing yid du
[\[16b.2\]]'ong bar gyur pa'i rgyud du gsal/_/de srid de ni ma bsten yon tan ldan pa'i dngos grub 'gyur bar mi 'gyur ba/_/shes nas mkhas pa rnams kyis spyod pa dang ldan cho ga bzhin du bsgrub pa brtsam/_/don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal
[\[16b.3\]]gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las mngon par byang chub pa lnga bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//dpal ldan gsang ba rdo rje 'dzin/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa'i thabs/_/yang dag spyod pa sbas gyur pa/_/de nas yang dag
[\[16b.4\]]bshad par bya/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/rnam par g.yeng ba'i dgra gsod cing /_/dge bzang gsang ba'i sgrub thabs kyis/_/rol mo'i las kyis bsgrub par bya/_/dbang bskur ba ni mchog bzang po/_/dpal ldan 'dus par rjes 'gro bas/_/phyag rgya chen po'i
[\[16b.5\]]dbang bskur nas/_/bzang po dngos grub rab tu bsgrub/_/de bzhin 'dod chags rab gnas nas/_/lha'i rnal 'byor der gnas pas/_/gsang ba grub par rab gnas na/_/sgrub po gang phyir 'grub par 'gyur/_/bzang po ye shes gom sa byas shing /_/spyod pa thams
[\[16b.6\]]cad rnam spangs nas/_/gnyis pa thams cad las grol bas/_/gang du 'dod pa de ru gnas/_/sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/_/gsang ba grub pa mdor bsdus nas/_/dngos grub rnams kyi go 'phang mchog_/de ni bdag gis bshad par bya/_/gang zhig skye ba du ma yis/_/
[\[16b.7\]]dngos grub thob par 'dod 'gyur ba/_/des ni gsang ba'i brtul zhugs kyis/_/gnyis pa thams cad spang bar bya/_/dge ba thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyud/_/'dus pa zhes bya'i dbang bskur bas/_/bzang po dngos grub sbyin byed pa'i/_/phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur bas/_/
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]de nas rang 'dod la gnas shing /_/dang po'i rnal 'byor gcig gtad pas/_/bla ma'i zhal las byung ba yi/_/rnal 'byor rin chen goms par bya/_/dpal ldan bde ba'i mgon po yis/_/mchog tu gsang zhing sbas pa yi/_/shin tu sbas pa'i dbang
[\[17a.2\]]bskur ba/_/de nas yang dag bshad par bya/_/gzugs bzang yon tan 'byung 'gyur ba/_/phyag rgya 'bad pas rnyed gyur nas/_/rgyud kyi spyod pa dang ldan pas/_/slob dpon la ni dbul bar bya/_/phyag rgyar bcas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin/_/gus pas 'o ma mar me dang /_/dri
[\[17a.3\]]dang phreng ba rgyan chen gyis/_/de nas blo dang ldan pas mchod/_/de la gus par mchod bya zhing /_/blo dang ldan pas cho ga bzhin/_/bla ma phyag rgyar ldan mthong nas/_/rtog pa'i cho ga'i rim pa bzhin/_/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ni/_/sa la rab tu btsugs byas la/_/bstod pa'i
[\[17a.4\]]rgyal pos rdo rje can/_/cho ga bzhin du brjod par bya/_/kun mkhyen sa kun dbang phyug pa/_/kun gyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i bdag_/thugs kyi bdag po dpa' bo che/_/dpa' bo gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/'byung po kun bdag bdag nyid gnas/_/rdo rje ye shes gsum 'byung ba/_/
[\[17a.5\]]rdo rje hUM mdzad hUM mdzad pa/_/nyon mongs mthar mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod/_/sangs rgyas kun mchog phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i sku/_/chos bdag med pa las byung ba/_/ye shes bdud rtsi phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/kun mkhyen ye shes phung po can/_/srid
[\[17a.6\]]pa'i 'khor lo rnam sbyong ba/_/dpal chen ye shes chen po pa/_/gzi brjid chen po phyag 'tshal bstod/_/phyag chen dpa' bo chen po ste/_/stobs chen mchod pa chen po pa/_/bdud mthar byed pa dpa' chen po/_/dpa' bo dbang phyug phyag 'tshal bstod/_/skye dang gnas dang
[\[17a.7\]]sdud pa yi/_/byed pa por 'gyur 'gro ba'i gtso/_/dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin nyid/_/ngo mtshar mchog gyur phyag 'tshal bstod/_/ye shes rnam shes zhes bya ba'i/_/lam du 'jug 'gyur phyag 'tshal bstod/_/'gro ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/pad+ma las
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]byung phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/_/cho ga bzhin du gsol btab nas/_/sems can kun la phan 'dod pas/_/snyan pa'i tshig ni brjod par bya/_/khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/_/ye shes bla med bya ba shes/_/de ltar dbang bskur rin chen
[\[17b.2\]]gyis/_/mgon pos bdag ni dbang bskur mdzod/_/dpal ldan bde ba'i mgon po yis/_/dpal ldan chos kyi rdo rje la/_/gsang ba'i de nyid bstan pa ltar/_/mgon pos de bzhin bka' drin gsol/_/sdug bsngal kun gyi gnas gyur pa/_/dmyal
[\[17b.3\]]ba nas ni gtso bos drongs/_/sdug bsngal thams cad mthar mdzad pa/_/mgon med bdag la thugs rje mdzod/_/khyod zhabs pad+ma spangs nas ni/_/gtso bo gzhan la skyabs ma mchis/_/'gro ba'i dpa' bo thub chen gyis/_/de phyir sangs rgyas mchog gnang mdzod/_/gsol
[\[17b.4\]]ba 'debs pa'i cho ga mchog_/bzang po de ltar thos gyur nas/_/snying rje slob ma la bskyed de/_/bla ma dpal ldan yon tan mtshos/_/bzhin ni rab tu dad gyur pas/_/rjes su brtse phyir rab dga' bas/_/gsang zhing mchog tu gsang gyur pas/_/dam tshig de nas thob par bya/_/
[\[17b.5\]]bu yis srog chags gsad par bya/_/brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya/_/ma byin par yang blang bar bya/_/gzhan gyi chung ma bsten par bya/_/'di ni cho ga mdor bsdus pa'i/_/phyag rgya chen po nges bsten pas/_/'di ni rtag tu bya ba yin/_/dam tshig bzhi po 'di nyid ni/_/
[\[17b.6\]]bzang po khyod kyis rtag tu bsten/_/de ltar dam tshig thos gyur nas/_/bzang po dngos grub kun ster ba/_/phyag rgya dang ni ldan gyur pa'i/_/slob dpon thugs rje ldan pa yis/_/rdo rje pad+ma snyoms 'jug cing /_/yang dag rab sbyin la gnas nas/_/lha yi rnal 'byor bskyed gyur
[\[17b.7\]]pas/_/ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas/_/'bad pas gsung gi rdo rje yis/_/pad+ma las byung blang bar bya/_/khrag dang khu ba rnams bsres la/_/slob dpon mchog gis mchod pa'i phyir/_/mi yi thod par blugs nas ni/_/bshang gci rdo rje chur ldan pas/_/de nas
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]slob ma bkug byas la/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi byin brlabs nas/_/gnyug ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas/_/dam tshig de ni sbyin par bya/_/dngos grub kun gyi gnas gyur cing /_/sangs rgyas byin brlabs lam gyur pas/_/rdo rje slob ma de nyid rig_/chogs de
[\[18a.2\]]ltar gtad byas pas/_/rang gi phyag rgya dam tshig ni/_/bzang ldan rgyud nas gsungs pa nyid/_/shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma/_/rtag tu byang chub sems la dga'/_/mA ma kI ltar yang dag pa/_/rab dga' gos ni rnam spangs ma/_/'di ni yang dag mchod byas nas/_/phyag
[\[18a.3\]]rgya'i pad+ma rnam gnas pa/_/sngon bzhin spyod pa'i slob ma ni/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa gnyis pa la/_/bkra shis brjod pa'i tshig gis ni/_/dbyangs ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/rnga yab rgyal mtshan gdugs la sogs/_/phreng ba tsan+dan la sogs mchod/_/phyag rgya'i dbang bskur rin chen gyis/_/
[\[18a.4\]]dam tshig la gnas brtan par gzhag_/khams gsum pa yi dbang bskur nas/_/slob mas thal mo sbyar byas la/_/de la rjes gnang sbyin bya ste/_/rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/_/chos kyi rdo rje gang 'dod par/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis/_/sangs rgyas
[\[18a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med/_/rdo rje sems dpas gsungs gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas mchog gis bshad par gyis/_/de ltar bstan pas slob ma la/_/yang dag par sbyin rab sbas dang /_/phyag rgya rin chen dbang bskur dang /_/rjes su gnang ba'i khyad par
[\[18a.6\]]gyis/_/rgyud kyi don la des byas nas/_/rdo rje theg pa'i rim 'byung ba'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bstan/_/sems can mchog gis bshad par gyis/_/'di lta bu yi dbang bskur bas/_/sgrub pa'i nges pa byas gyur nyid/_/de nyid bsgoms pas ngal gyur pas/_/
[\[18a.7\]]nges par mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges byas nas/_/lugs bcas rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/gnyis pa thams cad rnam spangs la/_/rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya bsgrub/_/lugs bcas rim pa de nyid nges pa'i blo ldan bsgom gyur rdo rje can/_/
