[\[18b.1\]]'dod pa'i yon tan bzang po rab dga'i yid can dngos grub don kun sgrub/_/mi yi tshe 'di nyid la 'grub 'gyur dpal ldan gsang grub la gnas nas/_/thabs bzang dag dang ldan pas brjod med mchog gyur go 'phang dam par 'gro/_/de ltar thams cad shes byas la/_/rim pa ji bzhin
[\[18b.2\]]gnas byas te/_/dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rim pa yis/_/ji ltar yang dag bstan pa ltar/_/de nas rang 'dod la rab gnas/_/gsang ba grub pa la gnas pa'i/_/dngos grub bzang po la 'bad pas/_/rigs kun la ni kun du spyod/_/yang na phyag rgya ldan pa yis/_/'dod pa'i
[\[18b.3\]]yon tan lnga ldan pas/_/rgod dang phreng la sogs bzang po/_/sems ni spro bar byed pa can/_/chags med gsang ba grub pa yis/_/go 'phang mchog ni bsgrub par bya/_/gnyis pa thams cad rnam spangs la/_/mchog tu dga' ba spel bar byed/_/don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang
[\[18b.4\]]ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par sdud par byed pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las sgrub pa phyag rgya chen po mngon par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//gsang ba'i spyod pa dge 'byung zhing /_/sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed la/_/
[\[18b.5\]]g.yeng ba'i sgra rnams zad byed pa/_/de nas yang dag bshad par bya/_/rkang pa brkyang ba spangs nas ni/_/'khor ba'i mngag gzhug dor nas su/_/rtag tu brtson dang ldan yid kyis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rtag tu bsgrub/_/rgod dang 'gyod dang gnyid la sogs/_/'bad pas rab tu spang
[\[18b.6\]]bar bya/_/gzhan du bskal pa bye ba ni/_/brgyar yang dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur/_/mgon po rdo rje slob dpon la/_/dngos po kun gyis phyag byas nas/_/rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i gzugs/_/gsang ba'i dngos grub yang dag sbyad/_/mtshan ma med cing snang ba med/_/rang gi
[\[18b.7\]]lus kyis thabs ldan pa'i/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog_/'bad pas rab tu bsgom par bya/_/'bad pas de ltar shes byas nas/_/rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun dbang po/_/sngags pas rang lus de nyid dang /_/rdo rje can dngos dbyer med pa'i/_/sna tshogs spyod pa gsal
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]gyur pa'i/_/gsang ba'i brtul zhugs bzang po spyod/_/thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis/_/mchog tu dga' bas yongs su dag_/rnam rtog yid las byung ba yi/_/'jig rten pa yis gang smad pa'i/_/de de gzugs su gnas byas la/_/gsang ba brtul
[\[19a.2\]]zhugs brtul zhugs can/_/ji ltar dpal ldan 'dus spyod pa'i/_/gsang ba zhes byar rab gnas pa/_/bshang gci zas su byas gyur na/_/sgrub pa'i snod du nges par 'gyur/_/dam tshig bzang po gzhan dag kyang /_/gsal byed la sogs khyad par dang /_/phyag rgya'i
[\[19a.3\]]'ching ba byin brlabs nas/_/rgyud nas gsungs pa'i bzang po kun/_/rdo rje'i tshig ni bzang po 'di/_/rdo rje thugs kyis gsungs pa yi/_/gsang ba'i spyod pa bla med pa/_/de ni bdag gis bshad par bya/_/rdo rje thugs kyis gang smras pa/_/de ni bdag gis bshad par bya/_/
[\[19a.4\]]sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/_/sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/_/mnyam gzhag mi smra gyur pa yis/_/smon pa'i gzugs su gzhag par bya/_/rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/_/sha za bzhin du kun du 'khyams/_/yang dang yang du ngal byas la/_/rdo rje sems
[\[19a.5\]]dpa' zhes bya bsgom/_/rtag tu bsgom dang ldan gyur ba'i/_/rigs pas rang gis rtogs byas la/_/grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer dang /_/tshal la sogs par 'khyam par bya/_/bzhi mdo dag dang dur khrod dang /_/lha rten pho brang khyad par du/_/dor ba rnying pas mgo bcings la/_/
[\[19a.6\]]tshogs bcas gnas su 'jug na yang /_/mchog tu bde ba bsgom par bya/_/'bad med rol mo brdung ba der/_/gar dang glu yis g.yeng bar bya/_/'o ma sgron mar ldan pa des/_/rgyal mtshan can gyi gnas 'jug bya/_/la lar dgod cing la lar smra/_/la lar glu yang blang
[\[19a.7\]]bar bya/_/la lar gar bya la lar brdab/_/la lar sna tshogs brjod bya ba/_/ji ltar skyo bar mi 'gyur ba/_/thams cad rim gyis rim gyis bya/_/skyo bar gyur nas sangs rgyas nyid/_/nam yang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten spyod pa rnam spangs la/_/rigs rnams
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]kun la kun du spyad/_/'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad du/_/gcig tu 'o ma goms byed par/_/ro la sogs pa'i dam tshig la/_/shin tu sred par mi bya'o/_/nga rgyal spang bar bya ba'i phyir/_/bdag nyid kyis kyang goms par bya/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i sems nyid ni/_/
[\[19b.2\]]ji ltar myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dam tshig thams cad sngon 'gro ba/_/sngags pas de ltar bya ba nyid/_/glu dang gar gyis dga' ba ni/_/ji ltar yid ni mi nyams par/_/ji srid mngon sum gyur gyi bar/_/de ltar de nyid la sems bzhag_/bdud rtsi lnga la gcig gus pas/_/
[\[19b.3\]]de nyid nges par byas nas ni/_/rnam par snang mdzad blang byas nas/_/smyon pa'i brtul zhugs kyis brgyan pa'i/_/smyon pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa/_/de ni rtag tu bsten par bya/_/sngags pas gsang ba'i spyod pa ni/_/cho ga bzhin du spyad par bya/_/srog chags kun lus las
[\[19b.4\]]byung ba'i/_/sgron ma rtag tu cho ga bzhin/_/lha yi dngos grub thob bya'i phyir/_/'bad pas bza' bar bya ba nyid/_/sbrang ma'i skyugs pa 'dres pa dang /_/bshang dang gci ba bsres byas nas/_/sgron ma lnga dang bsres pa yis/_/rtag tu bdag nyid mchod par bya/_/dngos med mchog
[\[19b.5\]]tu zhi ba yi/_/dpal ldan bde chen rdo rje can/_/rang rig tsam zhig skyed byas la/_/go 'phang mchog de bsgom par bya/_/sngags pas 'di ltar bsgom byas la/_/rang gi lus mchog bsgom par bya/_/smad par gyur pa ma lus pa/_/dpyad pa med par bya ba nyid/_/btsun
[\[19b.6\]]mo'i rang byung me tog ni/_/byang chub sems dang bcas gyur pa/_/blangs la gsung gi rdo rje can/_/bde ba chen po yang dag mchog_/glang po khyi rta rnga mo yi/_/sgron ma mi las byung ba dag_/sngags pas rtag tu bza' bya zhing /_/gzhan du bza' bar mi bya'o/_/de nyid
[\[19b.7\]]rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/_/gang zhig rtag tu goms byed pa/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i ting nge 'dzin/_/de ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/_/slang mo spyod par bya ba'i phyir/_/brtul zhugs can gyis snod mi gzung /_/grong pas zos shing bor ba yi/_/gyo dum la sogs der bza'
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]zhing /_/gong du bor zhing byin pa bza'/_/des ni gong du zos gyur nas/_/tshim par gyur nas de yang dor/_/de yi smad g.yogs dum bu yang /_/rnying zhing dum bur gyur pas bya/_/yang na mchog gi_/ gos can gyis/_/gang du 'dod par 'gro bar bya/_/til 'bru
[\[20a.2\]]tsam gyi dngos po yang /_/yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o/_/yongs su 'dzin las sdug bsngal 'byung /_/sdug bsngal gyis ni sems 'khor 'gyur/_/'khor bas sems ni zhum gyur te/_/zhum pas dngos grub nyams par 'gyur/_/dngos grub med na 'khor ba ste/_/
[\[20a.3\]]'khor bas dmyal ba sgrub par byed/_/dmyal bar nyon mongs sdug bsngal gyis/_/grangs med bskal par gnod par 'gyur/_/bzhin skams sdug bsngal gyur pa dang /_/gzhan gyi bran la sogs par skye/_/rnam dag legs par 'dod pa yi/_/skye ba slar yang thob mi 'gyur/_/
[\[20a.4\]]de ltar bdag gis bdag nyid kyis/_/gsang ba'i spyod pa rnam bsgoms nas/_/khams gsum rnam pa gcig gyur pa/_/rnam dag thabs bzang la gnas pas/_/rnam dag legs par 'dod pa yi/_/skye ba slar yang thob par 'gyur/_/gsang ba grub pa la gnas nas/_/de nas
[\[20a.5\]]seng ge bzhin du spyod/_/smyon pa'i gzugs 'dzin gyur pa yis/_/kun spyod thams cad rnam spangs la/_/gsang gsum dri med rnal 'byor gyis/_/bza' ba kun la spyad par bya/_/shing rdo sa yi rang bzhin gyi/_/lha rnams la yang phyag mi bya/_/lus nyid la ni mchod pa dang /_/
[\[20a.6\]]bla mar gus pas phyag bya'o/_/sa rdo'i rang bzhin mchod rten dang /_/glegs bam la sogs mi bya zhing /_/rmi lam du yang dkyil 'khor sogs/_/lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bya'o/_/theg pa gsum la zhugs rnams la/_/phyag la sogs pa mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dam par mi 'dzin
[\[20a.7\]]na/_/rnal 'byor pa gzhan smos ci dgos/_/bsgom la chags gyur sems kyis ni/_/ngag gi rtsod pa mi bya'o/_/dam tshig dag ni nyams par 'gyur/_/nyams pas yid ni g.yeng 'gyur bas/_/sbyor ba la sogs 'bad pa yis/_/de nyid rig pas rtag tu spang /_/rdo rje
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]sems dpa'i nga rgyal nyid/_/spang nas gzhan du mi bya'o/_/dag pa de nyid la gnas pas/_/sbyor ba rnams kyang mi bya ste/_/dam tshig dag ni nyams par 'gyur/_/nyams pas yid ni sdug bsngal 'thob/_/bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/_/ji srid de la rtog gyur pas/_/dngos med
[\[20b.2\]]go 'phang la gnas nas/_/thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis/_/rtog las gang zhig 'byung ba rnams/_/ma brtags par ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bsgom pa'i sbyor ba'i stobs kyis ni/_/dngos grub mtshan nyid gang ci'ang rung /_/de kun skad cig tsam la ni/_/rang nyid gnas
[\[20b.3\]]par 'gyur ba yin/_/dgon pa 'di ni bar chad can/_/sngags pas gsang sngags mi bzla zhing /_/dkyil 'khor dag kyang mi bya la/_/phyag rgya mi bcing phyag mi bya/_/lus nyid dkyil 'khor zhes gsungs te/_/shes rab phyag rgya zhes byar grags/_/dpal ldan rdo rje sems
[\[20b.4\]]dag bsngags/_/de bsten pa ni phyag yin no/_/nang gi bdag nyid de byas nas/_/mkhas pas phyi rol thams cad spang /_/gsang ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pas/_/de nyid rig pas rtag tu spyad/_/dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag_/rnam par rtog med sngags pa yis/_/gsang
[\[20b.5\]]ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pas/_/de ltar 'gyur med 'grub par 'gyur/_/spros shing de la rab sbyor bas/_/dam tshig dag ni skyong ba dang /_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yis/_/shes rab thabs dag rnam par bsgom/_/gar dang glu sogs sbyor ba yis/_/pad+ma rdo rje rnam rol
[\[20b.6\]]zhing /_/bur chang sgron ma gus pa dang /_/dri dang phreng sogs rgya chen dang /_/gling bu rnga zlum sgra dag dang /_/rdza rnga'i sgra la sogs pa dang /_/lha rdzas lus ldangs dri bzang ma/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgrub/_/lha rdzas bzang po mchog 'di dang /_/nang gi bdag nyid bsgom
[\[20b.7\]]pa yis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub 'gyur ba/_/spyad par bya ba ma yin no/_/rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyis/_/byang chub sems ni rab spros pas/_/chu skyes khyad par bza' bar bya/_/rtag tu chags pa dang ldan zhing /_/mchog tu dga'
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]ba la sred pas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur/_/mang du smras pa ci zhig dgos/_/rtag tu ngo tsha spangs gyur pas/_/dam tshig spyod la ci bzhin par/_/smyon pa'i gzugs kyis mi smra ba/_/dur khrod la sogs gar gnas nas/_/mA ma kI dang spyan la
[\[21a.2\]]sogs/_/rgyan rnams la sogs kyis brgyan pa'i/_/phyag rgya'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu/_/rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya bsgom/_/rdo rje nam mkha'i khams sbyor bas/_/der ni thams cad bsgom par bya/_/zhal gsum pa yi rnal 'byor gyis/_/ye shes rgya chen rlabs spro bya/_/
[\[21a.3\]]dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/_/rang dngos rim pa bskul byas na/_/sangs rgyas ye shes gzugs can rnams/_/rab tu bsdu ba dag kyang bya/_/phyogs bcu dag tu rgyug byed pa'i/_/rang sems gal te 'dzin par 'dod gyur na/_/sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur gyur rang gi sems/_/
[\[21a.4\]]de tshe yang dag sbyor ba mchog tu bya/_/gong du nyams myong phyag rgya rjes bsams la/_/brtse ldan rjes 'gro bzang dga' chags pa can/_/chags pas thob gyur de la sems gtad nas/_/slar yang rim pa'i khyad par gsal bar bsgrub/_/bsam gtan 'di la sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[21a.5\]]rin chen sems ni brtan gyur na/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab gnas te/_/byin gyis brlab pa mdzad par 'gyur/_/de lta de nyid shes gyur nas/_/der gtad nas ni bsgom par bya/_/ji srid yid ni mi skyo bar/_/blo bzang sems ni mnyam gzhag pas/_/skyon ji ltar 'dod pa
[\[21a.6\]]yi/_/sems kyis kun du khyab par bya/_/cung zad mig ni rgyas gyur pas/_/byang chub rin chen bsgom par bya/_/la la dgod dang smra ba dang /_/la lar gar dag byed pa na/_/ji ltar skyo bar mi 'gyur bas/_/bsgom pa la chags sems kyis so/_/rnam par rtog med sngags pa
[\[21a.7\]]yis/_/de lta'i ting 'dzin dang ldan pas/_/dus kyi nges pa yongs spangs nas/_/bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur/_/bzang po'i rigs lnga las byung ba'i/_/dam tshig rtag tu bza' bar bya/_/khyad par gzhan dang ldan pa yi/_/dam tshig bsten pas mchod par bya/_/
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]rtag tu bde gshegs bsam ldan pas/_/spyan ni rgyas par gyur nas su/_/byang chub sems ni rnam bsgom pas/_/ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya/_/spyod pa rin chen la gnas shing /_/rdo rje ye shes la mos pas/_/bde gshegs go 'phang 'dod na ni/_/mi dge'i sems su mi
[\[21b.2\]]bya'o/_/khams gsum du ni 'byung 'gyur ba'i/_/btsun mo kun la 'dod par bya/_/dman las skyes dang 'gyur ba can/_/de nyid rnal 'byor pas mchod bya/_/rnam par snang mdzad las byung dang /_/srog chags kun lus las byung ba'i/_/srog chags rnams ni rnal 'byor
[\[21b.3\]]pas/_/dngos grub 'dod na bza' bar bya/_/bshang gci sa bon la sogs pa/_/sna yi nang nas byung ba yis/_/rang lus rdo rjer bsgoms nas ni/_/sngags pas rtag tu mchod par bya/_/khams gsum pa las byung ba yi/_/rtag tu dam tshig la mchod pas/_/de nyid rin chen
[\[21b.4\]]la rab sbyar/_/gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dir ni mang du smra ci dgos/_/gang dang gang zhig dmigs 'gyur ba/_/de kun de nyid rnal 'byor du/_/rigs pas brtags shing blta bar bya/_/rdo rje grub par gang gsungs pa/_/shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/_/dam
[\[21b.5\]]tshig bzang po bsten byas pas/_/thams cad bya ba kho na'o/_/de ltar byas na sngags pa ni/_/shin tu de nyid gsang spyod pas/_/ring por mi thogs 'grub par 'gyur/_/'di la spyad par mi bya'o/_/bdag gi de nyid la gtad pas/_/dam tshig bzang po dang ldan pa'i/_/
[\[21b.6\]]de nyid gsum dbyer med pa'i sku/_/sngags pas rtag tu mchod par bya/_/kun kyang rtog pa sngon 'gro bas/_/khams gsum 'di dag rnam par dag_/ma rig dra bas yang dag bsgribs/_/rmi lam rtsed mo'i rjes su 'gro/_/phung po khams sogs mtshan nyid rnams/_/de ltar
[\[21b.7\]]'bad pas spyad na ni/_/mtshan ma med cing snang med pa'o/_/thabs dang bcas pa rnam par bsgom/_/de ltar cho ga ldan shes pas/_/sems ni de nyid byin brlabs nas/_/ji ltar thos pas 'tsho byed cing /_/dam tshig ma lus la rab sbyor/_/tshong dpon bram ze
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]rje'u rigs dang /_/shi ba sogs kyis mgron bos nas/_/zos shing tshims nas bor gyur pa'i/_/gcig tu bsdus pa'i dman ma rnams/_/khyi dang wa yis smad pa dag_/blangs nas de ni bza' bar bya/_/de nyid bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/cung zhig smyon pa'i sems
[\[22a.2\]]ldan pa'i/_/rigs rnams kun du mnyam par sbyor/_/bzang po'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i gar/_/rdo rje gar gyis goms par gnas/_/glu rnams len par byed pa yi/_/rdo rje'i glu ni mi gsal bar/_/khams gsum dag tu grags pa yi/_/gzhan dag gsal po nyid
[\[22a.3\]]du len/_/sna tshogs skad bsres glu len cing /_/sha za bzhin du kun du 'khyams/_/las dag gang gis skye bo rnams/_/gang dang gang du 'ching 'gyur ba/_/thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis/_/srid pa'i 'ching las grol bar 'gyur/_/khyad par thams cad spangs pa yis/_/
[\[22a.4\]]de nyid zhi ba thob gyur nas/_/thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis/_/go 'phang mchog ni bsgrub par bya/_/'byung po kun gyi de nyid gang /_/gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams spang ba/_/'gro kun mchog tu zhi ba nyid/_/khyad par gnas pa'i bzang po gang /_/rang lus thabs dang
[\[22a.5\]]bcas pa yis/_/de nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya/_/bus pa kun la thal mo'i sgra/_/rim gyis gar ni bzang po bya/_/kun rtog thams cad spangs pa yis/_/byang chub mchog tu 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bzang po'i go 'phang der gnas nas/_/gang dang gang du gnas na yang /_/byang chub
[\[22a.6\]]mchog tu nges byas pas/_/spyod ngan can yang 'grub par 'gyur/_/smyon pa'i brtul zhugs la brten nas/_/yid ni de nyid byin brlabs nas/_/gsang spyod mchog gi rol pa yis/_/tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/_/gal te rgya chen khyim rnams ni/_/spong bar nus pa ma yin
[\[22a.7\]]yang /_/dpal ldan gsang grub las brtan pa/_/byang chub 'byung ba'i spyod pa rnams/_/khyim de nyid du gnas byas nas/_/'jig rten spyod pa la gnas pas/_/ji ltar rig par mi 'gyur bar/_/gsang ba'i dam tshig spyad par bya/_/mtshan mo gsal por byas nas ni/_/'o ma
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]gcig tu goms byas pas/_/phyag rgyar bcas pas bya ba ste/_/yid ches pas yin gzhan gyis min/_/dri chu la sogs dam tshig rnams/_/rtag tu spyad par bya ba nyid/_/gcig tu dam tshig goms byed na/_/de nyid bla med 'grub par 'gyur/_/shin tu gsang ba'i grogs dag
[\[22b.2\]]nyid/_/de nyid shes shing mchog gyur pa/_/de dang lhan cig dam tshig rnams/_/rgyud las gsungs pa spyad par bya/_/bud med bzang dang longs spyod bzang /_/de bzhin gnas mal bzang sogs kyis/_/de nyid bsgom pas ngal gyur pa'i/_/ye shes ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur/_/
[\[22b.3\]]dam tshig spyod pa der gtad pas/_/khyim nyid du yang 'grub par 'gyur/_/dam tshig spyod pa dman gyur na/_/spyod pa min zhing khyim du'ang min/_/de ltar dam tshig mngon ldan zhing /_/ye shes bzang po la dga' ba/_/cho ga 'di ni bskul byas nas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub
[\[22b.4\]]par 'gyur/_/nyams su blang bya thams cad ni/_/'gal ba'i dam tshig la sogs pa/_/smad par gyur pa sngon 'gro ba'i/_/ma lus pa dag gang bstan pa/_/dngos grub bzang po'i rgyu yi phyir/_/de dag thams cad bya ba nyid/_/'di kun mngon sum nyid du ni/_/byed pa'i
[\[22b.5\]]char ni dbye bya ste/_/gsang ba spyod pa ldan pa yis/_/de nyid shes yin gzhan ma yin/_/'gal ba'i dam tshig la sogs pas/_/gsang ba grub pa zhes byar brjod/_/rtag can gzugs la gnas gyur nas/_/'jig rten spyod las 'das gyur te/_/smad pa rnams la gsal
[\[22b.6\]]po ru/_/nyams su len par byed gyur cing /_/nus pa dag ni ma skyes par/_/kun rdzob nyid du 'jug 'gyur ba'i/_/dman pa'i rigs la sogs pa la/_/rtag tu dam tshig sogs spyod cing /_/'dod dang bcas pa'i sems nyid kyis/_/thab khung dkyil 'khor sogs byed
[\[22b.7\]]pa/_/rtag dang chad pa smra ba yi/_/gang zhig cho ga 'dir gnas pa/_/de ni bstan pa 'jig byed gsungs/_/gal te rtag dang ldan gyur pas/_/sgrub pa 'di ni byed 'gyur na/_/de ni mtshan mo dam tshig spyad/_/nyin mo shin tu gsang bar bya/_/dman pa'i 'gro ba nyan thos
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]sogs/_/ji ltar gzhan gyis mi rigs pa/_/de ltar sngags pa'i bya ba ste/_/bdag nyid bsgrub phyir shin tu gsang /_/'jig rten kun gyis mi gnod cing /_/'jig rten kun la mi gnod par/_/de bzhin sngags pas 'dir bya'o/_/bde gshegs dngos grub
[\[23a.2\]]'dod gyur na/_/gsang ba grub pa la gnas shing /_/sgrub pa po la nus pa zhig_/ji srid 'byung bar ma gyur pa/_/de srid brtul zhugs rtags mi gzung /_/nus pa zhig ni skyes 'gyur ba/_/de nas gsang ba spyod pa spangs/_/de rjes rig pa'i brtul zhugs gzung /_/de dag
[\[23a.3\]]rtag tu blang bar bya/_/go 'phang nyams dga' der gnas pas/_/rnal 'byor der gtad bsgom par bya/_/'du 'dzi thams cad dang bral nas/_/go 'phang mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/'du 'dzi ring du spangs shing rang bzhin g.yo ba'i sems nyid rab sbyar nas/_/dngos dang dngos
[\[23a.4\]]med rang bzhin bde ba'i mchog ldan de nyid la gnas bsgom par bya/_/nyon mongs pa yi dgra tshogs mang po las rgyal mi nyams bzang por gyur pa yi/_/sems can don ldan sems kyis rtag tu rnal 'byor pa rnams 'jig rten gsum na spyod/_/spyan ni cung zhig phye nas srid pa'i sdug bsngal
[\[23a.5\]]bsal ba'i sems dang ldan pa yi/_/cho ga shes par gyur pas sna tshogs ma lus brdzun pa'i blo dang sgra spangs la/_/mchog tu legs par spyod pa'i sems can don ldan 'jig rten gsum na grags par byed/_/dngos rnams dpag med byang chub go 'phang mchog gyur mnyam med
[\[23a.6\]]sems can mchog gyur rol pa gang /_/khyim gyi 'dzin pa rtswa bzhin ma lus spangs nas ma lus sgyu ma bzhin blta ba/_/sbre'u dang rlung dang glog bzhin g.yo ba'i sems zhes bya la dbang du gyur pas gzhag_/dngos po'i de nyid bsgom pa'i lus can dam pa'i bde ba de nyid mchog_/_
[\[23a.7\]]sems can don la spro ba'i de nyid sems la nges par rnal 'byor dbang phyug rol par byed/_/don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las sgrub pa'i thabs kyis mnyam pa nyid kyi
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]sems dri ma med par byed pa'i gsang ba'i spyod pa'i rim pa ma lus par bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//dag cing rang bzhin dri ma med/_/sna tshogs gzugs rnams phun sum tshogs/_/'chi dang mya ngan rnam spangs pa/_/lha yi phyag rgya mchog rnyed nas/_/lha mo klu mo
[\[23b.2\]]gnod sbyin mo/_/de bzhin lha min bu mo 'ang rung /_/dri za'i bu mo gzugs ldan pa'i/_/grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma yang rung /_/'di lta'i bu mo rnal 'byor ma'am/_/de nyid rnal 'byor ldan pa dang /_/zhags pa lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/_/bkug nas longs spyod nyid du
[\[23b.3\]]bya/_/lha rdzas grub pa gang yin de/_/dam tshig sbyor bar rab tu brjod/_/bsgrubs nas mngag gzhug par 'gyur zhing /_/gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur/_/des ni sems ni rnam g.yeng bar/_/nam yang byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/mi yis bu mo mthu chen gyis/_/dam tshig
[\[23b.4\]]bzang po 'grub par 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i rdzu 'phrul che ldan zhing /_/chu dang rdul dag rnam par spangs/_/sna tshogs gzugs dag rab ston pa'i/_/lha rdzas btsun mo bsten par bya/_/de dang lhan cig mnyam ldan pas/_/skye bo med pa'i tshal song la/_/'jigs pa thams cad
[\[23b.5\]]rnam spangs nas/_/seng ge bzhin du rnam par spyad/_/lha rdzas btsun mo 'gugs pa yi/_/nus pa gal te med gyur na/_/'dod pas gnod pa nyid gyur la/_/des na mi yi bu mo bsten/_/longs spyod bzang po dang ldan pa'i/_/g.yeng ba'i myos pa zhi bya'i phyir/_/de phyir
[\[23b.6\]]sgrub pa'i dbang po la/_/mi las byung ba'i bu mo bsten/_/rnam g.yeng khro ba mang ba dang /_/skyon rnams thams cad 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/rga shi mya ngan gyis non pa'i/_/mi yi bu mo shin tu spangs/_/de lta'i lha rdzas med gyur na/_/dngos grub bzang po'i rgyu yi phyir/_/rgyud
[\[23b.7\]]kyi bya ba'i rim pa yis/_/mi yi bu mo bsten par bya/_/de ltar tha mal byang chub nyid/_/sngags kyis cho ga bzhin byas nas/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i yid can gyis/_/byang chub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/_/tha mal pa yi rim pa yi/_/phyag rgya de nyid bshad
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]par bya/_/mthar skyes dang por byas nas ni/_/gang gis dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o/_/mthar skyes ma sring bu mo dang /_/de bzhin tshos ma'i bu mo dang /_/smad pa'i rigs las byung gyur dang /_/gang yang bde ba rnyed pa dang /_/rgyud nas gsungs pa'i
[\[24a.2\]]rigs byas pa'i/_/khyad par du ni bu mo nyid/_/dam tshig spyod pa thams cad la/_/byis pa nyid nas rim gyis bslab/_/byang chub sems la dga' zhing mkhas/_/chos nyid la ni bzod byas pas/_/mkhas pas cho ga ji bzhin du/_/rdo rje gsum dbyer med par bsgrub/_/
[\[24a.3\]]rgyud nas ji skad gsungs pa yi/_/mchod pa de la gnas nas brtsam/_/gus pas 'o ma sgron ma dang /_/phreng ba la sogs rgyan rnams dang /_/thal ba bzang po bsku bya zhing /_/ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan par/_/sngags pas rang gi gzugs nyid dang /_/de yi gzugs kyang
[\[24a.4\]]bya ba nyid/_/stag gi pags pas gos byas shing /_/sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/_/rdo rje kha T+wAM ga blang zhing /_/dril bu cang te'us rnam par brgyan/_/de bzhin rna ba mgrin dpung pa/_/rus pa'i dum bus rnam par brgyan/_/mi yi thod pa g.yon pa ste/_/de bzhin g.yas
[\[24a.5\]]par Da ma ru/_/bdag dang phyag rgya de bzhin du/_/mA ma kI 'am spyan dag gam/_/bdag nyid rdo rje mchog 'dzin pas/_/'di 'dra'i gzugs su byas nas ni/_/rgyud las byung ba'i cho ga yis/_/rig pa'i brtul zhugs bzang po spyad/_/gnyis med nges par byas nas ni/_/tshe 'di
[\[24a.6\]]nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/_/don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las rig pa'i brtul zhugs nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//mthar skyes ngo mtshar chen po
[\[24a.7\]]las/_/rgyud las sgrub thabs gang gsungs pa/_/ji ltar nges par de thob pa/_/de nas yang dag bshad par bya/_/skyo ba'i nges pa yongs spongs la/_/tshogs kyi dbang phyug gzugs byas nas/_/gang du sus kyang mi shes par/_/mthar skyes nang du 'jug par bya/_/tshogs kyi
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]mtshan ma blangs nas ni/_/mgo bo'i skra ni bregs nas kyang /_/ral pa sbom po gcig bzhag nas/_/gtsug phud gcig ni gzung bar bya/_/ru drAk+Sha dang shel bzang po/_/tshan tshan dag tu spel byas pa'i/_/phreng ba'i do shal 'phyang ba dag_/mgul pa'i rgyan du gzung bar bya/_/
[\[24b.2\]]dpung rgyan gdu bu bzang po dag_/'od zer 'phro zhing 'khrug 'gyur dang /_/'bad pas tshan gsum byas nas ni/_/mdzub mo la ni zangs ma'i rgya/_/mdun gyi phyogs su 'phyang gyur pa'i/_/smad g.yogs dum bu'ang de nas gzung /_/lcags mdung la btags me tog snod/_/
[\[24b.3\]]phrag pa dag la bkal bar bya/_/yan lag thams cad rnam brgyan nas/_/tshogs kyi dbang phyug gzugs su bya/_/phrag pa gnyis ni dgab byas nas/_/mthar skyes khyim du 'jug par bya/_/bzang po de ltar gsang byas nas/_/de nas bsgrub par bya phyir spyad/_/gang zhig
[\[24b.4\]]sus kyang mi shes par/_/bzang po'i yul du 'khyam par bya/_/grong khyer sum brtsegs nye ba'i mthar/_/mthar skyes nang du 'jug par bya/_/yang dag tu ni lha gzhan nyid/_/des ni shes par mi 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu khrus dang lha mchod cing /_/rtag tu rang gi grub mtha'
[\[24b.5\]]bsgom/_/yi ge las ni cung zhig gis/_/rang 'byung lha la chags gyur pas/_/gdol pa'i gzugs kyis tshogs nyid kyi/_/de ltar de yi nang zhugs la/_/byang chub mchog ni bsgom par bya/_/chos dang grub mtha' sngon 'gro bas/_/de nas de la ston par byed/_/dus kyi phyi ma la
[\[24b.6\]]sogs pa'am/_/yang na dbugs kyi sgom pa ston/_/de nas rgyud nas gsungs kun gyis/_/yid brtan pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur/_/dbang dang dkyil 'khor sngon 'gro bas/_/bdag nyid kyi ni slob mar bya/_/de yi byin pa'i rdzas rnams dang /_/snga na yod pa dang bcas pas/_/
[\[24b.7\]]de ni de la gtad byas la/_/de yi bla ma mchod phyir byin/_/de yis bkas gnang blang bya ste/_/shin tu bzhin bzangs mig yangs ma/_/de ni rgyud don bden pa la/_/mkhas shing dam tshig 'dod byas nas/_/sangs rgyas nyid du nges byas la/_/blo ldan rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/_/
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]nges par rgyud gsungs dam tshig gis/_/tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/_/ri 'am rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag gam/_/skyon rnams spangs pa'i yul 'khor dang /_/dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam/_/phug dang grong khyer rnying pa dag_/dri med chu yis gang ba
[\[25a.2\]]dang /_/me tog 'bras bu sogs pas brgyan/_/ljon shing 'khri shing gis brgyan pa/_/khyad par du ni dben gyur pa/_/der ni phyag rgya dang bcas par/_/sgrub po brtan zhing nges pa yis/_/sgom pa'i sbyor ba der gtad pas/_/rtag tu nags su bsod snyoms blang /_/byang chub
[\[25a.3\]]sems la dga' zhing mkhas/_/lus ni nus pa can byas nas/_/yang dag rim pas der gnas nas/_/yang dang yang du goms par bya/_/ljon shing rgyal po de dag kun/_/sgrub pa dbang po dang ldan pas/_/de nyid sbyor bas bkug byas nas/_/zhal zas bzang po ster bar
[\[25a.4\]]'gyur/_/blo bzang rtag tu 'dod med cing /_/blo yis rtag tu goms par bya/_/rdo rje theg pa la dga' zhing /_/rtag tu bde gshegs sems pa can/_/bstan bcos ma lus la goms shing /_/de bzhin gtong ldan dpa' zhing gsal/_/phongs par gyur pa'i tshe na yang /_/mnyam
[\[25a.5\]]pa'i sems nyid gcig tu bsgom/_/phyag rgya'ang de 'drar shes bya ste/_/chags med zhen pa med pa dang /_/zab mo'i chos dang ldan pa dang /_/sgrub po 'dod bzhin rjes su 'brang /_/bzhin bzangs mig ni dkyus ring ma/_/gzugs dang long tshos rnam par brgyan/_/byang chub
[\[25a.6\]]sems la dga' zhing gsal/_/rdo rje sgrub pa shin tu gsal/_/ci ltar bu bzhin brtse ba dang /_/de bzhin spun dang pha ma ltar/_/rtag tu sgrub po mthong ba na/_/brtse bas shin tu goms byed na/_/bud med sgyu bral yid du 'ong /_/skal ba bzang zhing snyan par smra/_/phrag dog
[\[25a.7\]]spangs shing rjes su mthun/_/sgrub pa po yi bka' bzhin byed/_/dmar ser lus phra gzugs bzang ma/_/tshul khrims yon tan gyis brgyan pa/_/mdog snum chog shes pa dang /_/ring min thung ba'ang ma yin pa/_/lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa'am/_/yang na de bzhin
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]bcu drug gam/_/de nyid rig pa dang ldan pa/_/mur gong mtha' ni rnam par mdzes/_/yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs/_/skra yi rtse kun cung zhig 'khyil/_/skad snyan shin tu dga' ba can/_/lta ba bzang pos rnam brgyan pa/_/'bad pas bu mo 'di 'dra ba/_/dngos
[\[25b.2\]]grub don gnyer gyur nas su/_/rtog las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/_/de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs brtsam/_/'bad pas de ni gzung byas nas/_/go 'phang mchog ni bsgrub par bya/_/rang gi rdo rje mchod nas ni/_/byang chub sems ni gtang bar bya/_/de nas sku yi rdo rje
[\[25b.3\]]bsgom/_/ngag gi rdo rje bkug nas gzung /_/de yi b+ha gar byung ba'i khus/_/sems kyi rdo rje rab tu mchod/_/de la gus pas mchod na ni/_/cho ga bzhin du sbyor ba la/_/de nyid sbyor la bsgom par bya/_/tsun+da 'am ni mA ma kI/_/dang po'i rnal 'byor rnam bsgoms nas/_/
[\[25b.4\]]thams cad bya ba kho na yin/_/dam tshig gi ni khyad par dang /_/bud med mchog ni bsnyen par bya/_/b+ha gar ling+ga gzhag nas ni/_/byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya/_/der bskyed pa yi dga' ba yis/_/sems ni bkang nas bsgom par bya/_/ji srid rnal 'byor byang chub
[\[25b.5\]]sems/_/gtong bar byed pa ma yin pa/_/de srid kun dga' las byung bde/_/ci yang rgyun mi 'chad par 'thob/_/bde ba de yi ngo bo dang /_/yang dag ldan pa'i byang chub mchog_/bdag nyid rtag tu bsgom na ni/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/dngos grub
[\[25b.6\]]kun gyi gter gyur pa/_/byang chub sems ni der lhung bas/_/phung po rnam shes brgyal gyur nas/_/ma smad dngos grub ga la yod/_/phyag rgya ma la dam 'khyud nas/_/yang dang yang du 'o byas la/_/gnas de ru ni bskyod pa yis/_/byang chub sems mang rab 'bab
[\[25b.7\]]pas/_/phyag rgya chen po rnam bsgoms la/_/lha mo de la 'o yang bya/_/mig gnyis dag ni rgyas gyur nas/_/bde ba chen po'i ros gang ba/_/ma mchu cung zhig rgyas pa yis/_/nu ma cung zhig dam par 'dzin/_/brla gnyis dri ma med pa mchog_/mig kyang cung zhig
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]rgyas pa dang /_/rdo rje theg pa ngal byas pas/_/der gtad pa yi bsgom dang ldan/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/_/rtag tu der gtad bsam pa can/_/'o ma byin nas yang dang yang /_/khyad par du ni rab tu mchog_/rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya bzhin/_/
[\[26a.2\]]de nyid sbyor bas bsgom par bya/_/yid 'ong bcos ma'i zas dang ni/_/dri dang me tog sogs bsnyen bskur/_/nya dang sha dang bur chang sogs/_/sems ni spro ba byed pa can/_/'bad pas de lta bus mchod nas/_/de nyid ched du bsgom par bya/_/cho ga 'di yis bskul nas ni/_/
[\[26a.3\]]rdo rje sems dpa' bdag 'grub 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dang ldan pa yis/_/bdud rtsi me tog myang bar bya/_/mkha' dbyings rdo rje dbus gnas pa/_/de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog_/bsgom dang dam tshig nyams len pas/_/de lta'i dngos grub myur du thob/_/sems
[\[26a.4\]]kyi dam tshig sdang ba la/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dngos grub med/_/lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom pa dang /_/dam tshig bsrung bar bya ba ni/_/shes pas 'bad pas bsgom byas na/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/ji skad gsungs pa'i sa phyogs su/_/rig pa'i
[\[26a.5\]]brtul zhugs spyad na ni/_/sdig pa ma lus sbyangs nas ni/_/rig ma dang bcas grol bar 'gyur/_/grong dang grong khyer dag tu'am/_/sems ni gang du dga' ba der/_/der ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/_/dgag pa dang ni sgrub pa med/_/dpal ldan 'dus rab yongs
[\[26a.6\]]gsal ba'i/_/sgrub thabs rgyud las gang gsungs pa/_/rig pa'i brtul zhugs ldan pa yi/_/gsang ba spyod pas rnam brgyan pa/_/des ni dngos grub myur thob pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal nas gsungs/_/dam tshig spyod pa dang ldan pa/_/rtag tu goms par bya
[\[26a.7\]]ba yin/_/don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba/_/dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las tshogs kyi brtul zhugs nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//me dang chu dang dug sogs la/_/
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]thabs ni gang gis mi shes pa/_/de ni tshig dang nub pa dang /_/'chi bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/de bzhin gsang 'dus rgyud kyis ni/_/shes rab thabs ni spangs gyur pa/_/'gal ba dag ni spyod byed pa'i/_/bsam ngan de ni brlag par 'gyur/_/gang gis de yi de nyid shes/_/yang
[\[26b.2\]]dag rab sbyin la gnas nas/_/dpal ldan 'dus pa la dga' ba'i/_/sems can de ni steng du 'gro/_/gsang ba'i spyod dang brtul zhugs dang /_/phyag rgya rgyas par gang gsungs pa/_/'di dag thams cad rtog don yin/_/bsgom pa 'ba' zhig tsam yin te/_/gang yang
[\[26b.3\]]rgyas pa'i bdag nyid can/_/kun kyang sems can bsams pas gsungs/_/bsgom pa la ni rab gnas pa'i/_/ye shes ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur/_/rnam rtog du ma rgyas gyur pa'i/_/'di ni thams cad spang byas nas/_/phyag rgya chen po la 'bad pas/_/shes
[\[26b.4\]]rab ldan pas rtag tu bsgom/_/'du 'dzi thams cad spangs nas ni/_/gnyis pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/_/yang dang yang du goms par byas/_/pad+ma rdo rje'i tshig bzhin du/_/dus mi ring bas 'grub par 'gyur/_/dam tshig dag ni thams cad las/_/bla ma
[\[26b.5\]]mchod pa mchog yin te/_/sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog_/dpal ldan 'dus pa'am gzhan du bstan/_/gzugs min brjod pa ma yin pa/_/sems can kun la yang dag gnas/_/lus ngag yid gsum bde ba yin/_/rnam rtog med cing
[\[26b.6\]]gnas med pa/_/dag cing ngo bo nyid med pa/_/byang chub sems zhes dran par bya/_/bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/_/de ni myur du thob par 'gyur/_/khams gsum rin po cher gyur pa/_/slob dpon las ni mchog gzhan med/_/gang las bka' drin thob pa yi/_/mkhas pas dngos
[\[26b.7\]]grub du ma thob/_/yang dag gsungs pas spyod pa gang /_/dpal ldan mnyam nyid gnyis med gsungs/_/des ni slob dpon bya ba ste/_/gzhan gyis 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/gos dang rgyan dang longs spyod dang /_/rang gi phyag rgyas brgyan byas nas/_/bla ma mchod cing
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]phul byas pas/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/_/rang gi phyag rgya phul nas ni/_/rgyud nas gsungs pa'i dngos grub 'grub/_/gzhan dag phyi rol dam tshig gis/_/bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ni rgyud kyi bden don gyi/_/
[\[27a.2\]]dam tshig gtso bo mchog yin no/_/sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/_/dpal ldan rdo rje mgon gsungs pa'i/_/dam tshig dag ni thams cad las/_/gnyug ma'i phyag rgya dbul ba mchog_/gzhan du phyi rol tshul dag gis/_/dam tshig 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/de phyir
[\[27a.3\]]'bad pa thams cad kyis/_/gus par bla ma mchod par bya/_/rang gi phyag rgya pad+ma yi/_/mchod mchog mgrin pa'i dbyangs dag dang /_/brla brdab pa yi rol mo dang /_/rdo rje 'jug pa'i bskyod pa dang /_/rig ma'i mchu yi ro myong dang /_/cung zhig 'khyud par spro ba
[\[27a.4\]]yis/_/bza' ba mchod pa sna tshogs gang /_/nya dang khu ba la sogs dang /_/sha dang bur chang bzang po dag_/rgyud nas gsungs pa sna tshogs dang /_/phyag rgya gnyug ma phul byas nas/_/de nas dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/_/'di lta'i gzugs su ma byas na/_/
[\[27a.5\]]gzhan du dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur/_/rdo rje ston la gang gus pa/_/'di lta'i tshul du byed 'gyur ba/_/de nyid rig pas lam nyid kyis/_/dri med rdo rje gsum dbyer med/_/yang dag rab sbyin gsung 'gyur ba/_/sems can des 'dir 'thob par 'gyur/_/bla
[\[27a.6\]]ma rdo rje mnyes 'gyur bas/_/dngos grub bzang po kun sbyin byed/_/rgyud nas gsungs pa'i dam tshig bzang /_/de ltar rtag par rab bsgrubs pas/_/rdo rje slob dpon thugs rje mchog_/man ngag myur du thob par 'gyur/_/'di lta'i tshul gyis 'ongs gyur pa'i/_/de nyid
[\[27a.7\]]gsal por yongs shes nas/_/gus pa'i dngos po 'phel 'gyur ba'i/_/sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/mchod pa'i dus su 'bab pa yis/_/gus pas bla mar phyag byas nas/_/phyi nas sangs rgyas dngos grub gtso/_/rab sbyin rtse gcig sems kyis bsgom/_/
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]slob dpon mchog la dmod pa dang /_/rdo rje sems dpa' khyad par du/_/dkon mchog gsum la smod pa dang /_/'di dag 'bad pas spang bar bya/_/gang gis sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos/_/nam mkha' lta bu mi shes pas/_/theg pa mchog 'di thos gyur nas/_/sems can
[\[27b.2\]]de ni skrag 'gyur na/_/rdo rje theg pa smod pa de/_/ngan 'gro dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur/_/dman la mos pa'i sems can rnams/_/bskal pa brgya yi bar du yang /_/ngan 'gro dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur/_/ngan 'gro dag nas byung na yang /_/de ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
[\[27b.3\]]'gyur/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/_/gang zhig gus par mi byed pa/_/sdug bsngal phongs pa kun 'byung bar/_/sdig pa'i las kyis 'gro 'gyur te/_/bde gshegs mtshan ma la brten nas/_/mnar med par ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig gus pa dang
[\[27b.4\]]ldan pas/_/chos nyid sgom par byed gyur pa/_/de ni sdig pa kun spangs nas/_/gtso bo'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan pas/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs pa las/_/sems can rnams ni nges grol
[\[27b.5\]]'gyur/_/sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi gnas/_/bla na med pa'i chos rnams ni/_/'jig rten kun la ston pa por/_/dus mi ring bar 'grub par 'gyur/_/mi shes sgrib pas ldongs gyur pa'i/_/sems can rnams la don dam gyi/_/ye shes snang bar byed
[\[27b.6\]]'gyur te/_/mun pa la ni mar me bzhin/_/bde chen mgon po gcig pu nyid/_/gang zhig rtag tu dran byed cing /_/zhabs kyi pad+ma gnyis gus pas/_/sdig pa thams cad zad gyur nas/_/sems can de nyid de yi mthus/_/pad bsnams 'jig rten mgon po
[\[27b.7\]]ltar/_/dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur pa/_/dus mi ring bar 'gyur ba nyid/_/gang zhig dag pas de nyid sems/_/gus pas lcags kyus brtan bkug nas/_/dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi/_/gsang ba'i sgrub thabs gang byed pa/_/gal te de ni bzang gyur na/_/
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]bzang zhes ci phyir rjod par byed/_/gal te dman dang 'dres gyur na/_/slob dpon rnams kyis de bzod mdzod/_/gang zhig rgyud kyi rjes 'brang nas/_/brjod pa bdag gis ma shes pa/_/rang gi bu bzhin 'phags pa rnams/_/ma lus pa dag bzod par mdzod/_/
[\[28a.2\]]dpal ldan mgon po bde chen gyi/_/zhabs kyi pad+mos nyer 'tsho ba/_/pad+ma rdo rje sems can kun/_/rjes su gzung phyir byas pa yi/_/gsang ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba/_/dngos grub kun gyi bla ma'i bla/_/grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po/_/'bad pa nyid kyis bstan par bya/_/
[\[28a.3\]]blo bzang rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin/_/gsang ba sgrub par gang spyod pa/_/mi yis tshe 'di nyid la ni/_/dngos grub ma lus 'thob par 'gyur/_/sems can kun dang dus gcig tu/_/gsang ba spyod pa gang grub pa'i/_/legs pa ma lus gang yod pas/_/dpal ldan slob dpon
[\[28a.4\]]zhabs grub shog_/sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur gyur pas/_/yul gzhan la ni sems zhes pas/_/sgrub dka'i yul dang lhan cig tu/_/kun rtog thams cad spang bar bya/_/gnas skabs lnga ni gnod gyur na/_/skad cig gis ni 'khor bar ltung /_/snyom dang gnyid dang
[\[28a.5\]]'gyod pa dang /_/rgod dang the tshom zhes bya ba'i/_/sgrib pa lnga po sangs rgyas dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' mi bzhed do/_/lnga po de ni yongs spangs nas/_/sangs rgyas nyid du nges byas pas/_/smyon pa'i brtul zhugs kyis rol na/_/tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/_/
[\[28a.6\]]gsang ba de nyid mchog de nyid/_/grub pa gang zhig der brten pa/_/der ni rgyal ba kun 'byung ba/_/gsang ba grub pa zhes byar brjod/_/ces bya'o/_/dgu bcu rtsa lnga dang bcas pa'i/_/tshigs su bcad pa lnga brgyar ni/_/dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir/_/gsang ba grub pa zhes
[\[28a.7\]]byar brjod/_/pad+ma rdo rje'i dga' bas thob gyur bsod nams gang yin pas/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i sar gyur 'jig rten gyur pa yon tan rgyan gnas pa/_/sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur gyur gsang ba grub pa gtan du nyin dang mtshan du sbyor gyur cig_/sems can 'di kun
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]ma lus byang chub snying po'i bar du legs par spyod gyur cig_/gang zhig rgya mtsho dang bcas sa gzhi ri dang ljon shing sogs pas brgyan pa rnams/_/de dag de nyid gzugs brnyan bzhin du chen por gyur pa'i khong du chud par snang gyur pa/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub dri med zla ba'i 'od
[\[28b.2\]]zer dpal ldan gsang ba grub pa mchog_/mdzad pa thugs rjes gzhan gyi dbang gyur dpal ldan pad+ma rdo rje gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/_/don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ma nyes par
[\[28b.3\]]bya ba las/_/don dam pa'i slob dpon gyi mchod pa nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//lha dang lha min la sogs pa ma lus pas/_/zhabs kyi pad+ma zung la me tog gi phreng bas mchod pa dpal mgon po bde ba chen po pad+ma badzra gyis mdzad pa rdzogs
[\[28b.4\]]so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang /_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_/[{D2218}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_pradz+nyo pA ya bi ni sh+tsa ya sid+d+hi/_bod skad du/_thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa sgrub
[\[28b.5\]]pa/_thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rang bzhin dri ma med cing thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin sems gang las ni sangs rgyas kyi/_/yang dag ma yin kun rtog mtha' dag dri mas ma gos chos sku dang ni mtshungs med pa'i/_/dam chos
[\[28b.6\]]char gyi gzhir gyur longs spyod dang ni sna tshogs pa yi gzugs dang spyod ldan pa'i/_/yang dag sprul pa skye 'gyur de la gus par phyag byas nas ni de nyid bshad par bya/_/de yi rang bzhin ma shes pa'i/_/skye bo ma lus la phan phyir//dpal ldan yan lag med rdo rje/_/bdag
