[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]pa sna tshogs rgya che ba'i/_/las kyi tshogs ni skye bar 'gyur/_/de gnyis las ni skye ba dang /_/'chi ba la sogs rab rgyas pa/_/mi bden la zhen sems ldan pa'i/_/shin tu sdug bsngal khor mor 'byung /_/shes rab nyam chung de dag ni/_/ji srid dngos
[\[29a.2\]]'dzin chen po yod/_/de srid srid pa'i btson rar gnas/_/bdag dang gzhan phan gal yod/_/de phyir 'gro ba gsum po dag_/dga' bar byed 'dod rang gi ni/_/'khrul pa bsal bar 'dod pa yi/_/shes rab can gyis dngos 'dzin spang /_/gal te ming tsam tha dad
[\[29a.3\]]kyang /_rtog pa nyid du dbyer med phyir/_/mkhas pas dngos 'dzin yongs gtang ste/_/dngos med par yang mi rtag go/_/mar me 'bar ba bsad rung gi/_/shin ci yang byar med par/_/dngos por 'dzin pa nyid rung gi/_/dngos med 'dzin pa de lta min/_/yang dag dngos po
[\[29a.4\]]mi rtog pa/_/de yis dngos po mtshon 'gyur te/_/gang phyir nam mkha' zhig pa ni/_/med pas dang po bral ba min/_/thabs dang bral bar gyur pa yis/_/dngos med tsam zhig bsgrubs gyur kyang /_/med phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin/_/bdag gzhan don ni nus ma yin/_/
[\[29a.5\]]mig 'phrul lta bur 'khrul ba'i phyir/_/de ltar dngos po yongs su btang /_/sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/_/med phyir dngos med de bzhin no/_/de gnyis ji ltar yongs btang dang /_/btang nas gang du gnas pa ni/_/'khor min mya ngan 'das min pa/_/de ni mkhas
[\[29a.6\]]pas mnyan par gyis/_/shes dang shes bya rab phye ste/_/sbyor bas yongs su brtags nas ni/_/chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid/_/shes rab de nyid du ni brjod/_/ma lus sdug bsngal rgya mtsho dang /_/sdug bsngal las 'don gang yin pa/_/snying rje sems can la chags
[\[29a.7\]]pas/_/'dod chags zhes ni bya bar grags/_/rtag tu rjes mthun sbyor ba yis/_/skye bo mngon par 'dod pa yis/_/'bras bu gang yin nyer sbyin pas/_/de nyid thabs zhes bya bar bsgrags/_/chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa bzhin/_/gnyis med rnam par sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]gnyis po 'dus pa gang yin pa/_/shes rab thabs zhes bya bar brjod/_/de ltar gang la gzhag pa dang /_/gsal bar nus pa ma yin zhing /_/gzhag dang gsal ba spangs pa ni/_/chos rnams de bzhin nyid ces brjod/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba/_/yod dang med pa'i
[\[29b.2\]]phyogs spangs shing /_/mtshan gzhi dang ni mtshan nyid grol/_/rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/_/gnyis dang gnyis med zhi ba dang /_/thams cad la gnas dge ba ste/_/so so rang rig mi g.yo zhing /_/thabs dang shes rab mi 'khrugs pas/_/de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad
[\[29b.3\]]kyis/_/mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur pa'i gnas/_/legs dang lha yi phun tshogs byed/_/chos kyi dbyings su rab tu grags/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis bsten pa'i/_/mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa ste/_/yid 'ong bdag byin brlabs pa'i gnas/_/shes rab pha rol
[\[29b.4\]]phyin dge ba/_/theg pa gsum dang sku gsum dang /_/bye ba grangs med sngags dang ni/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang /_/'jig rten pa dang de las 'das/_/lha dang lha min mi dang ni/_/yid gsal sogs de bzhin gzhan/_/de nyid las ni byung nas su/_/
[\[29b.5\]]de nyid du ni thim par 'gyur/_/ma lus pa yi 'gro rnams la/_/yid bzhin nor ltar kun du gnas/_/shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis/_/spyod dang grol ba yang ngag rtsol/_/de nyid yang dag rtogs nas su/_/sngon gyi bde gshegs sangs rgyas la/_/thams cad du
[\[29b.6\]]ni sangs rgyas zhing /_/'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/dpag med bde ba'i rang bzhin phyir/_/dpal ldan bde chen zhes bya la/_/kun du bzang po mchog nyid dang /_/mngon par byang chub byed pa po/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i thugs rjes 'gro ba gsum gyi sdug
[\[29b.7\]]bsngal ma lus pa/_/'joms par byed pa gcig pu rab 'jug dang ni dpag med sna tshogs pa'i/_/tshogs la chags pa las ni rnam par grol ba'i blo mchog mnyam 'dus pa/_/bdag gzhan phan dang bde rgyu de nyid du ni thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs/_/de dag ni thabs dang
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa sgrub pa las/_shes rab dang thabs rnam par spros pa'i rim par phye ba ste dang pa'o//_//srid pa gzhom dka' 'khrul pa yi/_/nad kyis gzhom bdag la phan pa/_/de nyid rin chen thob bya'i phyir/_/de nas 'di la cung zad
[\[30a.2\]]bshad/_/dpal ldan yan lag med rdo rje/_/snying rjer zhugs pa'i sems kyis ni/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i/_/thabs ni ji bzhin mdor bsdu bya/_/de 'di yin zhes rgyal bas kyang /_/de ni brjod par nus ma yin/_/so so rang rig rang bzhin phyir/_/ngag
[\[30a.3\]]gi lam gyis gzung bya min/_/de lta na yang dus gsum gyi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro rnams dga' mdzad pas/_/mdo sde du ma gsang sngags kyi/_/spyod pa la sogs rim gyis bshad/_/dgra dang don dag 'brel med phyir/_/thos pa la sogs shes pa yis/_/yul du nam
[\[30a.4\]]yang 'gyur ma yin/_/bstan bcos mtshan nyid ston pa yin/_/de phyir skyes bu dam pa yis/_/bla ma dam pa bsten par rigs/_/de ma gtogs par de nyid ni/_/bskal pa bye bas thob mi 'gyur/_/zhing bzang shin tu sbyangs pa las/_/sa bon med pa'i myu
[\[30a.5\]]gu bzhin/_/de nyid rin chen ma rnyed par/_/nam yang dngos grub 'gyur ma yin/_/rnam par mi rtog lam la gnas/_/thabs dang shes rab don ston pa'i/_/man ngag ldan pa 'ga' tsam ste/_/yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'byung /_/sa steng gi ni slob dpon te/_/nges par
[\[30a.6\]]yongs su shes byas la/_/dngos grub mchog ni bdag sgrub phyir/_/de ni 'bad pas bsnyen bkur bya/_/gang zhig gi ni gzi brjid kyis/_/khams gsum brtan dang g.yo bcas pa'i/_/'byung po kun gyis dge legs dang /_/dpag med byang chub bde mchog thob/_/
[\[30a.7\]]ltos pa med par thugs brtse ba'i/_/thugs rje'i sku can de la ni/_/bsam ngan rgyu yi dri bcas pas/_/sems kyis ci phyir 'dud par byed/_/ji srid 'dod pa rnyed bar du/_/kun du phyag dang bkur sti dang /_/'bad de chang la sogs pas mchod/_/bsnyen bkur sri zhu
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]bla mar byed/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan gnas/_/rin chen de nyid thob gyur nas/_/sdang la skyon rnams rtog byed cing /_'dris med tsam yang byed mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin gzhan yang ngan pa'i bdag_/bla ma rdo rje can bsten nas/_/co 'dri bar ni byed pa'i bdag_/_
[\[30b.2\]]bsam ngan rang la co 'dri 'am/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor dang ni/_/bla ma'i phyag rgya 'phrog par byed/_/rnal 'byor pa yi dam chos la/_/ma spyad par ni smod par byed/_/dam tshig ngo mtshar che gyur la/_/rtag tu smod byed blo ldan pa/_/nga yang shin tu skrag byed ces/_/
[\[30b.3\]]dpal ldan rdo rje mgon pos gsungs/_/bsnyen bkur med par myur ba ru/_/bdag ni rjes su gzung 'tshal brjod/_/sdang ba'i sems kyis gzhan bstan te/_/kha cig nyes pa sgrogs la brtson/_/sangs rgyas don du mi gnyer zhing /_/rnal 'byor pa dang slob dpon zhes/_/bdag
[\[30b.4\]]ni ci nas shes 'gyur ba/_/de tsam la ni zhugs pa yin/_/brgya la ye shes rnyed 'gyur na/_/khengs pas bla ma la sdang bar/_/sngags kyi rim pa las 'ongs pa/_/'di ni bdag gis shes zhes brjod/_/slar la 'bul gyis yas rang bzung /_/de nas brtsams te yas kyi ni/_/
[\[30b.5\]]slob ma nga min slob dpon min/_/khro bcas smra ba gzhan dag yod/_/bla ma slu ba'i bsam pa yis/_/co 'dri byed cing 'khyal byed pa/_/tshe 'di bde ba yod min na/_/de dag ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur/_/de lta bu yi sems can gang /_/rang gi don la rgyab phyogs
[\[30b.6\]]yin/_/de ni ngan 'gro kun snod du/_/dpal ldan rdo rje mgon pos gsungs/_/bdag nyid sun 'byin byed pa de/_/dmyal las 'gro ba gzhan yod min/_/shin tu mi bzad las rnams kyis/_/sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos 'tshed/_/de bas dam pa don gnyer ba'i/_/
[\[30b.7\]]skyes bu dngos po thams cad kyis/_/dpag med 'bras bu rab ster ba'i/_/slob dpon kun du bsten par bya/_/byang chub tu ni nges byas pas/_/phrag dog nga rgyal ser sna dang /_/de bzhin g.yo dang sgyu dang ni/_/skyo dub 'du shes yongs spangs te/_/rtag tu ngu yi spyod
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]pa bzhin/_/mi g.yo ba yi sems kyis ni/_/dngos grub kun don ster ba'i bla/_/'gro ba'i mgon po bsnyen bkur bya/_/shin tu gus pas dus gsum du/_/zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas shing /_/rang gi lus la'ang ltos med par/_/maN+Dal sngon 'gro
[\[31a.2\]]mchod par bya/_/de nas bla ma'i bka' drin gyis/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/_/de nyid dam pa gegs med par/_/slob ma yis ni thob par 'gyur/_/rtag tu 'od gsal dag pa ste/_/rgyal ba'i gnas 'gyur byang chub sems/_/gsal ba chos kyi
[\[31a.3\]]dbyings kyi dngos/_/phun tshogs ma lus byed par 'gyur/_/mun pa'i tshogs ni 'joms byed pa'i/_/nyi ma dang ni nye ba yi/_/me shel gyi ni nor bu las/_/rab 'bar me lce 'byung ba bzhin/_/slob ma'i sems ni nor bu la/_/'gro ba gzigs pa nyer 'gyur na/_/dri ma
[\[31a.4\]]'joms byed rnal 'byor gyi/_/me lce rno 'bar de bzhin no/_/dpal ldan de nyid rin chen ni/_/rab tu rtogs pas 'bar rjes la/_/phyogs bcu na bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams/_/thugs rjes thugs ni 'phangs nas su/_/myur du byin nas slob ma ni/_/sangs rgyas byin
[\[31a.5\]]brlabs gdon mi za/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'gyur/_/brtan pas g.yo dang zol dang nga rgyal sgrib pa thams cad yongs su spangs nas ni/_/man ngag ldan pa'i bla ma mtshungs pa med pa dad pas 'dir ni bsten par bya/_/des
[\[31a.6\]]de nges par rgyal ba'i yon tan gter 'gyur de nyid rin chen rnyed gyur nas/_/bde gshegs kun gyis brnyes pa'i byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/de dag ni thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa sgrub pa las rdo rje slob dpon bsnyen bkur nges par bstan pa'i rim par
[\[31a.7\]]phye ba ste gnyis pa'o//_//rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dod pa'i/_/sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/_/dbang bskur srid gsum phun tshogs gnas/_/de ni 'di la yang dag bshad/_/bde gshegs gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/rgyud ni lam gyi rjes 'brangs
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]nas/_/mkhas pas gang tshe dbang bskur na/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum yin/_/dpag med 'jig rten khams dbang phyug_/bdag byin brlab pa'i dbang thob pa/_/dam tshig nyams kyi 'jigs pas na/_/blo ldan de dag gis kyang 'dzin/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi
[\[31b.2\]]don dam du/_/sngags kyi lam las de bzhin gsungs/_/rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i/_/dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'i/_/sngags kyi lam du de bzhin gsungs/_/de bas don kun la 'bad pas/_/dbang bskur don gnyer rgyal dag sras/_/rdo rje slob dpon
[\[31b.3\]]yon tan mtsho/_/ji ltar rigs pas bsnyen par bya/_/gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs/_/mig bzang phyag rgya rnyed nas ni/_/gos dang tsan+dan phreng sogs kyis/_/rab tu brgyan te dbul bar bya/_/dri dang phreng sogs bsnyen bkur dang /_/chang dang ston mo
[\[31b.4\]]rgya chen dang /_/phyag rgyar bcas pa'i gtso bo ni/_/gus pas 'bad de yang dag mchod/_/slob ma dad pas pus lha nga /_/sa la legs par btsugs nas ni/_/thal sbyar bcas pa'i bstod pa 'dis/_/ston pa la ni gsol gdab bya/_/rnam rtog thams cad
[\[31b.5\]]spangs pa yi/_/stong nyid snying po bstod phyag 'tshal/_/kun mkhyen ye shes phung po can/_/ye shes sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/'gro ba'i mi shes gcod pa po/_/bdag don de nyid ston mdzad pa/_/chos bdag med las yang dag byung /_/rdo rje sems khyod
[\[31b.6\]]la phyag 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams dang /_/sa dang pha rol phyin yon tan/_/rtag tu mgon po khyod las 'byung /_/byang chub sems khyod la phyag 'tshal/_/dkon mchog gsum dang theg chen gyi/_/de nyid brtan dang g.yo bcas pa/_/khams
[\[31b.7\]]gsum 'di dag thams cad kyi/_/'gro ba'i sa bon khyod la 'dud/_/'gro don sna tshogs grub pa'i phyir/_/yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'byung /_/dpal ldan bde gshegs bka' bzhin mdzad/_/sangs rgyas sras po khyod la 'dud/_/yon tan rgya mtsho bka' drin
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]gyis/_/de nyid bla med shes par 'tshal/_/kun mkhyen rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba/_/de ltar bka' drin mdzad du gsol/_/dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje yis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po/_/rdo rje chos la bstan pa bzhin/_/de ring mgon pos bka'
[\[32a.2\]]drin stsol/_/khyod zhabs pad+ma spangs nas ni/_/bdag la gzhan ni skyabs ma mchis/_/'khor ba'i dgra las rab rgyal ba'i/_/mgon pos de phyir brtse bar mdzod/_/de nas dpal ldan slob dpon ni/_/phan pa'i bsam pas rjes brtse bas/_/snying rje slob ma la bskyed de/_/'dod pa'i yon tan
[\[32a.3\]]lngas gang ba'i/_/dril bu sil snyan sgra dang bcas/_/bla re 'bar ba bres pa ru/_/me tog bdug pa nyams dga' 'khrigs/_/phreng dang dri zhim mchog tu bde/_/rdo rje sems dpa' lam gyi lha/_/rnal 'byor ma ni rnal 'byor ldan/_/mchog tu rmad byung gnas gyur
[\[32a.4\]]pa'i/_/tshogs kyi 'khor lor bkug nas ni/_/de nas slob dpon skal bzang gis/_/phyag rgya dang ni sbyar byas te/_/rgyal ba'i gnas gyur byang chub sems/_/pad+ma'i snod du bzhag nas ni/_/bkra shis glu yi tshigs bcad dang /_/gdugs dang rnga yab rgyal mtshan bcas/_/
[\[32a.5\]]phyag rgyar ldan pas slob ma ni/_/'gro ba'i gtso bor dbang bskur bya/_/slob dpon dbang phyug mchog gis ni/_/dbang bskur rin chen byin nas su/_/rang bzhin gsal zhing mngon sbyangs pa/_/dam tshig nyams dga' sbyin par bya/_/rin chen chen po ga pur bcas/_/tsan+dan
[\[32a.6\]]dmar po sbyar ba dang /_/rdo rje yi ni chu dang bcas/_/lnga pa dag las yang dag byung /_/'di ni bu khyod dam tshig ste/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/_/bzang pos rtag tu bskyang bar byos/_/de ni sdom pa mnyan par gyis/_/srog chags gsad par mi bya
[\[32a.7\]]zhing /_/bud med rin chen spang mi bya/_/khyod kyis slob dpon yang mi spang /_/sdom pa shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/_/byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur bas/_/slob ma sdig dang bral bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas sras mchog de la ni/_/rjes su gnang ba de nas sbyin/_/
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]byang chub snying po'i mthar thug bar/_/phyogs kyi 'khor lo ku na du ni/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bla med pa/_/sems can mchog gis bskor bar gyis/_/shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin dag_/yid bzhin nor ltar rgya che ba/_/chags dang bral zhing mi skyo bas/_/da ni sems can
[\[32b.2\]]rnams don gyis/_/rjes gnang bcas pa'i dbang bskur thob/_/bya ba byas shing rab dga' bas/_/'gro kun dga' bar byed pa yi/_/'jam pa'i tshig ni brjod par bya/_/de ring bdag gson 'bras bu yod/_/de ring skye ba 'bras bu yod/_/de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/_/
[\[32b.3\]]de ring sangs rgyas sras por gyur/_/skye la sogs pa'i rba rlabs dang /_/nyon mongs 'dam ni rgal dka' ba'i/_/rtog pa'i rgya mtsho 'jigs chen las/_/mgon pos de ring bdag bsgral to/_/khyod zhabs bka' drin shes nas su/_/byang chub gang gi bdag 'tshal bas/_/
[\[32b.4\]]bag chags thams cad spangs nas su/_/rdzogs pa'i bzhin du bdag gyur to/_/mig mdangs 'dzum dang bcas pa yis/_/gus pas zhabs la btud nas su/_/'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/_/rdzas ni gang dang gang bzhed pa/_/de dang de ni dbul bar bya/_/bla ma
[\[32b.5\]]thugs rje can gyis kyang /_/slob ma'i 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir/_/de la phan phyir blang bar bya/_/bla ma'i yon ni phul nas su/_/de nas mchod de phyag byas la/_/mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas thob nas/_/slar yang 'di yis mkhyen par gsol/_/de ring sangs
[\[32b.6\]]rgyas mchog khyod kyi/_/bka' drin bdag gis thob par 'gyur/_/de mthus bla med byang chub ni/_/ji bzhin bdag gis bsgrub par bgyi/_/mchog kun gyis ni mchod pa'i gnas/_/bla med byang chub thob nas ni/_/srid gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams/_/de nyid
[\[32b.7\]]la ni dgod par bgyi/_/cho ga 'di dag nyid kyis dbang bskur byin nas ni/_/slob ma lhag par mos pa'i yid kyis brtag byas la/_/zab cing rgya che ba la lhag par mos nas ni/_/tshig gis rin chen dbang bskur sbyin par bya/_/dbang bskur mchog ni ma lus thob par 'gyur
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]ba ste/_rdo rje mchog 'dzin rnyed dka' mtshungs pa med pa'i gnas/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa dang ni dpal gyi zhing gyur pa/_/byang chub sems can dbang bskur de dag blang bar bya/_/rjes su gnang ba thob nas 'jig rten gsum po yi/_/bya byed ngan pa'i dgra las rgyal ba'i blo ldan
[\[33a.2\]]pas/_/dri ma med pa'i de nyid grub pa'i gnas der ni/_/'jug pa'i sems kyis rgyal ba de nyid rnal 'byor bya'o/_/thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa sgrub pa las/_byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ba nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste gsum pa'o//_//gzhan don
[\[33a.3\]]la phan brtson 'grus can/_/sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/_/shes rab thabs kyi bsgom pa mchog_/de nas 'di la gsal bshad bya/_/gang zhig bsgoms pas 'khor ba yi/_/'jigs rung rgal dka'i rgya mtshor min/_/rang don tsam gyis mya ngan 'das/_/der yang rnal
[\[33a.4\]]'byor pa mi gnas/_/gang zhig rab kyis mthar phyin pas/_/dri med rmad byung sangs rgyas nyid/_/'phel dang 'grib las rnam grol ba'i/_/bla med byang chub skye 'gyur ba'o/_/phung po lnga la sogs chos rnams/_/gang yang dor bar bya min zhing /_/nam yang gzung
[\[33a.5\]]bar bya ba'ang min/_/chos kun mi mnyam mnyam pa nyid/_/stong nyid bsgom par bya min la/_/stong nyid min pa'ang mi bsgom mo/_/stong nyid rnal 'byor pas mi gtang /_/stong nyid min pa yang mi gtang /_/stong nyid stong min nyid 'dzin pa/_/rtog pa rab rgyas skye bar
[\[33a.6\]]'gyur/_/yongs su btang ba'ang rtog pa ste/_/de bas de gnyis yongs su spangs/_/'dzin pa gnyis ka yongs btang na/_/chags bral rnam par grol ba'i gnas/_/de dang 'brel bdag ces par yang /_/kun rtog de phyir de gnyis spang /_/chags pa med cing 'gyur
[\[33a.7\]]ba med/_/sdig pa dang bral mngon zhen med/_/thog ma tha ma'i rtog las grol/_/mkhas pas nam mkha' lta bur bsgom/_/snying rjer ldan pa'i sems can la/_/rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya'o/_/sems can yod dang med ces par/_/rnam rtog nyid ni mi bya'o/_/spros
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]pa med pa'i rang bzhin gang /_/shes rab ces byar rab tu grags/_/yid bzhin nor bu ji bzhin du/_/ma lus 'gro don byed snying rje/_/mi dmigs gnas kyi shes rab dang /_/mi dmigs snying rje chen po ste/_/nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bzhin/_/blo ldan lhan cig gnyis
[\[33b.2\]]su med/_/gang na'ang sgom pa po med cing /_/rnam par sgom pa'ang ci yang med/_/bsgom bya nyid kyang yod min la/_/de ni de nyid bsgom par bshad/_/bya ba'ang cung zad yod min la/_/dpyad par bya ba nyid kyang med/_/byed po dpyod pa las grol ba/_/don dam rnam par
[\[33b.3\]]bsgom pa yin/_/gtong bar byed pa'ang yod min zhing /_/'gog par byed pa'ang ci yang med/_/des na dor bar bya med cing /_/'di la blang bya gang yang med/_/gzugs rnams kun du blta ba dang /_/de bzhin sgra rnams nyan pa dang /_dgod dang rtsed mo byed pa dang /_/ro
[\[33b.4\]]rnams sna tshogs myang ba dang /_/las rnams thams cad byed pa ni/_/sems ni mi g.yo gnas byas nas/_/de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i/_/rnal 'byor rgyun du skye bar 'gyur/_/de nyid gnyis med bstan pa ste/_/byang chub sems mchog 'di yin no/_/dpal ldan
[\[33b.5\]]rdo rje sems dpa' dang /_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub nyid/_/pha rol phyin pa kun dngos kyi/_/shes rab pha rol phyin 'di nyid/_/'di ni mnyam nyid brjod pa ste/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bsgom pa'i mchog_/byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dang /_/rdzogs sangs rgyas
[\[33b.6\]]dang nyan thos sogs/_/brtan dang g.yo ba'i bdag nyid kyis/_/'gro ba thams cad 'di las skyes/_/dngos dang dngos med dang bral ba'i/_/rnal 'byor pas ni de nyid bsgom/_/dngos dang dngos med las grol ba/_/bsgoms pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/nyes pa
[\[33b.7\]]ma lus dang bral zhing /_/nges par sdug bsngal ldog 'gyur na/_/dpal ldan bde gshegs yon tan ni/_/mtha' yas de las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/kun rtog mun pa sdug bsngal ba/_/stug pos mngon par zil gnon cing /_/'dod chags la sogs bzlog dka'i dri mas
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]g.yogs gyur pa'i/_/rab tu 'thor rlung gis bskyod glog ltar g.yo ba yi/_/sems ni 'khor ba yin par rdo rje can gyis gsungs/_/rtog pa las ni rnam par grol zhing 'od gsal ba/_/'dod chags la sogs dri ma'i sgrib g.yogs rab tu spang /_/gzung
[\[34a.2\]]ba dang ni 'dzin pa med na de nyid ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i don du sems can mchog gis gsungs/_/de bas sdug bsngal mang po'i tshogs kyi rgyur gyur pa/_/'di las gzhan pa gang yang yod pa ma yin la/_/thar 'dod 'phags pa khyod kyi bde ba dpag med pa/_/skye ba'i rgyur yang
[\[34a.3\]]'di las gzhan pa gang yang med/_/sdug bsngal ma lus zad bya'i go cha bgos nas ni/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bde mchog thob par 'dod pa yis/_/sems ni brtan byas de la 'bad de dpyad byas la/_/de yis rang bzhin bdag gi rang bzhin nyid du bya/_/skye ldan rnams kyi yid 'di
[\[34a.4\]]ji srid rtog pa'i mun pa snam bu mthug pos dkris gyur pa/_/de srid sdug bsngal dpag tu med yin de nas de ni ji srid bshus par gyur pa ni/_/de srid bde ba rgya chen mtshungs med yin pas 'phags mchog de la nan tan gyis shig dang /_/de zad nas ni de nyid la gnas yon tan rgyas pa
[\[34a.5\]]rang nyid kyis ni snang bar 'gyur/_/de dag ni thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i sgrub pa las/_de kho na nyid bsgom pa'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi pa'o//_//chos kun mnyam nyid rmad byung ba/_/de nyid spyod pa bla na med/_/rnam rtog dgra rnams gsod byed pa/_/
[\[34a.6\]]shes rab pha rol phyin pa gzhan/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gnas pa'i/_/sangs rgyas sras la phan bya'i phyir/_/de nyid yan lag med rdo rjes/_/de nas 'di las gsal bshad bya/_/rga ba la sogs rba rlabs 'khrigs/_/skye ba'i rgya mtsho cher 'jigs las/_/
[\[34a.7\]]'byung po thams cad sgrol ba'i gru/_/nyes med par ni 'gro ba'i gru/_/yid 'ong yon tan kun gyi gnas/_/myur du dngos grub bzang po byed/_/'dod pa'i don kun rab sgrub pa/_/yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'byung /_/ma lus pa yi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rgyur
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]'gyur bar ni/_/rdo rje 'dzin pas rab tu bsngags pa ste/_/'di ma gtogs par dngos grub skye bar 'gyur min de phyir thar pa 'dod pas spyod pa mnyam med 'di spyad bya/_/lha min dgra dang brgya byin grong khyer gsum dgra nor sbyin tshangs sogs rnams kyis zhabs kyi pad+mar mchod byas pa/_/
[\[34b.2\]]bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang mchog ni myur du thob byed sdig pa zad byed 'di ni mkhas pas spyad par bya/_/dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpas 'gro la phan phyir yang dag spyod pa 'di gsungs te/_/sna tshogs gzhan dag ma lus gdul bya'i skye bo du ma'i dbang du byas nas ni/_/
[\[34b.3\]]ji skad gsungs pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs bla med dngos grub ma lus rab bsgrub min/_/kun bzang mtshungs med spyod pa 'di las 'grub 'gyur bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/_/dpal ldan slob dpon rdo rje can/_/mgon la kun nas phyag byas la/_/bya ba byas pa'i blo can gyis/_/
[\[34b.4\]]gsang ba'i spyod pa bstan par bya/_/de nas rang 'dod nges byas la/_/'du 'dzi kun la rgyab phyogs te/_/seng ge'i bdag nyid kun rgyu ba/_/de nyid ldan pas spyad par bya/_/'gro ba 'don pa'i bsam pa yis/_/ji bzhin yang dag don rig pas/_/yang dag ldan pas 'jug pa
[\[34b.5\]]bdag_/gnas med sems ni bstan par bya/_/khams gsum 'di dag de nyid de/_/phung po khams la sogs mtshan nyid/_/thams cad sgyu ma rmi lam bzhin/_/mdor bsdus 'di ltar shes byas la/_/'gyod dang rmugs dang gnyid la sogs/_/longs spyod rgya chen 'du
[\[34b.6\]]'dzin dang /_/de bzhin 'jig rten chos brgyad po/_/shin tu thag ring spang bar bya/_/gnyis med nges par byas nas ni/_/rtag tu g.yo ba med pa yis/_/pha rol phyin drug sbyor ba ni/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub bsgrub par bya/_/sems can rnam par mi rtog bzhin/_/sems can don la
[\[34b.7\]]shin tu chags/_/sems ni byang chub nges byas la/_/de nyid spyod pa la brten bya/_/shes rab thabs su ldan pa yis/_/chags pa kun la rgyab bstan te/_/de nyid goms pa la 'bad pas/_/tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/_/bdag byin brlab par rab gsal bas/_/
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]sems ni ji ltar rjes mthun par/_/sngags kyi lam las rab bshad pa'i/_/dam tshig dag ni kun spyad bya/_/bgegs dang bdud tshogs zhi bya'i phyir/_/bdud rtsi lnga po byin gyis brlabs/_/bshang gci la sogs rnams gnas pa/_/'di ni srung ba bla med
[\[35a.2\]]yin/_/rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nad/_/mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon gyi tshogs/_/bdud dang log 'dren nyid dag ni/_/'di yis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_/mi dang rnga mo las byung dang /_/rta dang glang po las byung ba/_/lnga pa khyi las byung ba ste/_/sgron ma shes rab can
[\[35a.3\]]gyis bza'/_/sems ni dga' bar byed pa yis/_/dam tshig chen po gzhan dag kyang /_/rlung ni 'khrugs pa zhi bya'i phyir/_/thugs kyi rdo rje can mnyes bya/_/thams cad du ni thar 'dod pas/_/shes rab pha rol phyin bsten bya/_/dam pa'i don du gang gnas pa/_/kun
[\[35a.4\]]rdzob dag pa'i lus bzung nas/_/bud med mdzes pa'i gzugs kyis ni/_/thams cad du ni kun du gnas/_/de bas phyi rol don las byung /_/rdo rje mgon pos don de gsungs/_/bram ze'i rigs sogs las byung dang /_/mtha' yas skyes dang phyag rgya dang /_/gzhan gyi chung
[\[35a.5\]]ma tshul nyams dang /_/dman dang cha lugs mi sdug dang /_/skyed ma dang ni sgyug mo dang /_/rang gi bu mo sring mo dang /_/de nyid sbyor bas 'dod spyod na/_/sgrub po myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/sems ni tshim par byed pa yi/_/gling bu sogs las byung ba mnyan/_/phyi rol phyag rgya
[\[35a.6\]]ka ra na/_/ro ni sna tshogs tshim byed bya/_/rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/_/'dod pa'i yon tan mchog rnams kyis/_/sems ni rin chen dag bya'i phyir/_/rtag tu bdag nyid mchod par bya/_/chu skyes rdo rje chu dang ni/_/sgron ma'i 'o ma rab rgyas mchod/_/phreng dang tsan+dan gos
[\[35a.7\]]bzang sogs/_/sems ni skyo ba med par bya/_/bgrod dang bgrod min sogs pa ni/_/'dir ni nam yang bya ba min/_/sgyu ma lta bu sogs sbyor bas/_/thams cad la ni longs spyod bya/_/chos kyi dbyings las byung bas na/_/mi mthun phyogs ni gang yang med/_/dogs
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/_/ji ltar 'dod bzhin rab spyad bya/_/sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/_/khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa/_/'di dag thams cad longs spyad phyir/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa yin/_/ye shes mtha' yas rnyed pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs la'ang
[\[35b.2\]]phyag min na/_/rtag tu bsgom la 'grub pa yis/_/lugs ma la sogs smos ci dgos/_/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di/_/byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te/_/de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can/_/de bas bdag nyid lha yin no/_/smyung ba dang ni dkyil 'khor bri/_/phyag rgya
[\[35b.3\]]bcing dang mchod rten las/_/sbyin sreg dang ni gsang sngags zlos/_/po ti glog pa la sogs pa/_/dpal ldan rdo rje mgon po yis/_/mos pa'i dbang du mdzad nas ni/_/gzhan dag la ni bstan pa ste/_/de nyid rig pa'i sems kyis min/_/mar sar 'dod pa'i snying po
[\[35b.4\]]ni/_/blangs te dar ba 'dor bar byed/_/de ltar chos kyi snying thob pas/_/rtog pa ma lus spang bar bya/_/rnam par mi rtog gnas blo can/_/gnas min dogs pa spangs byas nas/_/thugs kyi rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du/_/de nas 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/_/phyag rgya
[\[35b.5\]]sbyor bas kun du 'khyud/_/rdo rje bcug ste bskyod pa dang /_/ma mchu'i sbrang mchog btung bya zhing /_/de yis 'dren pa'i sgra gsal bas/_/blangs shing dul ba'i longs spyad na/_/nges par dga' ba rgya chen gyis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod pa'i rgyal/_/ring por mi
[\[35b.6\]]thogs 'grub par 'gyur/_/ji ltar yid 'khrugs mi 'gyur ba/_/de lta de ltar spyad par bya/_/sems kyi rang bzhin 'khrugs gyur na/_/nam yang dngos grub 'gyur ma yin/_/de bas dngos grub mchog 'dod pa'i/_/sgrub pa pos ni 'dzin pa spang /_/sems dang
[\[35b.7\]]rjes mthun sbyor ba yis/_/mchog gi go 'phang bsgrub par bya/_/dngul chu bzung bas bsgrubs ji bzhin/_/thabs kyi gzhi yi sbyor ba yis/_/de bzhin sems kyi dngul chu bzung /_/sbyor ba dag ni gang yin pa/_/de ru de yis gnas par bya/_/dus dang grangs ni
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]yongs spangs nas/_/de nyid rig pas 'grub par 'gyur/_/gnyis med mtshungs pa med pa gang yin nyin re zhing /_/de nyid mchog ni rgyun du rjes su bsten par bya/_/'di yis dri ma med cing rdo rje lta bu dang /_/grib ma lta bu'i sku ni mtshungs mad thob par
[\[36a.2\]]'gyur/_/blo dang ldan pas shes rab kyis ni chos rnams kun/_/rang bzhin gyis ni dri ma med par rnam 'byed de/_/'jig rten gsum gyi sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir/_/nyin rer brtson 'grus go cha chen po bgos nas su/_/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin dpal ldan rdo rje
[\[36a.3\]]sems/_/yon tan ma lus pa yi gter gyur bsgom par bya/_/sems ni byang chub ngo bor bzhag nas yul gyi ni/_/bde la dga' bas tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/_/rang bzhin gyis ni ma lus 'di dag rnam dag ste/_/tha mal yul rnams bdag med sgyu ma lta bu dang /_
[\[36a.4\]]mig 'phrul dang ni mig yor dag dang mtshungs pa ste/_/gnas med rtog pa'i tha snyad dag las rnam par grol/_/gang tshe skyes bu dam pa rgya chen bsam pa dang /_/'dzin pa med pa'i sems ni kun du rtogs gyur pa/_/de tshe lhan cig skyes pa'i rtog pa zil mnan te/_/yul
[\[36a.5\]]'di rnams kyis nus pa 'ching bar nus ma yin/_/gang rnams rnyed dang ma rnyed grags dang ma grags dang /_/bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal rab tu rgyas pa dang /_/bstod pa smad pa'i dri ma rab tu ma lus pa/_/zad pas rang gi sems ni mnyam pa nyid du bya/_/chags pa med dang 'gro
[\[36a.6\]]la snying ni brtse ba yis/_/rnam par rtog pa thams cad las grol spyod pa dang /_/ldan pa de yi phyag na bde gshegs go 'phang ni/_/gnas pa yin zhes rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gsungs/_/gzhan la gnod par byed pa'i blo can gyi/_/skye bo gshis ngan kha yi bu ga ni/_/
[\[36a.7\]]zab mo gya gyu nas byung tshig ngan sbrul/_/rtsub mo'i las kyis su zhig 'jigs mi 'gyur/_/shin tu dri med dga' byed 'od kyi phreng can gyi/_/'od zer mtsho skyes kyis ni bzod par mi nus ltar/_/yid 'phrog byed pa'i bdud rtsi med du bshad pa yang /_/skye bo mdzangs min yid ni
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]chags par byed pa min/_/zla ba'i 'od zer de nyid chu shel nor bu dang /_/shin tu nye bar 'dus nas bdud rtsi chu 'dzag bzhin/_/de nyid skye bo bzang yid bdud rtsi'i ros brlan zhing /_/mig nas mchi ma 'dzag bzhin chags par byed/_/de bas bdag ni chos nyid gnas
[\[36b.2\]]pa'i skye bo bzang /_/'phags pa shes ldan khyod la thal mo sbyar nas ni/_/bdag gis mdo ru bsdus te gsal bar byas pa ni/_/rab mchog gang yin de ni khyod la dbul bar gyi/_/dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpas ji skad gsungs pa ni/_/bdag gis kyang ni 'di ru
[\[36b.3\]]de bzhin nges par bstan/_/ci ste nyes par smras pa yod gyur pa/_/de lta na yang 'phags pa bzod pa mdzad par zhu/_/bla ma'i zhabs kyi pad+mar brten par rnam sprul pa'i/_/bdud rtsi dge ba rnams kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba/_/gang yin can de 'gro ba rnams kyi
[\[36b.4\]]thun mong yun ring du/_/phan byed ma lus brtse bas bdag gis byas pa ste/_/dpal ldan 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal po yon tan mtsho/_/rab mchog lha dang lha min dbang po'i cod pan gyis/_/sgrub thabs de nyid rig pa rnams las myur du ni/_/'bras bu ster
[\[36b.5\]]ba gang yin 'di ni byas pa las/_/bsod nams dri ma med pa rgya chen thob gyur pa/_/'di yis 'gro rnams rtog pa'i dgra yi tshogs las ni/_/rgyal bar gyur te blo ldan yon tan rgyur 'gyur ba/_/byang chub sems dang de dag shin tu ldan gyur cig_/de dag ni thabs dang shes
[\[36b.6\]]rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i sgrub pa las/_de kho na nyid kyi spyod pa nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste lnga pa'o//_//thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i sgrub pa slob dpon chen po yan lag med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta chen po
[\[36b.7\]]shAn+ti b+ha dra dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lha btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D2219}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_dz+nyAn sid+d+hi nA ma sA d+ha no pi kA/_bod skad du/_ye shes grub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kun dang dngos grub ni/_/nam mkha' lta bur khyab gyur ba/_/rgyal mchog mchod dang bcas pa yi/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i rdo rje mchog_/sems can kun la kun stsol ba'i/_/'gro ba'i mgon
[\[37a.2\]]la phyag 'tshal te/_/dngos po kun la bdag gus pas/_/sgrub pa'i rim 'di bshad par bya/_/ma lus sbyor rgyud las gsungs pa'i/_/rdo rje ye shes bla na med/_/rmongs pa gang gis mi shes pa/_/de ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyams/_/gang zhig rtog
[\[37a.3\]]pa kun spangs pa'i/_/de nyid la ni yang dag gnas/_/sgrub pa po de tshe 'di yis/_/byang chub dam par gnas par 'gyur/_/sngags dang phyag rgya dkyil 'khor sogs/_/bzlas dang bsgom la 'bad pa yis/_/bskal pa bye ba grangs med du'ang /_/dngos
[\[37a.4\]]grub mchog ni thob mi 'gyur/_/gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs/_/longs spyod dbang phyug stobs rnams dang /_/rigs dang rgyud dang gtsor gyur pa'i/_/sems la nga rgyal bcang mi bya/_/bdag ni blo ldan mkhas pa dang /_/bzo dang sgyu stsal thams cad la/_/
[\[37a.5\]]mkhas pa dag ni rgyal po zhes/_/sems ni bskyed par mi bya'o/_/tshul khrims ldan zhing thos ldan brtan/_/sbyin pa la sogs yang dag ldan/_/bshad dang gzhan yang ma bshad pas/_/bdag tu dmigs par mi bya zhing /_/sems can kun gyi yid khyad par/_/rdo rje sems
[\[37a.6\]]dpa' rang nyid zhugs/_/de ltar bsams nas rnal 'byor gyis/_/dbang pos gang la'ang brnyas mi bya/_/byis pa blun dang dbul po dang /_/tshul khrims 'khyal cing nad kyis gzir/_/de la sogs pa dpag med dang /_/yang dag ldan yang brnyas mi bya/_/dkon mchog
[\[37a.7\]]gsum la dad cing gus/_/byang chub sems kyis rnam par brgyan/_/sems can kun la rjes su brtse/_/dam tshig dang ni sdom la gnas/_/dri chen dmar dang sha nyid dang /_/byang chub sems dang rab bsres la/_/chu chen dang ni yang dag ldan/_/de nyid rig pas rtag tu bza'/_/
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]mi khyi rta dang ba lang sgron/_/sna can dang ni khur skyed kyi'ang /_/rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs la/_/de nyid grub phyir bza' bar bya/_/srid gsum las byung gsad bya zhing /_/pha rol nor ni 'phrog pa dang /_/gzhan gyi bud med la 'dod spyod/_/brdzun gyi tshig ni smra bar bya/_/las
[\[37b.2\]]gang gis ni sems can rnams/_/bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag tu'ang /_/mi bzad dmyal bar 'tshed 'gyur ba/_/des ni rnal 'byor ba grol 'gyur/_/thabs chen yang dag ldan pa yi/_/rnal 'byor 'jig rten don grub pa/_/sems can kun gyis smad pa yi/_/bya ba de la mi bya med/_/
[\[37b.3\]]shes rab thabs dang ldan pa la/_/sdig par grags pa yang med ces/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa las/_/rdo rje can ni nyid kyis gsungs/_/bza' dang bza' min las 'das dang /_/btung dang btung min rnam par spangs/_/bgrod dang bgrod min rnams grol bdag/_/rnal 'byor
[\[37b.4\]]pa ni mnyam 'jog 'gyur/_/rten 'brel las byung yang dag dngos/_/dngos po thams cad rnam par brtag_/'gro 'ong dag las rnam grol zhing /_/skye ba med pa bdag med can/_/sgyu ma 'dra sogs dpe yis ni/_/de rnams sbyor bar rab shes pas/_/nga dang bdag gi rnam
[\[37b.5\]]rtog dag_/de nyid shes pas der mi bya/_/rdo rje chen pos kun khyab cing /_/nam mkha' kun la rab tu zhugs/_/sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing /_/bsod nams thams cad 'byung ba che/_/phan tshun khyab mdzad rdo rje ni/_/kun rig 'jig rten 'dren pa po/_/de ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/_/
[\[37b.6\]]rgyud rnams kun du gsungs pa yin/_/gang la bla ma'i drin yod pa/_/de yis de nyid mchog rnyed 'gyur/_/gzhan du byis pas yun ring du/_/rnam par rmongs pas nyon mongs 'gyur/_/bla ma sangs rgyas chos gyur cing /_/dge 'dun yang ni de bzhin te/_/de yi drin gyis shes 'gyur_
[\[37b.7\]]bas/_/de bas dkon mchog gsum yin no/_/mi shes rab rib kyis ldongs la/_/'di ni lam rab ston byed yin/_/bde ba kun gyi mchog 'gyur dang /_/'dod pa thams cad rab ster yin/_/zab mo'i chos la nges pa'i bdag_/shin tu snying rje'i bdag nyid can/_/dkon mchog gsum
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]rnams don du gnyer/_/chos sbyin pa la zang zing med/_/bla ma de ni slob ma sdud/_/sangs rgyas kun rjes sgrub byed cing /_/'gro ba'i mgon gyis bka' stsal te/_/gzhan dag bla ma min par bshad/_/de bas de dang mnyam pa yi/_/mchod bya blo
[\[38a.2\]]chen yod ma yin/_/des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis/_/brtul zhugs can ni blo mchog mchod/_/de mnyam 'gro ba 'jig rten na/_/khams gsum na ni gzhan med de/_/rdo rje sems nyid 'jig rten na/_/phun sum tshogs kun phyir zhugs yin/_/slob ma phun tshogs mchog 'dod cing /_/
[\[38a.3\]]bsod nams mi zad 'dod pa dang /_/bgegs kun rnam par zlog byed pas/_/rnam pa du mas mnyes par bya/_/dam tshig dag ni thams cad kyi/_/bla med dam tshig 'di yin te/_/phun sum tshogs kun ster ba'o/_/brtson ldan rnams kyis rtag tu bsrung /_/rtog
[\[38a.4\]]pa thams cad rnam spangs pa'i/_/ye shes mchog bzang thob pa yis/_/rdo rje ye shes dbang bskur bas/_/dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/_/yang dag ye shes kun ldan na/_/bris pa'i dkyil 'khor log gzhan du/_/dbang bskur ba ni len ce na/_/
[\[38a.5\]]'di ni dam tshig nyams par 'gyur/_/dam tshig nyams pa'i sdug bsngal ni/_/lus dang de bzhin yid dang ni/_/de yi don rnams nyams 'gyur zhing /_/myur ba nyid du shi bar 'gyur/_/shi nas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal ni/_/bskal ba bye ba brgya phrag tu'ang /_/myong nas gnas
[\[38a.6\]]las 'phos 'gyur na'ang /_/gdol pa'am dman pa'i rigs su skye/_/lkugs pa'am yang na 'on pa 'am/_/skye zhing skye bar dmus long du/_/skye bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni/_/rdo rje ye shes zhes byar bshad/_/blo ldan de yis dbang
[\[38a.7\]]bskur na/_/dbang bskur bar ni shes par bya/_/rnal 'byor sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/_/'gro ba'i bdag po la sogs pa'i/_/tshogs kyis thal mo sbyar nas ni/_/byas nas mngon par phyag byed 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen dang /_/bdag nyid chen
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]po sangs rgyas kyang /_/dpal chen bsrung ba mdzad gyur te/_/rdo rje sku yis rtag tu bzhugs/_/bden pa'i chos 'dzin mi 'khrug cing /_/sangs rgyas gdung ni rab 'jug pa/_/byin gyis brlabs dang ldan pa rnams/_/gus dang bcas pas bsngags par mdzad/_/
[\[38b.2\]]'jig rten skyong dang de bzhin gzhan/_/stobs chen pha rol gnon pa rnams/_/gnas rnams kun du rtogs pa na'ang /_/gsungs bzhin du ni rab tu gnas/_/gang yang sems can thams cad la/_/bdud dang bgegs su gnas pa rnams/_/de yang de la mi byed de/_/
[\[38b.3\]]bgegs rnams skrag nas 'byer bar 'gyur/_/lha la sogs dang grub pa rnams/_/mkha' la rgyu dang mi rgyu kun/_/ngan 'gror 'gro bas 'jigs pas na/_/de yang de la mgon mi byed/_/gal te rmongs pa'i dbang gis ni/_/rnam par rmongs rnams mgon byed na/_/
[\[38b.4\]]brtson dang ye shes rnam shes dang /_/dngos grub dag kyang nyams par 'gyur/_/kun mkhyen mchog sbyin gsungs pa'o/_/dbyibs kun dang ni rnam bral zhing /_/'gro dang 'ong las rnam grol bdag_/rlung kun gyis kyang bskyod mi nus/_/me yi phung pos mi tshig cing /_/chu
[\[38b.5\]]rnams kyis kyang g.yeng mi 'gyur/_/rab tu 'bad pas mtshon cha ni/_/rnon pos kyang ni chod mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar mi gnas nam mkha' ni/_/khyab cing mtshan nyid rnams dang bral/_/'di ni don dam de nyid de/_/rdo rje ye shes bla med yin/_/kun du bzang po zhes bshad
[\[38b.6\]]cing /_/phyag rgya chen po zhes kyang bya/_/'di ni chos skur shes bya ste/_/me long ye shes zhes kyang bya/_/ji ltar gzugs brnyan me long la/_/rang nyid nges par snang ba ltar/_/de bzhin chos skur ye shes ni/_/snang bas me long zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs kun
[\[38b.7\]]ye shes dang /_/rang gi dang ni 'gro ba'i yang /_/dngos nyid gcig pur thugs su chud/_/mnyam nyid ye shes zhes bya'o/_/gdod nas dag cing skye ba med/_/rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba/_/phan tshun khyab pa'i ye shes pas/_/so sor rtog pa can zhes bshad/_/
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]kun du kun nas sangs rgyas kyi/_/mdzad pa thams cad la 'jug pa/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mdzad cig pas/_/bya bsgrub pa zhes bshad do/_/gang tshe nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib/_/thams cad las grol de yi tshe/_/rnal 'byor ba mchog rdo rje can/_/
[\[39a.2\]]shin tu rnam dag ces bshad do/_/ji ltar gdul bya'i chos rnams dang /_/'dod yon kun las sangs rgyas rnams/_/thams cad longs spyod gcig pas na/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur 'dod do/_/mtshan rnams kun dang yang dag ldan/_/sna tshogs sku ste mtshan nyid
[\[39a.3\]]med/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa bas/_/sprul pa'i skur ni bshad pa yin/_/phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub phyir/_/shes nas rnal 'byor pas de bsgom/_/kun rtog thams cad rnam spangs na/_/tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa/_/phyag rgya
[\[39a.4\]]chen zhes shes par bya/_/grub sde du ma'i rgyud rnams su/_/rnal 'byor mchog rnams la brten te/_/mngal 'byung rim pa gang yin dang /_/zhing dang zhing du so sor btul/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni/_/der ni yang dag brtul zhugs
[\[39a.5\]]'dzin/_/gzhon nu'i rol pa thams cad dang /_/de bzhin bzo gnas yang dag bstan/_/btsun mo'i 'khor las mngon 'byung zhing /_/bdud rnams 'dul bar mdzad nyid dang /_/lha yul nas ni 'bab pa dang /_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_/mya ngan 'das chen
[\[39a.6\]]yang dag bstan/_/gang yang rol pa gzhan rnams dang /_/thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin las/_/rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom/_/'dir ni sngon chad ma byung med/_/sngon gnas pa ni sbyor mi bya/_/de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad pa ni/_/thams cad rdo rje'i dngos gzhi
[\[39a.7\]]ba/_/dus gsum lam gyi mthar thug pa/_/thams cad de bzhin blta bar bya/_/ngag gi spyod yul kun las 'das/_/mtshan nyid thams cad rnam spangs pa/_/sangs rgyas nyid kun ster ba po/_/rnal 'byor 'di 'drar bsam par bya/_/sa kun las ni rnal 'byor
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]zhing /_/rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam spangs la/_/grub pa bzhin du rnal 'byor bsgom/_/tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/_/rdo rje can kun rnal 'byor pa/_/thabs kyi chog kun shes nas/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i gsung bzhin du/_/bla med de ni grub par 'gyur/_/'dug dang
[\[39b.2\]]nyal dang gnas pa dang /_/yang na 'chag pa dgal yang /_/rdo rje tshig ni smra byed na/_/rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur/_/gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang rig_/brtul zhugs can ni rtag spyod tshe/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa ni/_/bya'o zhes ni yang dag spyod/_/
[\[39b.3\]]de bzhin bza' dang gos sogs sam/_/gzhan gang ci yang rung ba dag_/sems can rnams la ci ster ba/_/cho ga de bzhin spyad par bya/_/glu gar de bzhin rol mo dang /_/me tog phreng sogs rgyan rnams dang /_/chun 'phyang rnga yab gdugs rnams kyis/_/pha rol
[\[39b.4\]]bdag nyid mchod par bya/_/dri bzang dri yi byug pa sogs/_/cho ga ji bzhin byugs pa dang /_/sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran zhing /_/rnal 'byor pas ni thams cad mchod/_/brtul zhugs can nam mgo bregs pa'am/_/khyim pa 'am bsnyen bkur ba dag gam/_/
[\[39b.5\]]rgyal po 'am sde dpon rnams kyang rung /_/brtul zhugs can gyis ji bzhin spyad/_/rnal 'byor pa ni ci spyod pa/_/thams cad du ni smad mi bya/_/rtog pa kun las rnal grol bas/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bya ba byed/_/de ni dngos kun ngo bo ste/_/khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun rang
[\[39b.6\]]bzhin/_/rang nyid ji ltar 'dod par spyod/_/sems can kun gyi snying la bzhugs/_/de nyid thams cad bla med pa/_/de nyid rnal 'byor dbang pos bsgom/_/rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun 'grub pa/_/rdo rje nyid ni myur thob 'gyur/_/'dir ni bgegs med bdud kyang med/_/
[\[39b.7\]]thams cad kyang ni dbang du 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol/_/brtul zhugs can gyis bdag nyid 'grub/_/bdag nyid thams cad yang dag ldan/_/brtul zhugs che ldan gang tshe mthong /_/nyin zhag dang ni tshad bral bar/_/sangs rgyas thams cad
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]nyid 'grub 'gyur/_/mchod pa kun gyi khyad par gyis/_/bdag nyid la ni rtag tu mchod/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bla med pa/_/phan tshun du yang de bzhin sbyin/_/sems can kun lus las byung dang /_/phyi sa las byung srog chags rnams/_/rnal 'byor
[\[40a.2\]]chen pos legs blangs la/_/de nyid grub phyir bza' bar bya/_/sgron ma che dang yang dag ldan/_/smad pa'i dam tshig gzhan rnams dang /_/bdud rtsi lnga rnams rtag bza' zhing /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mchod/_/yan lag kun ni smad pa dang /_/brnyas pa dag tu
[\[40a.3\]]mi bya ste/_/bud med rigs kun las byung ba/_/rdo rje can gyis mchod par bya/_/ma skyes me tog yang dag ldan/_/byang chub sems dang ldan pa dag_/me tog cho ga la gnas te/_/de nyid grub phyir bza' bar bya/_/sme sha can gyi rigs las byung /_/sme sha can dang khyad
[\[40a.4\]]par du/_/smad pa'i rigs las byung ba rnams/_/brten na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/bram ze la sogs rigs las byung /_/bu mo rnal 'byor pas spyad de/_/ji ltar sems sun mi 'byin pa/_/de ltar shin tu mdzes par bya/_/sbrang ma
[\[40a.5\]]skyugs pa 'dres pa dang /_/bshang la sogs dang bsres pa yi/_/rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid mchod/_/ci 'dod bya ba byed pa dang /_/ji dga' bar ni spyod pa yis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub bya ste/_gzhan du nges par nyon mongs
[\[40a.6\]]'gyur//_brtul zhugs smyung ba sdom pa dang /_/sna tshogs phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i/_/lha yi gzugs su bsgom pa yis/_/sgrub pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dzam gling rdul phran mnyam pa yi/_/gsang sngags bzlas dang bsgom pa la/_/brtson pa che dang ldan gyur kyang /_/
[\[40a.7\]]sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub mi 'gyur/_/de la sogs pa dpag med pa'i/_/byis pa rnams kyis rtag tshul gyis/_/bde 'gror skye ba rnyed dka' na/_/rdo rje sems dpar ji ltar 'gyur/_/phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gzugs la sogs/_/bcom ldan thub pas gsungs pa ni/_/
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]yang dag ye shes mnyam sbyor gyi/_/skal pa dang bral bdag nyid la'o/_/gang zhig rang rig ngo bo nyid/_/de nyid rin chen bla med pa/_/lung dang rigs pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/gang zhig 'dzin par mi nus pa/_/mi shes rmongs pas kun du khebs/_/spyod pa med pa'i blo can
[\[40b.2\]]rnams/_/dang po'i las can rnal 'byor te/_/dman pa'i chos kyi snod yin te/_/'gro ba'i mgon gyis de don du/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sogs bsgom pa/_/sku mdog phyag mtshan kun ldan zhing /_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gsungs/_/gang yang gzhan rkyen khar ma las/_/
[\[40b.3\]]zab mo'i ye shes dag gi snod/_/sdig pa'i grogs dang bdud dang bgegs/_/log 'dren rnams kyis mi bskyod pa/_/de la de nyid dag pa ni/_/rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/_/sems can kun dang tshangs sogs kyis/_/rnam pa kun du mi rtogs pa'i/_/shin tu rmad byung ye shes
[\[40b.4\]]ni/_/sangs rgyas kun dngos zhi ba dag_/tshe 'di nyid la grub byed pa/_/'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa yin/_/ye shes grub pa las/_/phyag rgya chen po bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bo las/_/phung po lnga ni rgyal bar bshad/_/khams rnams spyan
[\[40b.5\]]la sogs yin te/_/de bas sangs rgyas skur 'dod do/_/de lta yin na srog chags kun/_/srid gsum rtag tu rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas nyid phyir byang kun dang /_/thos dang sgom pa don med do/_/'jig rten thams cad sangs rgyas na/_/phongs pa kun kyang mi 'byung la/_/
[\[40b.6\]]bde dang sdug bsngal sgom la sogs/_/gnod pa de la yod ma yin/_/gal te sangs rgyas skur gyur na/_/mngon shes drug la sogs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas yon tan 'byor ba yang /_/ci phyir de dag med par 'gyur/_/gang yang de ltar mi shes pa/_/de ni rdzogs sangs ji ltar
[\[40b.7\]]'gyur/_/'ga' zhig de ltar shes pa ni/_/'di ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yin/_/gang zhig rim gyis bslabs pa yi/_/sbyor bas sems ni 'jug 'gyur ba'i/_/rnal 'byor ba ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/gzhan dag sangs rgyas 'grub pa min/_/gal te ngang gis sangs rgyas na/_/
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]bslabs pa dgos pa ci zhig yod/_/rigs par bcas pa goms bya yin/_/rigs pa med par goms bya min/_/gal te mgon med skye bo 'ga'/_/rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bsgoms pas/_/bskal ba bye ba brgya yis kyang /_/'di ni rgyal
[\[41a.2\]]po thob mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig log pa'i rtog pas ni/_/gang la rgyal po yod min ltar/_/de bzhin log par bsgoms pa yis/_/sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ma yin/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rgyud rgyal du/_/phung po skye mched la sogs pa/_/de nyid dam tshig skal ldan
[\[41a.3\]]pas/_/de dang de ming gis bstan pa/_/dri chen rnam snang zhes bshad de/_/gci ba de bzhin rdo rje chu/_/ji ltar mo dbang pad+ma ste/_/ji ltar pho dbang rdo rje yin/_/gang phyir lung dang rigs pa yi/_/rjes 'brang smra bar mi nus pas/_/de bas gang gis lha yi sku/_/smra bar nus
[\[41a.4\]]pa ma yin no/_/gal te byas pa'i lha yi gzugs/_/rdo rje sems dpar gyur na go/_/gang phyir 'dus byas las byung bas/_/bum pa la sogs bzhin du 'jig_/de bas byang chub spyod pa ni/_/du ma'ang 'bras bu med par 'gyur/_/gal te byung nas zhig gyur na/_/
[\[41a.5\]]bsgom pa nyid ni don cir 'gyur/_/yid kyi rang bzhin byas pa'i gzugs/_/ji ltar 'dus bya yin zhes bshad/_/de dang de ni ji ltar 'jig_/rmongs pa'i rgya mtsho khyod nyon cig_/'di rnams sems kyis brtag pa ste/_/de yang 'dus byas mtshan nyid na/_/yid kyis
[\[41a.6\]]brtags pa gang yin de/_/mi 'jig par ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/phyag dang sku mdog yang dag ldan/_/ji ltar sngon nas rnam bzhugs pa/_/ma byas pa yi lha yi sku/_/gal te de nyid du bsgom bya/_/ma skyes ngo bor gnas pa ste/_/bsgoms pas dgos pa ci zhig yod/_/de
[\[41a.7\]]'dra'i gzugs su ma gyur pas/_/de 'drar bdag ces bsgoms pas na/_/rnal 'byor pa rnams gzugs bsgoms pa/_/de 'dra'i gzugs su gyur pa 'am/_/de ni bdag yin zhes bsgoms pa/_/rnal 'byor pa rnams gzugs bsgoms pas/_/bsgom pa gnyis su
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]'di rnams brtag_/de 'drar bdag ni 'gyur ro zhes/_/gang tshe bsam gtan gyis brtags pa/_/gang tshe bsam gtan gsal gyur pa/_/lha rnams su yang de snang 'gyur/_/khyod kyis ras ris sogs gzugs bltas/_/gang tshe bsam gtan rnam bsgom pa/_/de ni 'od 'gyur
[\[41b.2\]]bsam gtan gyis/_/de bzhin skyes par 'gyur ma yin/_/ma skyes pa yi lha yi sku/_/khyod kyis bsam gtan gyis byin na/_/mngon shes thams cad 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/de gzugs kyang ni skad cig des/_/de ltar khyod la yang dag med/_/bsam gtan gyis ni
[\[41b.3\]]gang du 'ongs/_/khyed nyid kyis ni bskyed pa'i sku/_/bcos ma yin par cis ma rtogs/_/bdag nyid de yin zhes phyogs kyang /_/gnyis pa der ni yod min te/_/grub pa'i sgrub pa yod min na/_/bsam gtan brtag pa ji lta bu/_/kun mkhyen nyid ni thams cad
[\[41b.4\]]mkhyen/_/slar yang thob par mi bzhed do/_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa khyod byed na/_/sangs rgyas nyid pas byed bcug med/_/de ltar yang dag khyed la med/_/ji ltar log par rtog par byed/_/ma byas sangs rgyas sku gang yin/_/de dag yin zhes bya don med/_/ma byas
[\[41b.5\]]pa yi lha yi sku/_/de ni de ltar rnam par dpyad/_/gzugs ni yin pas bum sogs yin/_/ma byas de smra nus ma yin/_/de bas 'gro ba'i mgon po yis/_/byis pa rnams kyis rtogs pa'i phyir/_/sku yi mi rtag ston mdzad pas/_/mya ngan 'das pa gnyis bstan mdzad/_/
[\[41b.6\]]de bas sangs rgyas skur ldan par/_/'jig rten gar yang 'byung ma yin/_/sangs rgyas skur ni rab sgrub phyir/_/gzugs kyi bsgom par bya ba min/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas gzugs med pa'i/_/rig pa bems po'i bdag nyid nyon/_/yul na gnas gyur gzugs can ni/_/
[\[41b.7\]]mngon shes drug tu ji ltar 'gyur/_/'jig rten khams ni thams cad na/_/gzugs la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams/_/mig gi skye mched la sogs pa/_/de rnams der ni 'ongs ma yin/_/gang tshe mig la sogs pa yi/_/'gro ba dmigs par mi 'gyur na/_/
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]de rnams ji ltar phrad par 'gyur/_/ma phrad pa ni kun rig min/_/song nas shes par 'gyur zhe na/_/rim gyis shes par ji ltar nus/_/shes bya du ma'i ngo bo bas/_/thams cad mkhyen pa de 'dra med/_/sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa yis/_/de bas
[\[42a.2\]]dgongs pa yod ma yin/_/mig sogs dbang po ma gtogs pa/_/lus gzhan dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs brnyan lta bur sems med par/_/sangs rgyas skur ni shes byas nas/_/gang phyir yang dag rig med pas/_/sangs rgyas sku ni kun mkhyen min/_/
[\[42a.3\]]brtser ldan rnams kyis lha yi spyan/_/sangs rgyas rnams la mnga' bar bshad/_/lha yi snyan ni thams cad mnga'/_/ji ltar thams cad mkhyen te min/_/gal te ye shes kyis mkhyen na/_/de tshe sangs rgyas skus ci bya/_/skur gnas ye shes der rig pas/_/de bas sku ni
[\[42a.4\]]kun mkhyen yin/_/sku las tha dad tha dad min/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis ye shes ni/_/sku dang yan lag ldan zhe na/_/mya ngan 'das nas de yang 'jig_/lus ni 'jig pa'i chos can pas/_/ye shes kyang ni 'jig par 'gyur/_/de bas sangs rgyas ye shes
[\[42a.5\]]sku/_/'jig par rigs pa ma yin no/_/ye shes lus la gnas gyur pa/_/sku med pas na kun mkhyen min/_/rten 'brel las byung ye shes de/_/de bas 'jig pa nyid du 'gyur/_/nyams 'gyur ye shes sku rnams ni/_/thams cad mkhyen nyid mi rigs so/_/
[\[42a.6\]]de bas sangs rgyas sku dag ni/_/thams cad mkhyen par bya ba min/_/ye shes las gzhan phyogs la yang /_/sangs rgyas skur ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/'di ltar sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan du/_/de ltar rnal 'byor smra ba'i rigs/_/gang zhig 'jig rten rmongs pa
[\[42a.7\]]rnams/_/gzugs gang bsam par 'dod pa ni/_/sangs rgyas ye shes rab bsgrub phyir/_/nam mkha' za bar 'dod pa yin/_/'gro la snying rje dman pa dang /_/thabs dang shes rab rnam spangs pa/_/zab cing rgya che'i chos rnams la/_/de rnams blo gros yod ma
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]yin/_/de lta'i chos dang bral ba ni/_/phan tshun dag ni rgyug pa ni/_/chos la rmongs rnams smyon pa bzhin/_/g.yangs dag tu ltung 'gyur ba/_/de dag kun la khyad par du/_/snying rje chen po bya ba ste/_/yang dag ye shes nyer shes pas/_/de la brnyas pa rigs ma yin/_/
[\[42b.2\]]ye shes grub pa las gzugs su bsgom pa dgag pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o//_//de ltar gzugs su bsgom pa yis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' mi 'grub ste/_/rnam bcas rtog pas kyang de bzhin/_/rdo rje sems dpa' mi 'grub bo/_/rnam nyid ye shes de yin
[\[42b.3\]]pas/_/rnam pa las ni tha dad 'gyur/_/'on te rnam pa ye shes 'gyur/_/de ltar 'di ni mi rigs so/_/rnam pa ye shes de min te/_/shes la rnam pa nyid med de/_/dper na bum pa mkhar mi 'gyur/_/mkha' yang bum par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs med
[\[42b.4\]]gzugs su mi 'gyur te/_/gzugs med gzugs can yod ma yin/_/ye shes gzugs ni med par grags/_/rnam pa gzugs can yin par bshad/_/ji ltar de nyid gzhan min nyid/_/'gyur ba yin zhes brtag par bya/_/rnam pa ye shes nyid yin zhes/_/
[\[42b.5\]]rtog pa 'di yang mi rigs so/_/nges par gzhan du thal 'gyur ba/_/mdo tsam du ni mnyan par gyis/_/gal te rnam de shes min na/_/'dus byas nyid du thal bar 'gyur/_/ngo bo 'dus ma byas 'gyur ba/_/byis pa rnams la yod ma yin/_/byas pa nyid dang rnam
[\[42b.6\]]'jig nyid/_/sangs rgyas ye shes ji ltar 'gyur/_/thog mtha' med cing zhi ba zhes/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsungs la/_/de sras skal ba chen po yang /_/ye shes 'dus byas min zhes gsungs/_/de kun sgyu ma lta bu dang /_/mig yor lta
[\[42b.7\]]bur nges bshad de/_/skye dang 'gag pa med pa dang /_/ye shes su de cis mi 'gyur/_/mig gi rnam shes zhes bya gang /_/ye shes su ni de mi rtag_/'gyur ba nyid du thal 'gyur na/_/sangs rgyas ye shes gzhan du min/_/ye shes de ni mi 'gyur bar/_/
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gsungs te/_/de bas gcig pa nyid du yang /_/nges par smra ba rigs ma yin/_/shes pa'i rab tu snang de yin/_/ye shes dag tu de mi brtag_/so sor snang ba dgag pa las/_/ye shes ci phyir dgag mi 'gyur/_/
[\[43a.2\]]de bas gcig pa nyid mi 'grub/_/tshig de shin tu nges yin na/_/ci phyir de dag gcig nyid du/_/khyed ni yongs su rtog par byed/_/lung dang rigs pa dang 'gal bas/_/rnam pa kun du 'bras bu med/_/ye shes de nyid rnam par shes/_/de ltar yang ni mi
[\[43a.3\]]rigs so/_/rnam pa las ni tha dad med/_/shes pa'i shes nyid mi rigs te/_/shes bya las ni shes 'gyur gyi/_/shes bya med par ma yin no/_/gal te shes pa tha dad 'gyur/_/ye shes su ni rtag na go/_rnam pa tha dad gyur pa ni/_/ye shes nyid las gnas
[\[43a.4\]]med yin/_/ye shes 'byung ba'i dus su yang /_/rnam pa kun du mi 'byung la/_/rnam pa'ang kun du 'byung ba na/_/ye shes nyid ni mi rigs so/_/dper na bum pa rdzogs pa la/_/snam bu 'byung ba med pa bzhin/_/tha dad pa yi chos rnams ni/_/ji ltar 'jig rten
[\[43a.5\]]dag na snang /_/bu ni ma skyes pa dag ni/_/gzhan dag gis ni gang yin pas/_/mo gsham bu ldan 'jig rten na/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu gang yang med/_/bu dang bcas pa'i lha sbyin ni/_/gang tshe rang gi bur bcas na/_/gzhan dag gis ni bu yin kyang /_/bu dang bcas
[\[43a.6\]]pa rigs ma yin/_/de bzhin ye shes gnas med ni/_/rnam bcas yin par ji ltar 'dod/_/gang la ltos nas ye shes ni/_/gang gis de ni rnam bcas 'gyur/_/ye shes rnam bcas yin zhes pa/_/rnam pa dang bral ma yin te/_/rnam pa dang bral ye shes
[\[43a.7\]]ni/_/rnam bcas nyid du ji ltar 'gyur/_/rnam pa dang bcas gang yin pa/_/de ni rnam bcas nyid yin na/_/rnam pa kun las rnam grol ba'i/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas ye shes 'gyur/_/gal te rnam pa nyid kyang ni/_/'di ni rnam bcas nyid 'gyur na/_/sangs
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]rgyas ye shes med par yang /_/sangs rgyas su khyed cis mi 'gyur/_/kun mkhyen min te ye shes min/_/ye shes tha dad par rab brtags/_/de bas rnam bcas ye shes la/_/dngos grub rigs pa ma yin no/_/gal te rnam pa med pas ni/_/rnam pa dang bcas
[\[43b.2\]]nyid 'gyur na/_/sangs rgyas gdung la rab 'jug pas/_/de dang phrad pa ma mthong ngo /_/gzugs can yang dag mi sbyor te/_/gzugs med pa la rnam kun min/_/dper na nam mkha' bum pa dang /_/yang dag sbyor bar mi 'dod ltar/_/de ni rnam pa dang ldan yang /_/
[\[43b.3\]]de ni rnam bcas 'gyur ma yin/_/ltos dang bcas pas rnam 'jig nyid/_/tshogs pa med pa dag tu 'gyur/_/tshogs pa las byung gang yin te/_/sangs rgyas ye shes 'gyur ma yin/_/gang tshe ye shes 'dus byas pas/_/rnam bcas yin par mi 'grub bo/_/gal te
[\[43b.4\]]rnam pa ye shes dag_/gzhan nyid dag tu 'gyur na ni/_/de ltar phan tshun ltos pa dag_/ye shes su ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/rnam pa shes las tha dad par/_/gal te de ltar rtogs na ni/_/de rnams shes pa las gzhan pas/_/shes med nyid du thal bar 'gyur/_/
[\[43b.5\]]gang zhig rnam pa las gzhan nyid/_/de bas rnam pa med 'gyur na/_/shes de rnam pa med par ni/_/ci phyir de ltar rtogs mi byed/_/ye shes grub pa las rnam pa dang bcas pa'i ye shes dgag pa ste le'u gsum pa'o//_//ji ltar rigs pas rnam brtags
[\[43b.6\]]pa/_/rnam pa dang bcas rab bkag nas/_/rnam med nyid kyang mi 'grub pa/_/de ltar du ni brjod par bya/_/gal te rnam pa med na yang /_/ye shes 'gyur ba rnam rtogs na/_/rnam pa dang ni rnam bral ba/_/'dis ci rig na kun rig yin/_/kun mkhyen de la yod
[\[43b.7\]]min zhing /_/ye shes zhes bya rtog pa nyid/_/rnam pa thams cad mi gzigs pas/_/bems po nyid du thal bar 'gyur/_/bems med rtogs pa'i ngo bo ni/_/rnam pa med pa yin par bshad/_/gang zhig bden na thams cad rig/_/yang dag ma yin ji ltar rig_/_
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]rnam rtog kun las nges grol zhing /_/chos rnams thams cad bdag med par/_/de ltar mkhyen na ye shes de/_/brdzun pas ji ltar rig par 'gyur/_/sgyu ma 'dra sogs dpe rnams kyis/_/chos rnams thams cad rab rtogs te/_/'gro la
[\[44a.2\]]phan phyir de dang der/_/sangs rgyas thams cad ston par mdzad/_/sgyu ma la sogs dpe gang zhig_/log par rtog pas brtags pa ste/_/ngo bo nyid kyis yod min na/_/kun mkhyen de ni ji ltar mkhyen/_/ri bong rwa dang de bzhin du/_/mo gsham bu ltar mi rigs te/_/
[\[44a.3\]]dngos po med par ji ltar rigs/_/de bas rnam pa med par 'gyur/_/sgyu ma la sogs dpe rnams ni/_/sras bcas rgyal bas bstan mdzad pa/_/dngos po med par brtags pa tsam/_/thams cad du ni 'gag pa min/_/dpe nyid dang ni mtshungs pa ru/_/rnam pa
[\[44a.4\]]kun du chos bshad na/_/bsgrub bya yin pas thams cad du/_/dpe nyid du ni mi 'gyur ro/_/dper na skyes bu seng ge yi/_/dpe ni 'jig rten la yod pa/_/dpe sogs yon tan ldan pa ste/_/'jug pa la sogs yod ma yin/_/de bas dngos po thams cad ni/_/ngo bo nyid kyis

[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]rigs pa ji ltar med/_/gzugs la sogs pa'i skye mched ni/_/mig la sogs pas shes pa ste/_/sems dang bcas pas rjes myong ba/_/de ltar 'jig rten dag nag nas/_/gzugs sogs yod pa ma yin te/_/khyod nyid kyis ni ma smras sam/_/gal te dngos po med pa

[\[44b.3\]]du/_/sems can rnams kyi don mdzad do/_/gang tshe 'di yang mi mkhyen na/_/'gro ba'i don ni ji ltar mdzad/_/rigs pa med pa kun mkhyen min/_/sems can sdug la thugs rje med/_/yid bzhin nor bu mchog bzhin du/_/smon lam dbang gis sems can don/_/mdzad
[\[44b.4\]]ces pa ni rigs ma yin/_/'di ni yod pa snang bar 'gyur/_/sems can kun don legs bsgrub phyir/_/gang tshe nges pa nyid 'gyur bas/_/ye shes yid bzhin nor bu bshad/_/bems po'i bdag nyid ma yin no/_/gang du ma mthong ma byas kyang /_/rang gi ye shes kyis

[\[44b.7\]]thar/_/sdug mi sdug sogs sdug bsngal sogs/_/bral ba bems po'i bdag nyid gang /_/chos kun ngo bo nyid mkhyen pa/_/kun mkhyen zhes ni nges par bshad/_/rang bzhin mkhyen pa'i kun mkhyen zhes/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid bshad ces/_/thams cad

[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]la gtsang ba med/_/dri 'dzag za ba la la ni/_/de ni thams cad kyis ma zos/_/ji ltar 'o ma la sogs kun/_/lus can 'di dag thams cad kyi/_/bza' dang bza' min rab grags pa/_/rang gi sems la yod ma yin/_/zas dang gos la sogs pa
[\[49a.2\]]kun/_/mi gtsang bar ni rab shes na/_/gang phyir chu la yang dag pas/_/de rnams 'di ni rab tu 'jug_/char gyi tshogs ni 'bab pa yis/_/smad pa thams cad bkru ba dang /_/'bru rnams thams cad bskyed nas ni/_/de nas rgya mtshor 'bab par 'gyur/_/mi gtsang rnams
[\[49a.3\]]dang ldan pa yis/_/chu ni klu yis blangs nas su/_/chu ni gang dang gang yin pa/_/thams cad de bzhin char du 'bab/_/rdzing bu la sogs kun rgyas shing /_/thams cad kyis ni thams cad 'khrud/_/de bas gtsang dang mi gtsang sogs/_/thams cad 'dir ni
[\[49a.4\]]yod ma yin/_/gtsang ba nyid ni yod 'gyur na/_/mi gtsang nyid ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dag pa med pa'i mi gtsang nyid/_/rnam pa kun du mi rnyed do/_/dper na pha rol tshu rol bzhin/_/de ni phan tshun ltos pa ste/_/gtsang dang mi gtsang la sogs rtog/_/rtog ni 'jig
[\[49a.5\]]rten pa yi yin/_/ye shes grub pa las gtsang ba dang mi gtsang bar rtog pa las grol ba ste le'u bcu pa'o//_//ji ltar rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis/_/bgrod min pa la bgrod gyur pa/_/yang dag rjes gnang mi 'gal bas/_/da ni rnam par dpyad par bya/_/'di
[\[49a.6\]]ltar lus can thams cad ni/_/sems las skye dang 'jig pa ste/_/de yang las rnams dbang nyid kyis/_/srid dang srid pa thams cad du/_/pha dang ma yang bur 'gyur zhing /_/bu dang ma yang phar 'gyur la/_/bran mo chung ma'ang phar 'gyur zhing /_/chung ma yang ni ma ru 'gyur/_/
[\[49a.7\]]de la sogs pa'i tshul rnams ni/_/shin tu rgya cher du mar ni/_/srid par gzod nas gyur to zhes/_/rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin/_/de ltar gnas shing 'khor bar ni/_/yun ring dus su 'jug pa dang /_/pha dang mar ni ma gyur pa'i/_/sems can gang yang yod
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]ma yin/_/de bzhin bu mo la sogs kun/_/'gro ba drug tu sngon byung nas/_/de bas snying rje chen po ni/_/bya zhes rgyal ba'i mchog gis gsungs/_/de bas rdo rje sems dpa' sogs/_/mgon po'i mchog ni de rnams kyis/_/rnal 'byor pa yi sems sbyang phyir/_/bu mo
[\[49b.2\]]la sogs rjes su gnang /_/rtog pa'i chus ni gang ba yi/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen por ni/_/rdo rje theg la ma zhon par/_/su zhig pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur/_/log pa'i shes pa thams cad ni/_/lung dang rigs pa legs ldan pas/_/nyes pa kun gyi 'byung
[\[49b.3\]]gnas ni/_/de rnams rim gyis bkag pa yin/_/ye shes grub pa las bgrod pa dang bgrod pa ma yin pa dang bral ba ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o//_//rdo rje theg par rab rtog phyir/_/rnal 'byor pa ni mchog don du/_/rnal 'byor rgyud gsungs dpe dang ni/_/rigs pas
[\[49b.4\]]kyang ni de bshad bya/_/gzugs sku la sogs dngos rnams ni/_/de nyid ngo bo ji bzhin min/_/de bkag sngar ni byas zin pas/_/de bas gzugs med du yang gnas/_/nyes pa kun du thal gyur pa'i/_/dngos po de nyid 'gyur ma yin/_/sdug bsngal kun gyi
[\[49b.5\]]'byung gnas mchog_/med pa de yang de nyid min/_/dngos dang dngos med de nyid min/_/gzhan du gyur pa'ang rnam spangs min/_/de bas phyogs yod rigs min te/_/de tshe kun mkhyen 'gyur ma yin/_/yang dag ye shes rig pa las/_/khyab dang rdo rje'i sku nyid dang /_/
[\[49b.6\]]'gyur ba med pa nyid dang ni/_/kun mkhyen nyid ni de yis 'grub/_/gzugs can khyab pa nyid dang ste/_/de bas rdo rje sku ma yin/_/de la mi 'gyur yod min pas/_/thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ma yin/_/rim gyis shes gang ci yang rung /_/'di ni thams cad rtog
[\[49b.7\]]min te/_/shes bya rnams la tshad med pas/_/kun mkhyen du ni 'di mi 'dod/_/gang zhig shes byar rab bshad pa/_/phyogs kyi cha ni gcig pu nyid/_/'di ni bskal pa stong phrag dag_/bye bas kyang ni shes mi 'gyur/_/gal te skyes nas 'jig 'gyur na/_/de
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]bas bskyed par bya ba min/_/shin tu gnas pa'i ye shes nyid/_/'khrul pa tsam zhig rnam par 'jig_/gang zhig 'gro dang 'ong 'gyur ba/_/de la khyab pa yod ma yin/_/g.yo zhing phyogs gcig la gnas pa/_/de ni 'jig par thal bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig
[\[50a.2\]]kha dog med gyur chos/_/de ni gang gis 'jig par 'gyur/_/mtshon dang dug dang med dang chus/_/gnod pa skyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' kun nas gnas bdag nyid/_/mi 'gyur mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/_/nyon mongs med cing 'gyur med la/_/rnam pa thams cad
[\[50a.3\]]dus kun la/_/gang zhig dus kun pa min pa/_/de yang kun mkhyen 'gyur ma yin/_/de bas dus rnams kun du yang /_/'gyur ba min par shes par bya/_/lus can dag ni thams cad la/_/ye shes che gnas nyid yin na'ang /_/mi shes rab rib kyis khebs
[\[50a.4\]]pa'i/_/byis pa rmongs pas mi shes so/_/ji ltar khyi ni bong pa las/_/bsnyeg cing 'phen par byed la min/_/de bzhin sems kyis gang bsam bya/_/snyeg gi sems nyid la ma yin/_/gang zhig sems kyis bsam bya yang /_/de nyid la /yang nges rtog gi/_/sems
[\[50a.5\]]nyid de nyid ji 'dra zhes/_/sems pa la ni 'jig mi 'byed/_/ye shes grub pa las de nyid gnas pa gzhag pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o//_//shin tu rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rnams/_/gal te gzhan gyis rab bskul na/_/thar pa'i don du bdag gis bdag_/_
[\[50a.6\]]g.yang sar yang ni 'dor bar mdzad/_/rmongs par gyur pa mang po yang /_/spyod pa dag ni 'di 'dra bas/_/bde gshegs lam ni kun spangs te/_/dmyal ba'i lam ni brten pa snang /_/long ba'i mi ni la la zhig_/gzhan dag la ni lam ston byed/_/gang dang gang brtags
[\[50a.7\]]de dang de/_/'dri bar byed rnams de mi 'dri/_/gal te rmongs pa'i dbang gis lam/_/mi mthong de ni ston byed kyang /_/sdig can gyi ni lam de yis/_/bgrod pa nyams pa thob par 'gyur/_/rang nyid kyis lam mi mthong bar/_/ji ltar shin tu gzhan bdag 'dren/_/long ba
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]gnyis ni 'grogs 'gyur na/_/gnyi gas sdug bsngal the tshom med/_/ji ltar dmus long bya ba yis/_/'brog dgon dag tu zhugs gyur pa/_/gnyis ka'ang de 'dra la la zhig_/ji ltar grong du 'jug par 'gyur/_/de bzhin dmus long gyur pa des/_/yang dag ye shes
[\[50b.2\]]ma mthong bas/_/gnas de thob par mi nus na/_ji ltar de ni gzhan grol byed/_/de bas bla ma bsten pa ni/_/yang dag dang ldan slob ma yin/_/yongs su brtag par bya'o zhes/_/rgyal ba'i mchog gis rab tu gsungs/_/dkon mchog gsum la ngang gis
[\[50b.3\]]dang /_/sems can kun la snying rjer ldan/_/brtan zhing gtong sogs yon tan ldan/_/bsod nams thams cad cher bskyed la/_/byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed/_/blo bzang rab dang yon tan ldan/_/khro ba med cing spro ba che/_/zab mo'i chos la lhag par mos/_/de ni
[\[50b.4\]]chos kyi sbyin pa dag_/zang zing med la rtag par dga'/_/de ni rtag tu 'dod pa chung /_/tshogs gnyis yang dag bsags pa'o/_/de ni bla mar sangs rgyas dang /_/rdo rje 'dzin bcas kun gyis gsungs/_/de nyid sems can thams cad kyi/_/ston pa 'jig rten 'dren
[\[50b.5\]]pa yin/_/gang gzhan bla mar bshad pa dag_/log shes mngon pa'i nga rgyal can/_/chag sogs don du chos rnams ni/_/mchog dag ston par byed 'gyur ba/_/'gro ba'i sdig pa'i grogs po ru/_/'jig rten na de rab tu gnas/_/bdud kyi phyogs kyi rigs can te/_/
[\[50b.6\]]bdag gzhan phung bar byed pa yin/_/'gro ste rtag tu spang bya zhing /_/de la bsnyen bkur bya ba min/_/de la khong khro mi bya zhing /_/shin tu nye bar mi bya'o/_/ji ltar nyan thos rnams dang ni/_/lhan cig bde gshegs bzhed min ltar/_/de bzhin de 'dra dang lhan cig_/gnas
[\[50b.7\]]par shin tu mi bya'o/_/ye shes grub pa las slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//sngar bshad pa yi mtshan nyid las/_/slob dpon du ni bshad pa yin/_/slob ma yi ni mtshan nyid kyang /_/ji ltar gyur pa bshad par bya/_/ji ltar 'ga' ni
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]grur zhugs pa/_/skya ba 'dzin la legs slob na/_/mtsho chen pha rol 'gro 'gyur zhing /_/gzhan du pha rol bgrod mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin bla ma dkon mchog gsum/_/byang chub sems la'ang dad ldan zhing /_/'jig rten la ni snying rjer ldan/_/'di ni gru zhes
[\[51a.2\]]bya bar bshad/_/bla ma mkhas pa skya ba 'dzin/_/gru ni thams cad rab ston pa/_/'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro rnams la/_/rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin/_/skya ba 'dzin pa med par ni/_/gru ni pha rol bgrod mi nus/_/yon tan thams cad rab rtogs kyang /_/bla ma
[\[51a.3\]]med par srid mthar min/_/de bas nges pa nyid du 'di/_/brtul zhugs brtan pas de bzhin du/_/phyi nang bdag nyid can rnams kyis/_/rtag tu rnal 'byor pa mchod bya/_/phyag la sogs pa'i bya ba kun/_/dus rnams kun du rab tu bya/_/shes rab dad par yang dag ldan/_/
[\[51a.4\]]skye bo rnams la snying rjer ldan/_/khro ba med cing slu ba med/_/gtong sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/_/spro chen rang gi brtson 'grus ldan/_/rtag tu bla ma'i bka' bzhin byed/_/ma bsgoms yang ni rang gi blos/_/yo byad la sogs dngos po rnams/_/ci snyed
[\[51a.5\]]pa dang ci nus dang /_/de bzhin bza' dang bca' sogs dbul/_/ji ltar brnyas pa gyur kyang ni/_/yid ni zhum pa med par bzod/_/lung dang rigs pa rtogs pa po/_/slob ma yon tan kun ldan yin/_/mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin can/_/gang yang 'dri ba med pa ni/_/
[\[51a.6\]]slob par bya ba mi nus zhes/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyis rab tu gsungs/_/ji ltar byis pa 'dam gong la/_/ji dga' bar ni 'phen pa ltar/_/de bzhin gang zhig gzhan dbang 'gyur/_/dam pa'i chos kyi snod ma yin/_/ye shes grub pa las slob ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste
[\[51a.7\]]bcu bzhi pa'o//_//yang dag de nyid ji lta bar/_/rig par bcas pas sngar bshad pa/_/de nyid rgyud kun la gnas pa/_/de rnams las ni cung zad bshad/_/'jig rten na ni rkun ma'i sgra/_/'bras chan don du ston par byed/_/la la rkun ma nyid la smra/_/
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]rgyud kyang de dang 'dra ba yin/_/sems can phan mdzad sangs rgyas rnams/_/mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma la/_/yi ge de dang de yis bstan/_/chos ni de nyid gsung bar mdzad/_/de nyid 'ba' zhig gsung ba dang /_/de bzhin la la tshig gnyis dang /_/dbang po zhen pa
[\[51b.2\]]'ga' la chos/_/'ga' zhig gsung gi gzhan du min/_/dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa las/_/thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/_/stong dang snying rje mi phyed pa/_/byang chub sems zhes bshad pa yin/_/zhes gsungs te/_thog
[\[51b.3\]]mtha ma med ces bya ba ni skye ba dang 'jig pa med pa ste/_'dis ni khyab pa nyid dang /_gzugs can ma yin pa nyid dang /_mi 'gyur ba nyid dang /_dus thams cad pa nyid du yang ston te/_phyogs na gnas pa dang /_gzugs can dang 'gyur ba dang dus rgyun chad pa
[\[51b.4\]]rnams ni rnam par 'jig pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te gzugs can ma yin pa rnams kyang yul na gnas par 'gyur na 'jig pa nyid du 'gyur te/_dper na gla rtsi la sogs pa dri zhim po rnams ni gzugs can ma yin na'ang yul na gnas pas gla rtsi la sogs pa'am/_
[\[51b.5\]]des bsgos pa'i rdzas rnams med na rnam par 'gyur bas 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad glo bur ba yin pa'i phyir rab tu zhi ba'o/_/sngar bshad pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa na/_de nyid dngos dang dngos med zad pa'i gtso bo ste/_'jig rten dang
[\[51b.6\]]'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi don rnams rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir gtso bo'am bdag po'o/_/stong dang snying rje mi phyed pa/_/zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i stong nyid de dang /_
[\[51b.7\]]thugs rje chen po mi phyed cing gcig tu gyur pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni snying rje zhes bya ba ste/_sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyal po 'di nyid la rab tu gzhag par bya zhing /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis phan gdags par bya'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i bsam pa'o/_/
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]'di skad ston par gyur te/_chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang /_lhan cig phan tshun khyab pa dang khyab par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pas/_sems can thams cad
[\[52a.2\]]la thugs rje chen pos gces par 'dzin par rtog pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i don to/_'dis ni sgom pa yang de ltar bya'o zhes ston pa yin no/_/byang chub sems zhes bya ba ni/_rnal 'byor gyi rgyud ma lus pa rnams las dgongs pa 'di nyid yin no/_/las
[\[52a.3\]]dang po pa rnams la yang byang chub kyi sems ni sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sems yin par gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las/_sangs rgyas kun zhes bya ba ni/_/'dus pa 'dres par bshad pa yin/_/zhes
[\[52a.4\]]gsungs so/_/gzugs can rnams ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa mi srid pas sangs rgyas rnams ni chos kyi sku can yin te/_de rnams kyi 'dres pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes te/_rdo rje 'chang ba nyid yin par ston gyi gzhan du na gzugs kyi sku ji ltar 'dres par
[\[52a.5\]]'gyur/_rdul phra rab tsam gyi tshad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'dres na yang /_nam mkha' yang rab tu gang zhing de bas lhag par 'gyur te/_thams cad kyi sgra ni ma lus pa'i tshig yin pas nyung ngus kyang 'dres par mi rigs so/_/yang de nyid las/_
[\[52a.6\]]bskyed pa yi ni rim nyid dang /_/de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/_/yang dag ye shes de nyid de/_/ma bcos pa zhes bya ba nyid/_/de nyid las ni yang dag bshad/_/gang gis thog mtha' med pa'i dngos/_/rnam dag yid kyis sgom byed pa/_/
[\[52a.7\]]zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/le'u dang po las de nas nam mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas par gyur to zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang /_ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/_/dngos po med de sgom pa'ang med/_/
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]nam mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba yis/_/dngos po 'di dag rab tu bsgrags/_/yang /_chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i/_/gzod nas dag pa mkha' dang mtshungs/_/byang chub med cing rtog pa'ang med/_/byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_
[\[52b.2\]]le'u dgu pa las rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ste/_chos thams cad nam mkha'i khongs su gtogs pa'o/_/chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i khams na'ang mi gnas/_gzugs kyi khams na'ang mi gnas/_gzugs
[\[52b.3\]]med pa'i khams na'ang mi gnas 'byung ba chen po bzhi la yang mi gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ni don gyi dbang de lta bu mkhyen cing /_sems can rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas chos 'chad do/_/
[\[52b.4\]]rigs kyi bu de ltar nam mkha'i tshig nges par brjod pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig de dag rjes su rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na gtsub shing dang gtsub stan dang mi'i lag pa bskyod pa'i rkyen gyis du ba rab tu byung zhing me chen po 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi/_me
[\[52b.5\]]de yang gtsub shing la yang mi gnas gtsub stan la yang mi gnas/_mi'i lag pa bskyod pa la yang mi gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa rjes su rig par bya'o/_/le'u bcu pa las/_lus ngag
[\[52b.6\]]sems rnams bsgom pa ni/_/rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa/_/gang la'ang mi gnas mnyam pa nyid/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bsgom/_/le'u bcu gnyis pa las/_nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam gyur cing /_/rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid/_/rang bzhin dag
[\[52b.7\]]pa'i chos rnams la/_/rol mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom/_/le'u bcu drug pa las/_rdo rje thig ni gdab pa dang /_/tshon rtsi dag kyang dgye ba ni/_/sngags kyi sems dpas mi bya ste/_/byas na byang chub rnyed par dka'o/_/zhes gsungs te/_dkyil 'khor thig gdab
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]pa dang tshon rtsi dgye ba la sogs pa mi bya'o/_/sngags kyi sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni yid skyob par byed par bya ba'i phyir sngags ni ye shes yin te/_yang dag pa'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bya ba'i don to/_/gal te rmongs pas de ltar byed na ni byang chub
[\[53a.2\]]rnyed par dka' bar 'gyur te/_byis pa'i skye po las dang po pa'i sems can gyi bya ba byed pas sangs rgyas nyid dang rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid rnyed par dka' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa de la ni_/_
[\[53a.3\]]dkyil 'khor bri ba dang /_'jug pa dang dbang bskur ba la sogs pa ni bkag pa yin no/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i snang ba yis/_/rang rang ngo bo gsal bas na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang /_/rnam snang mdzad du de bshad do/_/skye bo mi 'dod pa kun dang /_/
[\[53a.4\]]log shes slob dpon skye bo yis/_/mi bskyod pa yi ngo bo pas//'di ni mi bskyod yang dag bshad/_/gang phyir nges par sangs rgyas sogs/_/rin chen rnams ni rang 'byung nyid/_/ye shes sems can don ldan pas/_/rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bshad do/_/mi gnas
[\[53a.5\]]pa yi mya ngan 'das/_/srid dang mya ngan 'das ma gos/_/grangs med yon tan yang dag ldan/_/'od dpag med par de bshad do/_/sems can kun don bya ba rnams/_/rang nyid kyis ni rang bsgrubs pas/_/don yod ye shes chen po ste/_/don yod grub pa zhes bshad
[\[53a.6\]]do/_/phra ba dang ni rgya che'i tshul/_/'jig rten gsum po yongs mkhyen cing /_/zhing rnams kun na gnas gzigs pas/_/des na spyan zhes bshad pa yin/_/de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni/_/nyid kyir nyid kyis thugs su chud/_/phan tshun du ni khyab nyid pas/_/
[\[53a.7\]]des na mA ma kI ra bshad do/_/kun mchog de bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/nyes pa kun sel ye shes ni/_/sems can yang dag sbyor ba'i brtson/_/gos dkar mo zhes bya bar bshad/_/thugs rje chen pos rtag tu ni/_/'gro ba 'don pa'i dgongs pa ni/_/sems
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]can grol ba mkhas pas na/_/ye shes sgron ma rab bshad do/_/khams gsum pa la sogs pa ni/_/sangs rgyas ye shes nyer longs spyod/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni/_/spyan la sogs pa rab tu bshad/_/kun mchog de bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/gsod
[\[53b.2\]]sogs 'jig pa las grol bas/_/rab gdug 'dul ba'i ye shes te/_/de bas gshin rje gshed du bshad/_/log pa'i shes pa rnam sel ba'i/_/rmongs pa'i sems can rab ston can/_/yang dag ye shes rab mchog ste/_/ldan pas shes rab mthar byed bshad/_/
[\[53b.3\]]'gro ba kun gyi dga' ba rnams/_/rnam par brtags shing mi 'dzin la/_/srid pa dri med thugs chud pas/_/des na pad+ma mthar byed bshad/_/bgegs sogs pa la rnam grol bdag_/ye shes kun don sgrub pa po/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'grub/_/des na bgegs
[\[53b.4\]]ni mthar byed bshad/_/shes dang shes bya zad gyur pa/_/snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bshad do/_/srid gsum mngon phyogs ye shes ni/_/chags sogs gsum ni sbyong ba ste/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin dag_/zhal gsum du ni de yongs bshad/_/gtsang zhing
[\[53b.5\]]rnam dag ngo bo las/_/sku mdog dkar po rab tu ston/_/sbyin pa kun kyang ser po nyid/_/dmar po dag tu thugs rjes mtshungs/_/dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed sogs/_/'dul bar mdzad pa brtson gyur pa/_/'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa'i mchog_/ye shes de
[\[53b.6\]]ni nag por bshad/_/sna tshogs thabs ni rnam dag gang /_/sku mdog ljang gur rab tu bshad/_/gang phyir gzugs sogs skye mched rnams/_/'di ni rab tu spyod mdzad de/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs ye shes/_/thugs chud phyag ni drug par bshad/_/byang chub
[\[53b.7\]]sems ni rdo rjer gyur/_/shes rab dril bu yin par bshad/_/'khor lo mi shes yang dag gcod/_/rin chen de bas rnyed dka' ba/_/srid pa'i nyes pas mgos phyir/_/ye shes de ni pad+mar bshad/_/ral gri nyon mongs dgra de gcod/_/ut+pal steng du byung ba ste/_/
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]'khor ba'i chur ni nub pa yi/_/shes pas gang phyir skyes pas so/_/des na rgyas byed ut+pal bshad/_/sangs rgyas rjes gnang sems can rnams/_/rdeg pas tho ba yin par bshad/_/dbyig pas chad pa 'dul ba ste/_/ye shes 'gro ba 'dul ba po/_/

[\[54a.3\]]mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs te zhes pa las/_/'di skad bdag gis dus gcig kho na'i tshe na thos te/_bcom ldan 'das ni dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po ni ye shes so/_/de nyid rdo rje btsun mo ste mi phyed

[\[54b.6\]]ba'i dkyil 'khor ni glo bur gyi dri ma rnams dang bral zhing /_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer dang bral bas rim gyis rdzogs par snang ngo /_/de bzhin du rang bzhan gyis yongs su dag pa'i sems kyi rin po che yang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma'i nag nog dang bral

[\[58b.1\]]ba 'dus pa las gsungs te 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba mngon par rtogs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ji lta ba blta bar bgyi/_
